original: 'dir ni de skad ma brjod kyang //
analyzed: 'dir ni de skad ma brjod kyang //
translated: Although it is not stated here,

original: phyogs las 'gal ba cung zad med //
analyzed: phyogs las 'gal ba cung zad med //
translated: there is no contradiction with the position.

original: slob dpon gyi rjes su dpag pa ni spyi'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi rjes su dpag pa ni spyi'i yul can yin no //
translated: The master‚Äôs inference has a general object.

original: chos can grub zin pa'am de las gzhan 'ga' zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni spyir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos can grub zin pa'am de las gzhan 'ga' zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni spyir mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the subject is already established or something else is to be established, it would not be general.

original: des na gal te rang nyid smos pa chos can bsgrub bya yin pa ma spangs pa de lta na yang skyon yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na gal te rang nyid smos pa chos can bsgrub bya yin pa ma spangs pa de lta na yang skyon yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, even if one does not avoid mentioning oneself as the subject to be established, there is no fault,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa nyid kyis spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa nyid kyis spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is excluded by being its own characteristic.

original: gzhan yang / gal te chos can bsgrub par byas //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te chos can bsgrub par byas //
translated: Moreover, if the subject is to be established,

original: de la cir 'gyur de mi nus //üîΩci ltar rtags rjes 'gro med phyir //
analyzed: de la cir 'gyur de mi nus // ci ltar rtags rjes 'gro med phyir //
translated: what would happen? It is not possible.üîΩHow is it that these are not faults

original: 'di dag gi skyon min nam ci //
analyzed: 'di dag gi skyon min nam ci //
translated: because the reason does not follow?

original: yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa //
analyzed: yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa //
translated: Relying on the latter part,

original: phyogs skyon 'dod min de lta na //üîΩgtan tshigs la sogs nyes pa yang //
analyzed: phyogs skyon 'dod min de lta na // gtan tshigs la sogs nyes pa yang //
translated: the fault of the position is not accepted.üîΩThe faults of the reason, etc.

original: phyogs kyi skyon du thal 'gyur te //
analyzed: phyogs kyi skyon du thal 'gyur te //
translated: are also the fault of the position,

original: thams cad phyogs la gnod phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad phyogs la gnod phyir ro //
translated: because everything is harmful to the position.

original: de phyir de tsam dang 'brel pa //
analyzed: de phyir de tsam dang 'brel pa //
translated: Therefore, it is not a fault of the thesis to be related to that alone.

original: phyogs kyi skyon 'dod gzhan min te //
analyzed: phyogs kyi skyon 'dod gzhan min te //
translated: The fault of the thesis is not the same as the other,

original: mngon sum la sogs 'gal ba bzhin //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs 'gal ba bzhin //
translated: like the contradiction of perception, etc.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa 'gal ba'i don gyis ma bsal ba la phyogs yin no zhes phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa 'gal ba'i don gyis ma bsal ba la phyogs yin no zhes phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the definition of a thesis is that which is intended to be proven, but is not refuted by the meaning of a contradiction?

original: de la gal te chos can nyid phyogs su byas na skyon ci yod /
analyzed: de la gal te chos can nyid phyogs su byas na skyon ci yod /
translated: If the subject itself is taken as the thesis, what is the fault?

original: 'on te chos can nyid bsgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te chos can nyid bsgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, the subject itself is not capable of being proven,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its own characteristic is not to be proven.

original: chos can yod par bsgrub pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid bsgrub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: chos can yod par bsgrub pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid bsgrub par 'gyur na /
translated: If the existence of the subject is proven, then the own characteristic would be proven.

original: thams cad gtan tshigs ni khyad par dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
analyzed: thams cad gtan tshigs ni khyad par dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
translated: Because all reasons are without a specific property and pervasion.

original: 'o na ni dpe med pa'i phyir der gtan tshigs nyid nus pa med pa yin te des na gzhan gyi skyon ni gzhan gyi skyon yin no zhes bya bar mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'o na ni dpe med pa'i phyir der gtan tshigs nyid nus pa med pa yin te des na gzhan gyi skyon ni gzhan gyi skyon yin no zhes bya bar mi rigs so //
translated: If that is so, then because there is no example, the reason itself is incapable. Therefore, it is not reasonable to say that the fault of the other is the fault of the other.

original: 'on te 'di ni phyogs kyi yang skyon nyid de 'grub par mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'di ni phyogs kyi yang skyon nyid de 'grub par mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But this is a fault of the reason, not of the thesis, because it is not suitable to establish the thesis.

original: de lta na 'o na gtan tshigs kyi skyon thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te ;
analyzed: de lta na 'o na gtan tshigs kyi skyon thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te ;
translated: If that is so, then all faults of the reason are faults of the thesis,

original: de'i skyon gyis phyogs nyid 'grub par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i skyon gyis phyogs nyid 'grub par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the thesis itself is not suitable to be established due to the fault of the reason.

original: 'on te dper na sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba lta bur gang la sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan srid pa der ni mig gis gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bur gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no //üîΩ'di ltar phyogs la ni sgrub par mi @169a * //
analyzed: 'on te dper na sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba lta bur gang la sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan srid pa der ni mig gis gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bur gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no // 'di ltar phyogs la ni sgrub par mi @169a * //
translated: For example, in the case of ‚ÄúSound is impermanent‚Äù where another proof, the reason, is possible, the reason is faulty, as in ‚ÄúBecause it is apprehended by the eye.‚Äù

original: rung ba nyid kyi skyon yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba nyid kyi skyon yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In this way, the thesis does not have the fault of being unestablished,

original: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is established by another reason.

original: gang du gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med pa de ni phyogs kyi skyon no //
analyzed: gang du gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med pa de ni phyogs kyi skyon no //
translated: Where there is no reason at all, that is a fault of the thesis.

original: srid pa'i rang gi bsam pa phyogs kyi tshig gis bstan par bya ba yin na de ni ci ltar tshad mas gnod na mi srid pa yin pa de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid yin yang yin pa des na 'di ni phyogs kyi nyes pa nyid yin no
analyzed: srid pa'i rang gi bsam pa phyogs kyi tshig gis bstan par bya ba yin na de ni ci ltar tshad mas gnod na mi srid pa yin pa de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid yin yang yin pa des na 'di ni phyogs kyi nyes pa nyid yin no
translated: If the object of refutation by reasons were an object that exists by virtue of its own nature, then it would be impossible for it to be undermined by valid cognition. Since it is a conventionality, it is not like that. Therefore, this is indeed a fault of your position.üîΩ

original: zhes bya bar rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya bar rigs so zhe na /
translated: If the impossibility of the position is to be demonstrated by a statement of one‚Äôs own opinion, then just as it is impossible to be contradicted by a valid cognition, so it is also the case that it is one‚Äôs own nature. Therefore, this is indeed a fault of the position.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: phyogs kyi mi srid pa nyid 'di //
analyzed: phyogs kyi mi srid pa nyid 'di //
translated: This impossibility of the position

original: ci ga gtan tshigs la ltos sam //
analyzed: ci ga gtan tshigs la ltos sam //
translated: Does it depend on a reason?

original: 'on te de rang la gnas yin //
analyzed: 'on te de rang la gnas yin //
translated: Or does it reside in itself?

original: de ni gnyi ga ltar yang yin /
analyzed: de ni gnyi ga ltar yang yin /
translated: It is the case that it is both.

original: gal te rtags dang 'brel pas skyon ;
analyzed: gal te rtags dang 'brel pas skyon ;
translated: If it is a fault because of the connection with the reason,

original: / der 'gyur de nyid rtags skyon nyid //
analyzed: / der 'gyur de nyid rtags skyon nyid //
translated: Then that itself is a fault of the reason.

original: de ni rang rten skyon min te //
analyzed: de ni rang rten skyon min te //
translated: It is not a fault of the basis itself,

original: mthong ba yis kyang 'grub phyir ro //üîΩrang gi rang bzhin gyis grub par //üîΩmi rung yin na mngon sum gyis kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthong ba yis kyang 'grub phyir ro // rang gi rang bzhin gyis grub par // mi rung yin na mngon sum gyis kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is established by perception.üîΩIf it is not suitable to be established by its own nature,üîΩThen it will not be established even by perception.

original: rjes su dpag pas mi 'grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas mi 'grub bo zhe na /
translated: If it is not established by inference,

original: 'on re rjes su dpag pa nyid kyi skyon yin no //
analyzed: 'on re rjes su dpag pa nyid kyi skyon yin no //
translated: But it is a fault of the inference itself.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gal te ma grub pa'i chos can sgrub par byed na der yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon nyid de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gal te ma grub pa'i chos can sgrub par byed na der yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon nyid de /
translated: For this very reason, if the subject is not established, then the reason is faulty,

original: der yang gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der yang gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is not concomitant with it.

original: grub pa la sgrub pa'i skyon ni rjes su dpag pas grub pa la yin te /
analyzed: grub pa la sgrub pa'i skyon ni rjes su dpag pas grub pa la yin te /
translated: The fault of establishing what is already established is in the case of an inference that establishes what is already established.

original: de ni phyogs kyi skyon nyid do //
analyzed: de ni phyogs kyi skyon nyid do //
translated: That is a fault of the thesis itself.

original: de'i phyir rang nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa las grub pa ni gzhan la ltos nas phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa las grub pa ni gzhan la ltos nas phyogs yin no //
translated: Therefore, what is established by one's own inference is a thesis in dependence on others.

original: lung gis grub pa ni phyogs ma yin te /
analyzed: lung gis grub pa ni phyogs ma yin te /
translated: What is established by scripture is not a thesis.

original: gal te mngon sum gyis grub pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyi phyogs nyid ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gyis grub pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyi phyogs nyid ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the specifically characterized object established by perception is not a fault of the reason,

original: lung gis grub pa la ji ltar lung gi yul ni spyi yin la /
analyzed: lung gis grub pa la ji ltar lung gi yul ni spyi yin la /
translated: how can what is established by scripture be the domain of scripture?

original: spyis kyang rjes su 'gro ba yod pa yin pas de ji ltar phyogs kyi skyon ni rjes su yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyis kyang rjes su 'gro ba yod pa yin pas de ji ltar phyogs kyi skyon ni rjes su yin no zhe na /
translated: Since the reason is also pervaded by the probandum, how can the fault of the reason be a fault of the thesis?

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ma yin nam gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyis ni phyogs nyid kyi skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ma yin nam gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyis ni phyogs nyid kyi skyon ma yin no //
translated: Isn‚Äôt this precisely what we are saying? The fault of the reason is not a fault of the thesis.

original: 'o na ci zhe na de tsam las gyur pa nyid do 'di la yang de tsam las gyur pa ni yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na de tsam las gyur pa nyid do 'di la yang de tsam las gyur pa ni yod pa nyid do //
translated: Well then, what is it? It is just that. In this case, it is just that.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te lung gis de grub na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te lung gis de grub na //
translated: If it is established by scripture,

original: gtan tshigs kyis ni ci zhig dgos //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis ni ci zhig dgos //
translated: what need is there for a reason?

original: lung gis grub pa min na ni //
analyzed: lung gis grub pa min na ni //
translated: If it is not established by scripture,

original: ci ltar lung gis grub ces bya //
analyzed: ci ltar lung gis grub ces bya //
translated: how is it established by scripture?

original: 'on te gzhan ma grub kyang rang nyid ni lung las grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan ma grub kyang rang nyid ni lung las grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is not established for others, it is established for oneself by scripture.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is also not so.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te lung ni tshad yin na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te lung ni tshad yin na //
translated: If scripture is valid cognition,

original: pha rol la yang grub pa nyid //
analyzed: pha rol la yang grub pa nyid //
translated: it is established for the opponent.

original: de ste lung ni tshad min na //
analyzed: de ste lung ni tshad min na //
translated: If scripture is not valid cognition,

original: rang nyid la yang ma grub nyid //
analyzed: rang nyid la yang ma grub nyid //
translated: it is not established even for oneself.

original: de phyir rang la @169b rjes su dpag pa nyid phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de phyir rang la @169b rjes su dpag pa nyid phyogs yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is only inference that is the logical reason.

original: gal te rang nyid la mngon sum gyis grub pa'i me yang phyogs gzhan la ci ste ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rang nyid la mngon sum gyis grub pa'i me yang phyogs gzhan la ci ste ma yin zhe na /
translated: If fire is established by perception for oneself, why is it not so for the other party?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: It is not so.

original: rang bzhin des phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin des phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nature of the reason, it is not the case.

original: de ni spyi'i tshul gyis phyogs yin gyi khyad par gyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni spyi'i tshul gyis phyogs yin gyi khyad par gyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the logical reason by way of the general rule, but not by way of the particular rule.

original: rang nyid gzhan gyis ni de mngon sum gyis grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid gzhan gyis ni de mngon sum gyis grub pa ma yin no //
translated: For the other party, it is not established by perception.

original: des na mngon sum gyis grub pa la rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyis grub pa la rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is established that where there is establishment by perception, there is no inference.

original: gal te de lta na ni /
analyzed: gal te de lta na ni /
translated: If that is so,

original: 'di ltag rmen bsal ba na mig 'bras 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltag rmen bsal ba na mig 'bras 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: then the eye would appear when the eyelid is removed.

original: gal te mngon sum gyis grub pa la la phyogs med na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gyis grub pa la la phyogs med na /
translated: If there is no logical reason for the one for whom fire is established by perception,

original: de'i tshe nges ma grub pa la shin tu yang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe nges ma grub pa la shin tu yang med par 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be even more so for the one for whom it is not established.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because inference is preceded by perception.

original: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa'i yul yang mngon sum yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ci ltar phyogs la mngon sum gyis gnod par 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa'i yul yang mngon sum yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ci ltar phyogs la mngon sum gyis gnod par 'gyur /
translated: In the same way, the object of inference is not existent, so how can it be contradicted by perception?

original: gnod pa zhes bya ba don 'jig par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod pa zhes bya ba don 'jig par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúContradiction‚Äù does not mean the destruction of the object.

original: 'on kyang med do zhes shes par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang med do zhes shes par byed pa yin no //
translated: But it does mean that the object is known to be nonexistent.

original: de la 'gag pa gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad ni ma dmigs pa las yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la 'gag pa gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad ni ma dmigs pa las yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And in that case, since all objects that cease are due to nonapprehension,

original: mi dmigs par gnod par byed pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas gnod pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs par gnod par byed pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas gnod pa nyid do //
translated: the object of inference is contradicted by nonapprehension.

original: de skad du med pa ni de'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de skad du med pa ni de'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that nonexistence is not the object of inference,

original: bshad pa rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin no zhes gang brjod pa de la spyi'i yul la ni mngon sum du 'gro ba can ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bshad pa rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin no zhes gang brjod pa de la spyi'i yul la ni mngon sum du 'gro ba can ma yin gyi /
translated: we reply that we have already said that inference is preceded by perception.

original: 'on kyang me la sogs pa'i spyi bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa der de'i gsal ba'i yul can gyis mngon sum med na rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang me la sogs pa'i spyi bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa der de'i gsal ba'i yul can gyis mngon sum med na rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: But in the case of the object to be established, the universal such as fire, if there is no perception of the particular of that universal, inference does not operate.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni de'i gsal ba la mngon sum 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni de'i gsal ba la mngon sum 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For inference is preceded by the operation of perception of the particular.

original: gal te spyi la mngon sum 'jug na ni der rjes su dpag pas ci bya /
analyzed: gal te spyi la mngon sum 'jug na ni der rjes su dpag pas ci bya /
translated: If perception operates on the universal, what use is there for inference?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pas 'grub pa na spyi'i rang bzhin la brten par 'gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pas 'grub pa na spyi'i rang bzhin la brten par 'gyur pa yin te /
translated: When the particular is established by inference, it becomes based on the universal.

original: khyad par du ma rtogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kho na spyi yin no //
analyzed: khyad par du ma rtogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kho na spyi yin no //
translated: The particular alone, which is not understood as a universal, is the universal.

original: des na mngon sum gyi yul la rjes su dpog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don kyang rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa ni mngon sum nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyi yul la rjes su dpog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don kyang rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa ni mngon sum nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of ‚Äúinference does not operate on the object of perception‚Äù is that what is understood by inference is not perception itself.

original: des na de ni mngon sum gyis mi rtogs so //
analyzed: des na de ni mngon sum gyis mi rtogs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not understood by perception.

original: me ni tshang bang la sogs par mngon sum gyis @170a * //
analyzed: me ni tshang bang la sogs par mngon sum gyis @170a * //
translated: Fire is directly perceived in a kitchen, etc.

original: rtogs pa nyid do phyogs mngon sum gyis gnod pa bya ba 'dir yang don 'di nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid do phyogs mngon sum gyis gnod pa bya ba 'dir yang don 'di nyid do //
translated: The same point is being made here, that the position is undermined by direct perception.

original: de las bzlog pa'i bsam pa la mngon sum zhugs pa'i phyir gang la gsal ba med pa der na spyi mi srid pa nyid do //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i bsam pa la mngon sum zhugs pa'i phyir gang la gsal ba med pa der na spyi mi srid pa nyid do //
translated: Since the intention is to reverse that, it is impossible for there to be a universal where there is no manifestation.

original: spyi ni gsal bas gsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi ni gsal bas gsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a universal is manifested by a manifestation.

original: gzhan yang / sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid bkag pa nyid phyogs yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang / sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid bkag pa nyid phyogs yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the statement ‚ÄúSound is not to be heard‚Äù is the position that is the mere negation of its intrinsic identity.

original: bkag pa bzlog pa yang yul gang bkag pa de nyid kyi sgo nas bzlog pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bkag pa bzlog pa yang yul gang bkag pa de nyid kyi sgo nas bzlog pa yin gyi /
translated: The reversal of a negation is also a reversal that is made in terms of the very object that is negated.

original: gzhan gyis ni ma yin te gzhan ni de dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin te gzhan ni de dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not made in terms of anything else, because something else is not in contradiction with it.

original: gal te mngon sum rjes su dpag pas gsal bar ci ltar dogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum rjes su dpag pas gsal bar ci ltar dogs par 'gyur te /
translated: How could there be any doubt that direct perception and inference manifest it?

original: de'i rjes su dpag pa sgra'i yul can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rjes su dpag pa sgra'i yul can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because inference is not the domain of verbal expression.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sel bar byed pa ma 'brel pa brjod pa yin pas na zlog par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sel bar byed pa ma 'brel pa brjod pa yin pas na zlog par byed do //
translated: But we reply that this is a non sequitur, since it is the very reason that is not related to the proposition that is being expressed.

original: yang na mthong ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu zhen pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: yang na mthong ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu zhen pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: Or else, there is no fault, because the object that is seen and the object that is imagined are the same.

original: chos can grub pa sgrub pa ni phyogs kyi skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can grub pa sgrub pa ni phyogs kyi skyon ma yin te /
translated: The establishment of the subject is not a fault of the proposition,

original: der gtan tshigs nyis skyon can du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der gtan tshigs nyis skyon can du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be a fault of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni phyogs kyi skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni phyogs kyi skyon ma yin te /
translated: What is a fault of the reason is not a fault of the proposition,

original: de'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin pa nyid kyis na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kho nas sel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin pa nyid kyis na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kho nas sel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is eliminated by the very fact that it is a fault of the reason, since it is the definition of a reason.

original: gtan tshigs kyis bsam pa ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang bsal bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis bsam pa ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang bsal bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the reason is not to be eliminated by the definition of the proposition,

original: don med pa'i phyir dang yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med pa'i phyir dang yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is meaningless and not the domain.

original: de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni /
translated: This is explained:

original: rgyu sogs pa mtshan nyid bsal bya la //
analyzed: rgyu sogs pa mtshan nyid bsal bya la //
translated: The definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate other faults.üîΩIn this way, the definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate the fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion.

original: ltos pa med par ma khyab dang // ldog pa dag ni spang bya'i phyir //
analyzed: ltos pa med par ma khyab dang // ldog pa dag ni spang bya'i phyir //
translated: The fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion are eliminated by the definition of the reason and the definition of the example.

original: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
translated: The definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate other faults.üîΩIn this way, the definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate the fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis bsal ba nyes pa gzhag ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis bsal ba nyes pa gzhag ste /
translated: The fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion are eliminated by the definition of the reason and the definition of the example.

original: nyes pa gzhan spang ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan spang ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: The definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate other faults.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid mtha' dag ma khyab pa dang ldog pa spang bar bya ba'i don du yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid mtha' dag ma khyab pa dang ldog pa spang bar bya ba'i don du yin no //
translated: In this way, the definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate the fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion.üîΩThe fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion are eliminated by the definition of the reason and the definition of the example.üîΩThe definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate other faults.üîΩIn this way, the definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate the fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion.

original: mtshan nyid gzhan gyis bsal ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni ma spangs kyang mtshan nyid ma khyab pa dang / ha cang khyab par 'gyur ba yin pas mtshan nyid de tsam yin mod /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gzhan gyis bsal ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni ma spangs kyang mtshan nyid ma khyab pa dang / ha cang khyab par 'gyur ba yin pas mtshan nyid de tsam yin mod /
translated: The fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion are eliminated by the definition of the reason and the definition of the example.

original: gzhan gyis ci bya /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ci bya /
translated: The definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate other faults.üîΩIn this way, the definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate the fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion.üîΩThe fault of overpervasion and the fault of nonpervasion are eliminated by the definition of the reason and the definition of the example.üîΩThe definition of the thesis is stated in order to eliminate other faults.

original: gang gi don du de byas pa de ni gzhan gyis spang ba'i phyir rang nyid smos pa ni don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi don du de byas pa de ni gzhan gyis spang ba'i phyir rang nyid smos pa ni don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the definition of the

original: 'o na ma khyab pa dang ldog pa de gang gis sel ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ma khyab pa dang ldog pa de gang gis sel ce na /
translated: Now, what is the pervasion and the counter-correlate of that?

original: 'dir smos pa /
analyzed: 'dir smos pa /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: rang nyid tshig phrad @170b ngo bo'i sgra //üîΩma bsal ba dang bcas pa dang // ldog pa sel bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: rang nyid tshig phrad @170b ngo bo'i sgra // ma bsal ba dang bcas pa dang // ldog pa sel bar byed pa yin //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is the expression of the nature of the term.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is the expression of the counter-correlate.

original: 'dod sgra khyab med sel bar byed //
analyzed: 'dod sgra khyab med sel bar byed //
translated: The word ‚Äúdesire‚Äù is the expression of the non-pervasion.

original: 'di tsam gyis mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis ci dgos /
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis ci dgos /
translated: Since this much completely fulfills the definition, what is the use of anything else?

original: gal te rang nyid ces ma byas pa ni bstan bcos pa'i 'dod pa yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rang nyid ces ma byas pa ni bstan bcos pa'i 'dod pa yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If ‚Äúitself‚Äù is not used, then it would follow that even the assertion of the author of the treatise would be established.

original: tshig phrad ma byas na ni yang ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan par 'gyur la /
analyzed: tshig phrad ma byas na ni yang ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan par 'gyur la /
translated: If ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not used, then it would be taught that the thesis is established by what is not established.

original: rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ma byas na ni ma grub pa'i chos can phyogs su thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ma byas na ni ma grub pa'i chos can phyogs su thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If ‚Äúby its own nature‚Äù is not used, then it would follow that the unestablished subject is the position.

original: de las gzhan pa'i skyon ni med pas na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i skyon ni med pas na /
translated: Since there are no other faults than these,

original: de'i don du rang ni nyid smos pa don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i don du rang ni nyid smos pa don med par 'gyur te /
translated: it would be pointless to state ‚Äúitself‚Äù for that purpose.

original: nyes pa ma yin pa'i spong ba'i don can du 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyes pa ma yin pa'i spong ba'i don can du 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would have the meaning of an exclusion that is not a fault.

original: 'o na ni ci'i phyir ma bsal bas smos /
analyzed: 'o na ni ci'i phyir ma bsal bas smos /
translated: But why is it not excluded?

original: gal te bsal ba yang 'ga' zhig der phyogs su byed na gtan tshigs kyi skyon nyid du 'gyur bas de nyid kyis bzlog pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te bsal ba yang 'ga' zhig der phyogs su byed na gtan tshigs kyi skyon nyid du 'gyur bas de nyid kyis bzlog pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If it were excluded, and if something were to be taken as the subject, then there would be the fault of the reason, and so it is excluded by that.

original: ma bsal ba'i tshig dang lhan cig smos pa ni ldog pa 'gog par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: ma bsal ba'i tshig dang lhan cig smos pa ni ldog pa 'gog par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bsam pa yin no //
translated: The idea is that when it is stated together with the word ‚Äúnot excluded,‚Äù it negates the exclusion.

original: ma bsal pa'i tshig med par ni ldog pa bsal bar nus pa ma yin no //üîΩnyes pa de ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kho nas bkag pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ma bsal pa'i tshig med par ni ldog pa bsal bar nus pa ma yin no // nyes pa de ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kho nas bkag pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Without the word ‚Äúnot excluded,‚Äù the exclusion cannot be stated.üîΩThat fault is refuted just by the definition of the reason.

original: de ni phyogs tsam las 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni phyogs tsam las 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: That is not so, because it would follow that it is merely a position.

original: de ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon ma yin no //
translated: That is not a fault of the reason.

original: gal te 'dod pa yang bsal ba yin na ;
analyzed: gal te 'dod pa yang bsal ba yin na ;
translated: If the thesis is also excluded,

original: phyogs ma yin na 'o na ci'i phyir 'dod pa smos shen /
analyzed: phyogs ma yin na 'o na ci'i phyir 'dod pa smos shen /
translated: then why is the thesis stated if it is not a position?

original: bshad pa / 'dod sgras khyab med sel ba yin //
analyzed: bshad pa / 'dod sgras khyab med sel ba yin //
translated: The response: The term ‚Äúdesire‚Äù eliminates nonpervasion.

original: bsal ba nyid khyab par 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsal ba nyid khyab par 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not asserted that what is eliminated is pervasion,

original: ma bsal ba yang khyab pa'i yul du srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bsal ba yang khyab pa'i yul du srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is possible that what is not eliminated is a domain of pervasion.

original: yang na 'dod sgras khyab med sel ba yin zhes bshad pa'i phyir khyab pa'i don du yin no ;
analyzed: yang na 'dod sgras khyab med sel ba yin zhes bshad pa'i phyir khyab pa'i don du yin no ;
translated: Or, because it is explained that the term ‚Äúdesire‚Äù eliminates nonpervasion, it has the meaning of pervasion.

original: / des nam bsal ba yang khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: / des nam bsal ba yang khyab pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, what is eliminated is also pervasion.

original: des smras pa ni ma bsal ba dang bcas pa dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des smras pa ni ma bsal ba dang bcas pa dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: What is said by that is ‚Äúthose that are not eliminated.‚Äù

original: gal te ma bsal ba'i tshig ma byas pa ni 'dod pa smos pas ni de yang khyab par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te ma bsal ba'i tshig ma byas pa ni 'dod pa smos pas ni de yang khyab par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: If the word ‚Äúnot eliminated‚Äù is not produced, then that is also pervasion that occurs through the mention of desire.

original: ma bsal ba'i tshig dang lhan cig yin na srid par gal 'gyur /
analyzed: ma bsal ba'i tshig dang lhan cig yin na srid par gal 'gyur /
translated: If it is together with the word ‚Äúnot eliminated,‚Äù what would be the point?

original: des na gal te bstan bcos las mthong ba'i don yang bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: des na gal te bstan bcos las mthong ba'i don yang bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the object seen in the treatise is also the probandum,

original: de rang nyid kyi tshigs dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de tsam gyis rtogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis ci bya /
analyzed: de rang nyid kyi tshigs dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de tsam gyis rtogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis ci bya /
translated: then because that is understood merely through its own definition, what would be the point of another?

original: de la / bsgrub byar khas blangs phyogs mtshan nyid //
analyzed: de la / bsgrub byar khas blangs phyogs mtshan nyid //
translated: that which is to be established.

original: de rnams la ni phyogs med nyid //üîΩbsal ba gnod dang lhag ma la //üîΩmtshan @171a * //
analyzed: de rnams la ni phyogs med nyid // bsal ba gnod dang lhag ma la // mtshan @171a * //
translated: They do not have a proposition.üîΩBecause the definition does not apply

original: nyid 'jug pa med phyir ro //
analyzed: nyid 'jug pa med phyir ro //
translated: to the established, the contradictory, and the remainder.

original: 'dir ni de kho na'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni de kho na'i don 'di yin te /
translated: Here this is the meaning of reality:

original: bsgrub par bya ba khas blangs pa phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba khas blangs pa phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The definition of a proposition is that which is to be established.

original: bsal ba la sogs pa dag kyang khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir de dag kyang phyogs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bsal ba la sogs pa dag kyang khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir de dag kyang phyogs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the established, the contradictory, and the remainder are also propositions because they are accepted, then why are they not mentioned?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: bsal ba gnod pa'i phyir dang / grub pa la sogs pa lhag ma la mtshan nyid mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsal ba gnod pa'i phyir dang / grub pa la sogs pa lhag ma la mtshan nyid mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the established is contradictory and because the definition does not apply to the remainder, such as the established.

original: 'dod pa nyid la mtshan nyid 'jug gi / gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyid la mtshan nyid 'jug gi / gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: The definition applies only to what is accepted, not to what is not accepted.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di bstan pas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: 'di bstan pas ci zhig bya //
translated: What is the point of teaching that?

original: 'dir ci zhig bsgrub ces bsgrub pa bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ci zhig bsgrub ces bsgrub pa bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Here it is taught that what is to be established is that which is to be established.

original: ma grub sgrub byed min don brjod //
analyzed: ma grub sgrub byed min don brjod //
translated: The expression of the meaning of what is not established is not a proof.

original: rgol bas khas blangs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: rgol bas khas blangs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The opponent's acceptance is to be taken as the proposition.

original: zhes bsgrub par sngar nyid bstan zin pa yang ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes bsgrub par sngar nyid bstan zin pa yang ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not already taught that the proposition is to be established?

original: de nyid kyi mjug bsdu ba yin no zhes kyang rgyas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi mjug bsdu ba yin no zhes kyang rgyas pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not even extended that it is the conclusion of that.

original: gang zhig 'dir ni don 'di yin no zhes bstan zin pa de la mjug bsdu bas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gang zhig 'dir ni don 'di yin no zhes bstan zin pa de la mjug bsdu bas ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of a conclusion for one who has already taught that this is the meaning here?

original: gzhan dag smras pa ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid byas pa 'di ni rnam 'grel byed pa nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag smras pa ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid byas pa 'di ni rnam 'grel byed pa nyid kyis yin no //
translated: Others say that this definition of the thesis is by the author of the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrttika.

original: 'di ltar / rnam 'grel gyi mtshan nyid ni mdo rnams la mi rigs par brgal ba dang / de'i lan dang khyad par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar / rnam 'grel gyi mtshan nyid ni mdo rnams la mi rigs par brgal ba dang / de'i lan dang khyad par brjod pa yin te /
translated: For, the definition of the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrttika is the objection to the suÃÑtras, the response to that, and the statement of the distinction.

original: des na 'di ni khyad par brjod pa yin no zhes so //
analyzed: des na 'di ni khyad par brjod pa yin no zhes so //
translated: Therefore, this is the statement of the distinction.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa zhes bya bas ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pas ma bzlog pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa zhes bya bas ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pas ma bzlog pa nyid do //
translated: By the acceptance of the proposition, it is the desire to establish and the desire of the author of the treatise that is not refuted.

original: 'on te sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhes 'chad par byed pa yin te /üîΩsgrub byed nyid du 'dod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ma yin no zhe na de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhes 'chad par byed pa yin te / sgrub byed nyid du 'dod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ma yin no zhe na de yang ma yin te /
translated: Or is it that you are explaining that it is a proof?üîΩIf you assert that it is a proof, you do not assert that it is a probandum.

original: de ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yang 'dod pa kho na'o ;
analyzed: de ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yang 'dod pa kho na'o ;
translated: But that is not so, because you do assert that it is a probandum.

original: /'on te bsgrub par bya ba nyid kho nar khas blangs pa zhes nges par bzung ba yin na /
analyzed: /'on te bsgrub par bya ba nyid kho nar khas blangs pa zhes nges par bzung ba yin na /
translated: If you definitely assert that it is a probandum,

original: de'i tshe de sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs bzlog pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ma brjod kyang /üîΩ'dod pas khyab pa bsgrub byar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs bzlog pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ma brjod kyang / 'dod pas khyab pa bsgrub byar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is not a proof, because it is the opposite of that which is asserted to be a proof.üîΩTherefore, even though it is not stated, it is pervaded by being asserted.

original: 'o na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas len pa ni phyogs kho na'o zhen de lta yin na ;
analyzed: 'o na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas len pa ni phyogs kho na'o zhen de lta yin na ;
translated: If you say that the probandum is only the position,

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blangs pa phyogs pa nyid du gyur pas da ni gnyi ga mi srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blangs pa phyogs pa nyid du gyur pas da ni gnyi ga mi srid pa ma yin te /
translated: then since the proof is also asserted to be the probandum, it becomes the position. Therefore it is not the case that both are impossible.

original: 'di ming gcig gi dbang du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ming gcig gi dbang du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not from the point of view of a single name.

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang 'gyur te /
translated: And the desire of the author of the treatise would be fulfilled,

original: de la yang khas blangs pa yong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang khas blangs pa yong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the opponent would have accepted that.

original: 'on te @171b nye ba'i phyir rgol ba nyid kyis khas blangs pa thob bo zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te @171b nye ba'i phyir rgol ba nyid kyis khas blangs pa thob bo zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the opponent‚Äôs acceptance is established because of proximity,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang rgol bas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang rgol bas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the desire of the author of the treatise would be accepted by the opponent.

original: gzhan yang khyab pa'i rigs pas zhes ci ste khas mi len /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyab pa'i rigs pas zhes ci ste khas mi len /
translated: Moreover, why would you not accept the reason of pervasion?

original: blos byas pa'i nye ba bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blos byas pa'i nye ba bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because proximity is taught by the mind, and it exists in the desire of the author of the treatise.

original: nye ba nyid ni ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba nyid ni ma nges pa yin no //
translated: Proximity itself is indefinite.

original: bsal ba bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsal ba bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And it would be accepted that the exclusion is the probandum.

original: gal te bsal bas ni gnod pas bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te bsal bas ni gnod pas bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if you say that because the exclusion is harmed, there is no acceptance of the probandum,

original: bsgrub par 'os bas na bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par 'os bas na bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is suitable to be established, it is the probandum.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,üîΩbecause the exclusion is not the probandum.

original: de lta na ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bcas pa'i zhes bya ba 'di yang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bcas pa'i zhes bya ba 'di yang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the statement ‚ÄúThe probandum is taught by the thesis‚Äù would be free from fault.üîΩBy following the definition, one knows what is appropriate and what is inappropriate.

original: mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bas na ci ltar 'os pa dang me 'os pa rig / de'i phyir de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bas na ci ltar 'os pa dang me 'os pa rig / de'i phyir de ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, that is not so.

original: de lta na ni 'o na 'di ni rigs pa'i sgo nas phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na 'di ni rigs pa'i sgo nas phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: In that case, this is the definition of a position from the perspective of reasoning:

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba 'gal ba'i don gyis ma bsal ba ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba 'gal ba'i don gyis ma bsal ba ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúA position is that which is not excluded by the meaning of contradiction, which is asserted to be the probandum.‚Äù

original: de la 'di ltar brjod de /
analyzed: de la 'di ltar brjod de /
translated: Regarding that, it is said:

original: gal te rang gi tshig phrad dang ngo bo'i sgra dag ldog pa sel bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi tshig phrad dang ngo bo'i sgra dag ldog pa sel bar byed pa yin na /
translated: If the words ‚Äúown‚Äù and ‚Äúcontact‚Äù eliminate the negation,

original: rigs pa'i sgo la de med pa'i phyir ci ltar ldog pa bkag par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rigs pa'i sgo la de med pa'i phyir ci ltar ldog pa bkag par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then how could the negation be excluded, because that does not exist in the door of reasoning?

original: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says ‚Äúasserted as the probandum‚Äù and so on.

original: der yang bsal ba gnod pa'i phyir dang / lhag ma la phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'jug pa med pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: der yang bsal ba gnod pa'i phyir dang / lhag ma la phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'jug pa med pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: But there is no error, because the refutation refutes that, and because the remainder does not have the character of a part.

original: 'dod par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni byung bar gyur pa'i dus brjod pa nas sta'i rkyen nyid yin pas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba la mi 'jug pa na de nyid kyis de bzlog pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: 'dod par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni byung bar gyur pa'i dus brjod pa nas sta'i rkyen nyid yin pas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba la mi 'jug pa na de nyid kyis de bzlog pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: If it were said that the word ‚Äúdesire‚Äù refers to the time of occurrence, then the reason would be the probandum, because it would not be engaged in what is to be proven. But there is no error, because that very reason refutes that.

original: gal te de lta na 'dod pa smos pas sgrub par byed par bkod pa bsal bas /
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'dod pa smos pas sgrub par byed par bkod pa bsal bas /
translated: If that is so, then the word ‚Äúdesire‚Äù would be a proof, because it is a statement of what is to be established.

original: tshig phrad smos pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: tshig phrad smos pa don med do zhe na /
translated: So it is pointless to state the conjunction.

original: de ni bden te /üîΩrang nyid 'dod pa brjod pa yis //
analyzed: de ni bden te / rang nyid 'dod pa brjod pa yis //
translated: That is true,üîΩbut the meaning of the definite

original: nges bzung don ni rtogs na yang //
analyzed: nges bzung don ni rtogs na yang //
translated: article is understood from the statement of one‚Äôs own desire.üîΩ  But it is explained in order to exclude other times,

original: byed ba'i mtha' dang 'brel pa'i phyir //üîΩdus gzhan bcad phyir bshad pa yin //
analyzed: byed ba'i mtha' dang 'brel pa'i phyir //üîΩdus gzhan bcad phyir bshad pa yin //
translated: because it is connected with the end of the action.

original: gal te gtso bor 'gyur ba'i byed pa po'i mtha' dang 'brel pa ma yin na ni rang nyid 'dod pa zhes bya bas dus gzhan gcod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gal te gtso bor 'gyur ba'i byed pa po'i mtha' dang 'brel pa ma yin na ni rang nyid 'dod pa zhes bya bas dus gzhan gcod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If the word ‚Äúdesire‚Äù were not related to the word ‚Äúagent,‚Äù which is the principal word, then it would exclude other times.

original: 'brel pa yin pa des na dus gzhan du 'dod pas yul du byas pa yang phyogs nyid du 'gyur ro //üîΩgal te de lta na ni rigs pa'i sgor yang de bzlog pa'i phyir tshig phrad smos @172a * //
analyzed: 'brel pa yin pa des na dus gzhan du 'dod pas yul du byas pa yang phyogs nyid du 'gyur ro // gal te de lta na ni rigs pa'i sgor yang de bzlog pa'i phyir tshig phrad smos @172a * //
translated: But since it is related to it, the object of desire becomes the very basis.

original: pa de bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: pa de bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the word ‚Äúdesire‚Äù would be used in the statement of the reason in the following syllogism:üîΩ‚ÄúThe subject, sound, is impermanent because of desiring to be produced.‚Äù

original: 'di la smras pa /
analyzed: 'di la smras pa /
translated: In response to this, we say:

original: 'dod rkyen 'di ni yan lag min //
analyzed: 'dod rkyen 'di ni yan lag min //
translated: This ‚Äúdesire‚Äù is not a part of the reason.

original: 'dod par gyur pa'i tshig dag la //
analyzed: 'dod par gyur pa'i tshig dag la //
translated: In the words that express the desire,

original: yan lag yin te de yis ni //
analyzed: yan lag yin te de yis ni //
translated: it is a part of the reason,

original: gtan tshigs ma grub la sogs 'gog / tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub la sogs 'gog / tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir //
translated: because it refutes the fallacies of the reason, such as its not being established.üîΩIn this Compendium of Valid Cognition,

original: bstan par bya ba ni phyogs yin no//
analyzed: bstan par bya ba ni phyogs yin no//
translated: the basis is the position.

original: ci ltar 'gyur ba zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'gyur ba zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'dod par gyur pa zhes byed pa'i mtha' gtsor 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dod par gyur pa zhes byed pa'i mtha' gtsor 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúdesire‚Äù becomes the principal word at the end.

original: des na dus gzhan dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dus gzhan dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is related to another time.

original: dper na lhas byin 'ongs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lhas byin 'ongs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúWhen Devadatta comes, I will see him.‚Äù

original: des na nges par bzung bas dus gzhan du 'dod pa gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na nges par bzung bas dus gzhan du 'dod pa gcod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, by specifying, the desire for another time is eliminated.

original: 'dod rkyen 'dir ni yan lag min //
analyzed: 'dod rkyen 'dir ni yan lag min //
translated: In this desire, the condition is not a part.

original: des na 'dod 'gyur tshig dag la //
analyzed: des na 'dod 'gyur tshig dag la //
translated: Therefore, in the words of desire,

original: yan lag nyid yin zhes bya ba'i bzlog pa dang 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: yan lag nyid yin zhes bya ba'i bzlog pa dang 'brel pa yin te /
translated: it is connected with the negation ‚Äúis not.‚Äù

original: 'dod par gyur pa'i tshe gang dag ni yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod par gyur pa'i tshe gang dag ni yan lag ma yin te /
translated: When there is desire, that which is not a part,

original: gtso bo nyid yin pa 'dir yan lag yin no zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo nyid yin pa 'dir yan lag yin no zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o //
translated: which is the principal itself, should be explained as being a part here.

original: yang na tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir ni 'byung ba'i dus su sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin la /
analyzed: yang na tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir ni 'byung ba'i dus su sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin la /
translated: Or, in this Compendium of Valid Cognition, at the time of arising, it is not a part of the proof,

original: rigs pa'i sgor 'dod par byed pa'i tshig la ni yan lag nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: rigs pa'i sgor 'dod par byed pa'i tshig la ni yan lag nyid yin pas na /
translated: but in the words of desire at the door of reasoning, it is itself a part.

original: sta'i rkyen des gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa 'gog pa nyid do //
analyzed: sta'i rkyen des gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa 'gog pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, by that condition of ‚Äúdesire,‚Äù the unestablished reason and so on are refuted.

original: des na 'dir tshig phrad ma smos so //
analyzed: des na 'dir tshig phrad ma smos so //
translated: Thus, here the conjunction is not mentioned.

original: de'i phyir chos can bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ni /
translated: Therefore, the subject would become that which is to be established.üîΩ

original: rang nyid smos pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rang nyid smos pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is not stated by itself because it would be the probandum.

original: bstan bcos la 'dod pas 'jug pa'i don kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos la 'dod pas 'jug pa'i don kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not the purpose of the treatise to engage in that,

original: sngar bshad pa'i rigs pa nyid las so //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rigs pa nyid las so //
translated: because it is just the reasoning explained earlier.

original: rjod byed min phyir yang mi rigs //
analyzed: rjod byed min phyir yang mi rigs //
translated: It is also not tenable because it is not the expressed meaning,

original: de rang bdag nyid kyis 'dod de //üîΩbstan bcos kun la ltos med par //
analyzed: de rang bdag nyid kyis 'dod de // bstan bcos kun la ltos med par //
translated: because that is asserted by its own nature.

original: de 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya nyid /
analyzed: de 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya nyid /
translated: That assertion is the probandum,

original: bstan bcos gang 'ga' zhig tu bdag nyid gnas par bya ba dang / rang nyid rab tu grub pa ni chos can yin no zhes bya bar ni rang nyid smos pas rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad de /
analyzed: bstan bcos gang 'ga' zhig tu bdag nyid gnas par bya ba dang / rang nyid rab tu grub pa ni chos can yin no zhes bya bar ni rang nyid smos pas rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad de /
translated: because it is not tenable that any treatise states ‚Äúthe basis of attributes is that which is established by itself and abides by itself‚Äù because it is not expressed by itself.

original: de rang bdag nyid kyi 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de rang bdag nyid kyi 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: That is asserted by its own nature,

original: 'chad pa po gzhan gyi 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'chad pa po gzhan gyi 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not asserted by another commentator.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos mtha' dag la me ltos par de'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos mtha' dag la me ltos par de'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya nyid do //
translated: Therefore, that assertion is the probandum, because it does not rely on any treatise.

original: des na mi 'dod dang 'brel ba'i //
analyzed: des na mi 'dod dang 'brel ba'i //
translated: Therefore, you should not associate with those you do not like.üîΩ

original: 'dod pa la yang gnod pa ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa la yang gnod pa ni //
translated: Therefore, even though there is a contradiction with what the author of the treatise wishes to prove,üîΩthere is no contradiction with the way things really are.

original: ci ltar sgrub la gnod med phyir //
analyzed: ci ltar sgrub la gnod med phyir //
translated: Since there is no contradiction with the way things really are,

original: phyogs dang gtan tshigs skyon med nyid //
analyzed: phyogs dang gtan tshigs skyon med nyid //
translated: the position and reason are faultless.

original: des na 'ga' zhig bsgrub pa na //
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig bsgrub pa na //
translated: Therefore, when one proves something in a certain way,

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa dang 'brel pa la gnod kyang /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa dang 'brel pa la gnod kyang /
translated: even though there is a contradiction with what the author of the treatise wishes to prove,

original: @172b bsgrub bya ci lta ba la gnod pa med ba'i phyir phyogs dang gtan tshigs skyon med pa yin no //
analyzed: @172b bsgrub bya ci lta ba la gnod pa med ba'i phyir phyogs dang gtan tshigs skyon med pa yin no //
translated: there is no contradiction with the way things really are. Therefore, the position and reason are faultless.

original: de lta ma yin pa'i skyon la ni sun 'byin pa brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa'i skyon la ni sun 'byin pa brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: If it were otherwise, the fault would not be stated.

original: gal te bstan bcos byed pa 'dod pa la gnod na bsgrub pa des ci zhig bya ste nus pa nyams pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos byed pa 'dod pa la gnod na bsgrub pa des ci zhig bya ste nus pa nyams pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If there is a contradiction with what the author of the treatise wishes to prove, what is the use of that proof? Because it loses its power.

original: 'di la ni bstan bcos la lar 'gal zhes brjod zin to //üîΩgzhan yang / thams cad rlag par 'gyur ba las //
analyzed: 'di la ni bstan bcos la lar 'gal zhes brjod zin to // gzhan yang / thams cad rlag par 'gyur ba las //
translated: In this regard, it has already been said that there is a contradiction in some treatises.üîΩMoreover,üîΩit is better to obtain something

original: cung zad cig ni thob pa bla //üîΩbum pa khron par lhung bas na //
analyzed: cung zad cig ni thob pa bla // bum pa khron par lhung bas na //
translated: than to lose everything.üîΩWhen a pot falls into a well,

original: thag pa'ang skyur bar rigs ma yin //
analyzed: thag pa'ang skyur bar rigs ma yin //
translated: it is not right to throw away the rope.

original: de'i phyir / rang nyid tshig phrad ngo bo'i sgra //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rang nyid tshig phrad ngo bo'i sgra //
translated: The words that are the basis of the compound

original: ma bsal ba dang bcas pa dag / ldog pa la ni gnod byed yin //
analyzed: ma bsal ba dang bcas pa dag / ldog pa la ni gnod byed yin //
translated: are not eliminated, and this is a fault in the negation.

original: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation.

original: de las ma bsal ba'i tshig lus pas de 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: de las ma bsal ba'i tshig lus pas de 'chad pa ni /
translated: The words that are not eliminated are left out, and so they are explained.

original: khas blangs de yang tshad ma ni //
analyzed: khas blangs de yang tshad ma ni //
translated: And that assertion is accepted

original: dag gis dgag med yin par 'dod //
analyzed: dag gis dgag med yin par 'dod //
translated: as not being refuted by valid cognition.

original: 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na /üîΩ// / bam po lnga pa /
analyzed: 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na / // / bam po lnga pa /
translated: What is the logic here?

original: gtan tshigs the tshom la brjod phyir //
analyzed: gtan tshigs the tshom la brjod phyir //
translated: Because the reason is stated in doubt,

original: tshad ma gcig gis phyin ci log tu bsgrubs bas na de med na ni tshad ma gtan tshigs kyi rten ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma gcig gis phyin ci log tu bsgrubs bas na de med na ni tshad ma gtan tshigs kyi rten ma yin no //
translated: if one valid cognition proves the opposite, then the absence of that is not the basis of the reason.

original: des smras pa ni /
analyzed: des smras pa ni /
translated: He says:

original: bsal ba gtan tshigs rten ma yin //
analyzed: bsal ba gtan tshigs rten ma yin //
translated: The elimination is not the basis of the reason.

original: gal te sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yod na ci'i phyir phyogs ma yin /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yod na ci'i phyir phyogs ma yin /
translated: If there is a reason that proves it, why is it not the position?

original: de ste ma yin na de'i tshe gtan tshigs kyi nyes par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de ste ma yin na de'i tshe gtan tshigs kyi nyes par 'gyur bas /
translated: If it is not, then it is a fault of the reason.

original: ma bsal ba smos pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: ma bsal ba smos pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: So what is the point of mentioning the non-elimination?

original: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang phyogs kyi nyes pas dang po nyid du bsal bas na gtan tshigs kyi skyon la ci nas kyang mi ltos par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang phyogs kyi nyes pas dang po nyid du bsal bas na gtan tshigs kyi skyon la ci nas kyang mi ltos par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yin no //
translated: This is true, but the fault of the position is removed at the very outset, so that the fault of the reason is not at all relevant.

original: des na 'di ni phyogs kyi skyon nyid de /
analyzed: des na 'di ni phyogs kyi skyon nyid de /
translated: Therefore, this is a fault of the position,

original: de tsam la 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam la 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is reduced to that alone.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis bsal ba la ni sgrub par byed pa 'ga' zhig la ltos pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis bsal ba la ni sgrub par byed pa 'ga' zhig la ltos pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: When something is refuted by perception and inference, it is not necessary to rely on any proof at all.

original: de lta yin na sgrub par byed pa de la yang yid ches pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na sgrub par byed pa de la yang yid ches pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then there would be no confidence in that proof.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi yul ni the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi yul ni the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the domain of the reason is doubt.

original: the tshom gyis ni sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa tsam zhig mtshon pa yin gyi /
analyzed: the tshom gyis ni sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa tsam zhig mtshon pa yin gyi /
translated: Doubt merely indicates the absence of a valid cognition that proves or refutes.

original: the tshom mngon du gyur pa nyid ni ma yin te ;
analyzed: the tshom mngon du gyur pa nyid ni ma yin te ;
translated: It is not the actual arising of doubt.

original: the tshom mngon du ma gyur kyang rjes su dpag pa la glo bur du ma rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: the tshom mngon du ma gyur kyang rjes su dpag pa la glo bur du ma rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: Even though doubt is not manifest, it is not understood suddenly in inference.

original: yang na gang la the tshom bskyed par nus pa yod pa der gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na gang la the tshom bskyed par nus pa yod pa der gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Or, that with respect to which one is able to generate doubt is the domain of the reason,

original: sgrub pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dag gis rang gi ngo bo dang de las bzlog pa dag tu nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dag gis rang gi ngo bo dang de las bzlog pa dag tu nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is not ascertained either as its own nature or as the opposite of that by means of valid knowledge that establishes or invalidates it.

original: @173a * // gal te tshad ma dag gis mi gnod pa gtan tshigs brjod pa'i yul yin na de lta na gnod pa rnam gnyis yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: @173a * // gal te tshad ma dag gis mi gnod pa gtan tshigs brjod pa'i yul yin na de lta na gnod pa rnam gnyis yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the domain of the reason is that with respect to which there is no invalidation by valid knowledge, then since there are two kinds of invalidation,

original: ci ltar slob dpon gyis rnam pa bzhir bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar slob dpon gyis rnam pa bzhir bstan zhe na /
translated: why did the master Dharmottara teach four kinds?

original: 'dir brjod pa /üîΩrjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba yis //
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa / rjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba yis //
translated: Here he says:üîΩThat invalidation is explained as fourfold

original: gnod pa de ni rnam bzhir bshad //
analyzed: gnod pa de ni rnam bzhir bshad //
translated: by the division of inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i gnod pa ni rnam pa gsum du bstan pa bzhi pa ni mngon sum gyis gnod pa yin pa'i phyir gnod pa rnam pa bzhir bstan gyi gnod par byed pa'i gnod byed rnam pa gnyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i gnod pa ni rnam pa gsum du bstan pa bzhi pa ni mngon sum gyis gnod pa yin pa'i phyir gnod pa rnam pa bzhir bstan gyi gnod par byed pa'i gnod byed rnam pa gnyis ni ma yin no //
translated: The contradiction of inference is taught to be of three kinds. The fourth is the contradiction of direct perception. Thus, the contradiction of the reason is taught to be of four kinds, but the contradictor is of two kinds.

original: de lta na 'o na lud dang grags pa dag gis gnod pa yang rtags nyid las yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na lud dang grags pa dag gis gnod pa yang rtags nyid las yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then the contradiction of manure and fame would also be a reason,

original: de lta ma yin na rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: because otherwise it would not be a division of inference.

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: That is true,

original: 'di ltar de la khas blangs 'bras rtags te //
analyzed: 'di ltar de la khas blangs 'bras rtags te //
translated: but the reason of the result is accepted in that case,

original: 'gro la grags pa rang bzhin rtags //
analyzed: 'gro la grags pa rang bzhin rtags //
translated: and the reason of nature is famous in the world.

original: yid ches pa'i tshig ni 'bras bu dang mthun pa yin la /
analyzed: yid ches pa'i tshig ni 'bras bu dang mthun pa yin la /
translated: The words of a trustworthy person are consistent with the result.

original: grags pa ni rang bzhin dang mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: grags pa ni rang bzhin dang mthun pa yin no //
translated: And fame is consistent with the nature.

original: ci'i phyir rtags 'di dngos nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rtags 'di dngos nyid ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why are these reasons not the nature itself?üîΩIt is said:

original: bshad pa / yang dag nges ldan brjod 'dod pa //
analyzed: bshad pa / yang dag nges ldan brjod 'dod pa //
translated: The desire to speak is consistent with the nature.

original: bdag gzhan yid ches mtshungs pa yi //
analyzed: bdag gzhan yid ches mtshungs pa yi //
translated: The equality of trust in self and other

original: phyir na rang gi tshig dang ni //
analyzed: phyir na rang gi tshig dang ni //
translated: Therefore, my words

original: bstan bcos gcig tu bshad pa yin //
analyzed: bstan bcos gcig tu bshad pa yin //
translated: are explained as one treatise.

original: tshad mas grub pa'i yid ches pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa'i yid ches pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no one at all who has a mind that is convinced by a valid cognition,

original: pha rol po nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba ni thams cad mthong ba ma yin pas rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: pha rol po nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba ni thams cad mthong ba ma yin pas rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir te /
translated: because the opponent who is free from all faults is not seen by everyone, and so cannot be understood.

original: tha snyad 'chol bas rjes su dpag pa las kyang nges par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad 'chol bas rjes su dpag pa las kyang nges par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it is not possible to ascertain anything from a confused convention, nor from an inference.

original: des na thams cad med pas yid ches par khas blangs pa yid ches pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin pa'i phyir na gang mtshungs par bstan pa'i don du rang gi tshig dang lhan cig tu smos par byas so //
analyzed: des na thams cad med pas yid ches par khas blangs pa yid ches pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin pa'i phyir na gang mtshungs par bstan pa'i don du rang gi tshig dang lhan cig tu smos par byas so //
translated: Therefore, since everything is nonexistent, the acceptance of a conviction is a conviction, but not ultimately. Thus, in order to show that this is the same, I have made it together with my own words.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / de ltar bdag ni tshad min na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de ltar bdag ni tshad min na //
translated: Since I am not a valid cognition,

original: tshig 'di 'jug par mi 'gyur bar //
analyzed: tshig 'di 'jug par mi 'gyur bar //
translated: these words do not engage.

original: de bzhin bstan bcos grags don la //
analyzed: de bzhin bstan bcos grags don la //
translated: Thus, in the case of a treatise that is renowned,

original: der bstan min na dpyod pa yang //
analyzed: der bstan min na dpyod pa yang //
translated: if it is not taught there, it is not analyzed.

original: gal te bdag nyid tshad mar khas mi len na ni tshig mi 'jug pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid tshad mar khas mi len na ni tshig mi 'jug pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you do not accept that you yourself are a valid person, then it follows that your words are not engaged.

original: dper na smas pa thams cad brdzun yin no zhes ba ba la /
analyzed: dper na smas pa thams cad brdzun yin no zhes ba ba la /
translated: For example, if you say, ‚ÄúAll speech is false,‚Äù

original: gal te bdag gis ni thams cad brdzun nyi tshe brjod pa yin no zhes khyod kyis khas len pa yin na ni de'i tshig las ni rtogs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te bdag gis ni thams cad brdzun nyi tshe brjod pa yin no zhes khyod kyis khas len pa yin na ni de'i tshig las ni rtogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: if you accept that you yourself are speaking falsely, then your words are understood.

original: nga'i tshig las ni cung zad kyang bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nga'i tshig las ni cung zad kyang bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of your words is that ‚Äúnothing at all is to be done on the basis of my words.‚Äù

original: de lta na ni bdag nyid du kho bo cag ngal bar byas nas te /
analyzed: de lta na ni bdag nyid du kho bo cag ngal bar byas nas te /
translated: In that case, we would be exhausted trying to understand you,

original: don @173b de ni ma brjod kyang grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don @173b de ni ma brjod kyang grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that meaning would be established even if you did not say it.üîΩAlso, the words of a wise person who has a mind that is transformed by knowledge are clear.

original: gang yang mkhas pa'i rtogs pas bsgyur ba'i blo can gyis brjod pa de yang gsal ba nyid de ji skad du smra ba thams cad brdzun yin no zhes bya ba de ni 'gog min te /
analyzed: gang yang mkhas pa'i rtogs pas bsgyur ba'i blo can gyis brjod pa de yang gsal ba nyid de ji skad du smra ba thams cad brdzun yin no zhes bya ba de ni 'gog min te /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúAll speech is false,‚Äù that is not refuted,

original: gal te de yang 'gog na ni //
analyzed: gal te de yang 'gog na ni //
translated: because if that were refuted,

original: skabs kyi don mi 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: skabs kyi don mi 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: The meaning of the context is not established.

original: zhe'o // 'di ltar dus gsum 'gog pa la yang ni tshig 'di 'brel pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: zhe'o // 'di ltar dus gsum 'gog pa la yang ni tshig 'di 'brel pa nyid ma yin /
translated: In this way, the statement is not connected to the refutation of the three times.

original: tshig 'di tshad ma ma yin na /
analyzed: tshig 'di tshad ma ma yin na /
translated: If this statement is not valid cognition,

original: brkus nas bor bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: brkus nas bor bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: it is discarded as stolen.

original: gal te brjod pa thams cad brdzun pa yin pa de ltar bstan pa yin na rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba las mi 'thad pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te brjod pa thams cad brdzun pa yin pa de ltar bstan pa yin na rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba las mi 'thad pa nyid do //
translated: If all statements are false, then it is taught like that, but it is untenable due to contradicting one's own words.

original: tshig 'jug pas bdag nyid tshad mar gyur par khas blangs pa yin pa des na ji ltar de tshad ma ma yin par ston /
analyzed: tshig 'jug pas bdag nyid tshad mar gyur par khas blangs pa yin pa des na ji ltar de tshad ma ma yin par ston /
translated: By engaging in speech, one accepts being valid with respect to oneself. Therefore, how is it taught that one is not valid?

original: phyis 'gyod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is due to later regret,

original: de ltar na yang 'gal ba nyid de ma bstan pa nyid bla ste /
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'gal ba nyid de ma bstan pa nyid bla ste /
translated: in that case, it is still contradictory. It is better not to teach at all.

original: bdag nyid dub pas ci bya /
analyzed: bdag nyid dub pas ci bya /
translated: What is the use of exhausting oneself?

original: ma dpyad par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: ma dpyad par byas pa yin no //
translated: It is done without analysis.

original: 'di nyid skyon te brtags pa la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid skyon te brtags pa la sogs pa yin no //
translated: This itself is the fault of analysis and so on.

original: 'on te brdzun smra'o zhes bya ba 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te brdzun smra'o zhes bya ba 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is said that this statement it is false refutes the present and future,

original: de'i tshe yang brjod pa 'dis ci bya /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang brjod pa 'dis ci bya /
translated: What use is this expression at that time?

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni /
translated: And for that which will arise,

original: nyan pa nyid med pas ci'i don du brjod /
analyzed: nyan pa nyid med pas ci'i don du brjod /
translated: since there is no hearing, for whose sake is there expression?

original: dzab mkhan gyi dzab tshig dang 'dra bas skyon med do zhe na //
analyzed: dzab mkhan gyi dzab tshig dang 'dra bas skyon med do zhe na //
translated: If you say that there is no fault because it is like the mantra of a magician,

original: ma yin te rtsod pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te rtsod pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is not so, because it is a time of dispute.

original: rtsod pa'i don ni dngos po la gtan la phebs pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i don ni dngos po la gtan la phebs pa yin no //
translated: The point of dispute is the establishment of a thing.

original: des na de'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not that.

original: de bzhin du de khas ma blangs na bstan bcos las grags pa'i don la dpyod pa yang mi 'dzug pas na bstan bcos dang tshig dag ni mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du de khas ma blangs na bstan bcos las grags pa'i don la dpyod pa yang mi 'dzug pas na bstan bcos dang tshig dag ni mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: In the same way, if one does not accept that, then one does not engage in the analysis of the meaning known from the treatise. Therefore, the treatise and the words are the same.

original: mtshungs par bstan phyir bstan bcos de'i //
analyzed: mtshungs par bstan phyir bstan bcos de'i //
translated: Because of teaching similarity,

original: skabs rten nyid na gnod byed ces //
analyzed: skabs rten nyid na gnod byed ces //
translated: the treatise is harmed by just the support of the occasion.

original: don 'di bstan pa'i ched du 'di //
