original: 'di la ni mngon sum 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la ni mngon sum 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: And perception does not apply to this.

original: 'di ni bum pa la zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid 'gog pa gang yin pa de'i tshe yang grags pas bsal ba yin no zhes smras zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bum pa la zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid 'gog pa gang yin pa de'i tshe yang grags pas bsal ba yin no zhes smras zin to //
translated: When the word ‚Äúmoon‚Äù is refuted as expressing a pot, it is also said to be refuted by what is commonly acknowledged.

original: gal te de ltar 'di la sgra de'i don @179a * //
analyzed: gal te de ltar 'di la sgra de'i don @179a * //
translated: If that is so, then the meaning of that termüîΩ

original: du snang ba med do zhes brjod na ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: du snang ba med do zhes brjod na ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: If you say that the word does not appear to him as the referent of that word, then you are proving what is already established for us.

original: 'on te gzhan la snang ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan la snang ba ma yin /
translated: But if you say that it does not appear to others,

original: da lta yang ma yin /
analyzed: da lta yang ma yin /
translated: or that it does not appear now,

original: rung ba tsam yang ma yin no zhes brjod na ni /
analyzed: rung ba tsam yang ma yin no zhes brjod na ni /
translated: or that it is not merely suitable to appear,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ci ste mi srid de /
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ci ste mi srid de /
translated: Why is it not possible? Because it operates by mere desire.

original: yul dang dus gzhan du mi gzhan gyis sgra dang don dag rnam pa gzhan du brjod bya rjod byed du mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yul dang dus gzhan du mi gzhan gyis sgra dang don dag rnam pa gzhan du brjod bya rjod byed du mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: For other people in other places and times have seen other words and referents as the expressed and the expresser.

original: nges pa ga la yod /
analyzed: nges pa ga la yod /
translated: How can there be certainty?

original: rigs pa 'dis thams cad thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba nyid du mthong ba'i phyir nyes pa med do //
analyzed: rigs pa 'dis thams cad thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba nyid du mthong ba'i phyir nyes pa med do //
translated: This reasoning shows that everything is seen to be the expressed by everything. Therefore there is no fault.

original: grags pas gnod pa nyid kyis na //
analyzed: grags pas gnod pa nyid kyis na //
translated: Because of the contradiction with what is well known,

original: khyi sha zo zhes bya ba yi //üîΩdon 'di gang gis 'gog byed pa //
analyzed: khyi sha zo zhes bya ba yi // don 'di gang gis 'gog byed pa //
translated: the meaning of the words ‚Äúeat dog meat‚ÄùüîΩis blocked by someone.

original: de la rung ba nyid kyis gnod //üîΩgal te de nyid sha sogs kyi //
analyzed: de la rung ba nyid kyis gnod // gal te de nyid sha sogs kyi //
translated: That is contradicted by what is suitable.üîΩIf you say that the meaning of ‚Äúmeat‚Äù and so on

original: don 'di khyod la snang zhes ni //
analyzed: don 'di khyod la snang zhes ni //
translated: appears to you,

original: brjod na mngon sum gyis gnod par //
analyzed: brjod na mngon sum gyis gnod par //
translated: If it is expressed, it is contradicted by perception.

original: 'gyur gyi gzhan du ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gyur gyi gzhan du ga la 'gyur //
translated: How could it be otherwise?

original: 'dir mngon sum gyis gnod pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir mngon sum gyis gnod pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, there is no contradiction by perception.

original: grags pas gnod pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: grags pas gnod pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur grang na /
translated: It would be a contradiction by what is well-known,

original: de yang brda'i stobs kyis rung ba yin la /
analyzed: de yang brda'i stobs kyis rung ba yin la /
translated: but that is suitable by the power of convention.

original: rung ba ni khyi sha la sogs pa la yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rung ba ni khyi sha la sogs pa la yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not suitable even for dog meat, etc.

original: gal te brda gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten pa'i sgra gang yin pa de dag nyid la nges pa med pa 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te brda gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten pa'i sgra gang yin pa de dag nyid la nges pa med pa 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: If those worldly sounds that are dependent on other conventions have this uncertainty,

original: rig byed pa ngo bo nyid kyi don dang 'brel pa gang yin pa de dag yang nges pa med pa ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: rig byed pa ngo bo nyid kyi don dang 'brel pa gang yin pa de dag yang nges pa med pa ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could those of the Vedas, which are related to the meaning by nature, be uncertain?

original: tha snyad kyi don can gyi brda ni mthong ba'i yul nyid la rigs te /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi don can gyi brda ni mthong ba'i yul nyid la rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable that the convention for the meaning of a term is seen in the object itself,

original: dbang po las 'das pa la ni rtogs pa med pa'i phyir brda bya bar ci ltar nus /
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa la ni rtogs pa med pa'i phyir brda bya bar ci ltar nus /
translated: because there is no understanding of what is beyond the senses, so how can a convention be made?

original: lung tsam gcig pu skyabs yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lung tsam gcig pu skyabs yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the Vedas are the sole refuge,

original: rtogs pa phan tshun brten pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa phan tshun brten pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: There would be the fault of mutual dependence of the understanding.

original: brda gzhan du byed pa yang lung de'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brda gzhan du byed pa yang lung de'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: And the making of a different convention would be due to following that scripture.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: rig byed kyang ni rang bzhin gyis//
analyzed: rig byed kyang ni rang bzhin gyis//
translated: The Veda also is meaningless by nature.

original: don ldan 'di ni gang gis grub //üîΩder yang rmongs sdang 'jig sogs kyis //
analyzed: don ldan 'di ni gang gis grub // der yang rmongs sdang 'jig sogs kyis //
translated: How is this established?üîΩThere, the ignorant would make the convention

original: mi shes pa dag brda byed 'gyur //
analyzed: mi shes pa dag brda byed 'gyur //
translated: through delusion, hatred, destruction, and so on.

original: ji ltar gcig gis sreg byed la sogs pa dag la me la sogs pa'i ming 'dod pas byas pa de bzhin du khyi la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar gcig gis sreg byed la sogs pa dag la me la sogs pa'i ming 'dod pas byas pa de bzhin du khyi la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as one person makes the name ‚Äúfire‚Äù for what burns, and so on, out of desire, so it would be for dogs and so on.

original: don 'di ngo bo nyid kyis yin no zhes kyang mi 'grub ste ;
analyzed: don 'di ngo bo nyid kyis yin no zhes kyang mi 'grub ste ;
translated: This meaning is not established as being by nature.

original: don de ni 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid kyis 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don de ni 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid kyis 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that meaning is posited by following the world.

original: 'jig rten na ni /üîΩyul dang dus sogs dbye ba yis //
analyzed: 'jig rten na ni / yul dang dus sogs dbye ba yis //
translated: In the world,

original: sna tshogs 'gyur don mthong phyir te //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'gyur don mthong phyir te //
translated: one sees the meaning that changes

original: 'dir ni yul dang dus la sogs //
analyzed: 'dir ni yul dang dus la sogs //
translated: due to the divisions of place, time, and so on.üîΩHere, the meaning that pervades

original: khyab pa'i don yang nges ma yin //
analyzed: khyab pa'i don yang nges ma yin //
translated: is also not ascertained.

original: yul dang dus der yang res 'ga' //
analyzed: yul dang dus der yang res 'ga' //
translated: And in that place and time, it is possible that

original: mi shes pa nyid brda @179b byed pa'i nye bar ston pa srid do //
analyzed: mi shes pa nyid brda @179b byed pa'i nye bar ston pa srid do //
translated: the mere indication of the word is not understood.

original: nye bar ston pa brgyud pa tsam nyid na mun pa brgyud pa nyid do //
analyzed: nye bar ston pa brgyud pa tsam nyid na mun pa brgyud pa nyid do //
translated: If the indication is merely a succession, then the darkness is merely a succession.

original: des ni de'i mos pa bzlog pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: des ni de'i mos pa bzlog pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Therefore, in order to refute his belief in that,

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i don mthong ba nyid /
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i don mthong ba nyid /
translated: or in order to see a meaning beyond the senses,

original: sngon gyi don 'dzin par byed pa spangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngon gyi don 'dzin par byed pa spangs pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to avoid grasping at a previous meaning,

original: brda gzhan du byed par 'gyur bas 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: brda gzhan du byed par 'gyur bas 'gal ba med do //
translated: the word is used in a different way. There is no contradiction.

original: yang na / de la yang ni mngon sum gyis //
analyzed: yang na / de la yang ni mngon sum gyis //
translated: Moreover,

original: nges rtogs pa dang ldan min te //
analyzed: nges rtogs pa dang ldan min te //
translated: in that, there is no direct perceptionüîΩthat has the nature of ascertainment.

original: rjes dpag med par ri bong can //
analyzed: rjes dpag med par ri bong can //
translated: Without inference, the rabbit

original: zla ba'i sgrar ni rtogs ma yin //
analyzed: zla ba'i sgrar ni rtogs ma yin //
translated: is not understood as the word for the moon.

original: sgra las don rtogs par ni mngon sum yin par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: sgra las don rtogs par ni mngon sum yin par mi 'thad de /
translated: It is not tenable that the understanding of meaning from a word is direct perception,

original: ji skad du rig byed smra ba dag na re /
analyzed: ji skad du rig byed smra ba dag na re /
translated: just as the proponents of the Vedas say:

original: tshig las don rtogs pa ni mngon sum yin no zhes 'dzer ba bzhin no //
analyzed: tshig las don rtogs pa ni mngon sum yin no zhes 'dzer ba bzhin no //
translated: The understanding of meaning from words is direct perception.

original: gal te re zhig 'di skad du rtogs pa ni mngon sum yin te rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni 'di'i gzhung la gnod do //
analyzed: gal te re zhig 'di skad du rtogs pa ni mngon sum yin te rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni 'di'i gzhung la gnod do //
translated: If you say that the cognition is direct perception because it is of the nature of reflexive awareness, then you contradict your own position.

original: shes pa gzhan gyi dmigs par yang ste /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan gyi dmigs par yang ste /
translated: It is also the object of another cognition.

original: blo mngon sum ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo mngon sum ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not direct perception, because it is a mental object.

original: khas len na yang 'dir yang brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: khas len na yang 'dir yang brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: If you accept that, then it should be stated here.

original: du ba las me rtogs pa yang mngon sum yin zhes so //
analyzed: du ba las me rtogs pa yang mngon sum yin zhes so //
translated: The cognition of fire from smoke is also direct perception.

original: 'on te rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it would not be inference,

original: glo bur du du ba las me rtogs pa yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: glo bur du du ba las me rtogs pa yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: then the cognition of fire from smoke would also be like that.

original: 'on te der sngar mtshams sbyor ba yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te der sngar mtshams sbyor ba yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is a prior connection,

original: 'di la yang brda'i dus su yod do //
analyzed: 'di la yang brda'i dus su yod do //
translated: then it exists at the time of the convention.

original: de lta ma yin na bshad pa'i rjes su ma 'brangs par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bshad pa'i rjes su ma 'brangs par yang 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, it would not follow the explanation,

original: bshad pa nyid brda yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa nyid brda yin no //
translated: because the explanation itself is the convention.

original: 'on te bshad pa ni 'dod rgyal du byas pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin pa des na skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bshad pa ni 'dod rgyal du byas pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin pa des na skyon med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the explanation is not the nature of a random statement, then there is no fault.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: sdang ba la sogs pas gzhan du yang 'chad par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin no //
analyzed: sdang ba la sogs pas gzhan du yang 'chad par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin no //
translated: It has already been explained that because of anger and so on, one explains otherwise.

original: sde ba sbyor ba'i yin pa'i phyir yi ge dang dbyings la sogs pa ni nges pa ni tshig tu sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: sde ba sbyor ba'i yin pa'i phyir yi ge dang dbyings la sogs pa ni nges pa ni tshig tu sgrub pa yin no //
translated: Because of the combination of the parts, the letters, the phonemes, and so on, the words are established.

original: sbyor ba dam pas 'chad do zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba dam pas 'chad do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the combination is the explanation,

original: de ltar bshad pa brgyud pa las 'byung ba long ba brgyud pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar bshad pa brgyud pa las 'byung ba long ba brgyud pa yin /
translated: then the explanation would be like a blind person‚Äôs reliance on a guide.

original: des na mngon sum gyis min zhing rjes dpag med pa'i phyir 'thad par dka'/
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyis min zhing rjes dpag med pa'i phyir 'thad par dka'/
translated: Therefore, because there is no direct perception and no inference, it is difficult to accept.

original: des na ri bos can zla ba'o zhes bya ba 'di la yang mngon sum yod pa ma yin na //
analyzed: des na ri bos can zla ba'o zhes bya ba 'di la yang mngon sum yod pa ma yin na //
translated: Thus, in the case of ‚Äúthe one with a mountain is the moon,‚Äù there is no direct perception.

original: de ltar yang sgra dang rtags dag ni de yod pa dang med pa dag la mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dran pa la ltos te /
analyzed: de ltar yang sgra dang rtags dag ni de yod pa dang med pa dag la mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dran pa la ltos te /
translated: In that case, sound and signs are seen and not seen in relation to the memory of their existence and nonexistence.

original: rang gi yul rtogs par byed do zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi yul rtogs par byed do zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that the object is cognized.

original: de la gang gi phyir ro bong can ni zla ba ma yin te /üîΩyod pa'i phyir ro zhes smra ba de 'di skad du rtogs pa nyid med do zhes brjod pa @180a * //
analyzed: de la gang gi phyir ro bong can ni zla ba ma yin te / yod pa'i phyir ro zhes smra ba de 'di skad du rtogs pa nyid med do zhes brjod pa @180a * //
translated: In this regard, when someone says, ‚ÄúThe rabbit-bearer is not the moon,

original: ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ni ma yin no //
translated: because it exists,‚Äù he does not say that there is no cognition.

original: de skad smra ba ni rtogs pas gnod par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de skad smra ba ni rtogs pas gnod par 'gyur la /
translated: The one who says this is contradicted by cognition,

original: rtogs pa yang mngon sum nyid yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa yang mngon sum nyid yin no //
translated: and cognition is perception.

original: gal te rtogs pa yod pa yin pa de lta yang bden pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te rtogs pa yod pa yin pa de lta yang bden pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Even if there is cognition, it is not true,

original: zla ba gnyis su rtogs pa bzhin zhes bya ba de la grags pas gnod pa bstan par bya ba yin no //üîΩsnga ma snga ma mtshams sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis su rtogs pa bzhin zhes bya ba de la grags pas gnod pa bstan par bya ba yin no // snga ma snga ma mtshams sbyor ba'i //
translated: like the cognition of a double moon. This is to be shown by contradiction with what is commonly recognized.üîΩThe inference based on what is commonly recognized

original: grags pas rjes su dpag pa nyid //
analyzed: grags pas rjes su dpag pa nyid //
translated: is the connection of the prior and subsequent.

original: des na bstan bcos mdzad pas 'di //üîΩrjes su dpag pas gnod bzhed par //
analyzed: des na bstan bcos mdzad pas 'di // rjes su dpag pas gnod bzhed par //
translated: Therefore, the author of the treatiseüîΩwishes to show that it is contradicted by inference.

original: brda'i dus su 'brel par rtogs pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa nyid de /
analyzed: brda'i dus su 'brel par rtogs pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa nyid de /
translated: It is inference because at the time of convention, the connection is understood.

original: des na 'gro ba'i grags pas rang bzhin rtags zhes bya ba 'di grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na 'gro ba'i grags pas rang bzhin rtags zhes bya ba 'di grub pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the reason called ‚ÄúsvabhƒÅva‚Äù is established by the testimony of the people.

original: gal te 'di rjes su dpag pa zhes bya bar ni rigs na /
analyzed: gal te 'di rjes su dpag pa zhes bya bar ni rigs na /
translated: If it is proper to call this ‚Äúinference,‚Äù

original: rang bzhin gtan tshigs go ji ltar /
analyzed: rang bzhin gtan tshigs go ji ltar /
translated: how is svabhƒÅva a logical reason?

original: sngon gyi mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra las skyes pa'i rtogs pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin gyis gnod pa byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra las skyes pa'i rtogs pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin gyis gnod pa byed pa yin no //
translated: The cognition that arises from the word ‚ÄúsvabhƒÅva‚Äù is contradicted by the nature of inference.

original: sgra ni don gyi rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni don gyi rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: The word is not the nature of the object.

original: gal te brjod bya rjod byed dag / rgyu dang 'bras bu dngos yin na //
analyzed: gal te brjod bya rjod byed dag / rgyu dang 'bras bu dngos yin na //
translated: If the expressed and the expresser are real cause and effect,

original: de tshe sgra las rtogs 'gyur te //
analyzed: de tshe sgra las rtogs 'gyur te //
translated: then cognition would arise from the word.

original: de lta yin na rjes dpog 'gyur //
analyzed: de lta yin na rjes dpog 'gyur //
translated: If that were so, it would be inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa la rtogs pa'i phyir 'brel pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la rtogs pa'i phyir 'brel pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Because inference is cognition, it has a relation.

original: sgra don gyis 'brel pa de yang nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa las 'byung ba'i dngos po yin no //
analyzed: sgra don gyis 'brel pa de yang nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa las 'byung ba'i dngos po yin no //
translated: And that relation of word and meaning arises from the appropriator and the appropriated.

original: sgra ni don dam rkan la sogs pa'i byed pa tsam las skye ba yin gyi don gyis bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni don dam rkan la sogs pa'i byed pa tsam las skye ba yin gyi don gyis bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Sound is produced by the mere action of the ultimate palate, etc., but it is not produced by the object.

original: des na lag brda la sogs pa ltar 'dod pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin gyi /
analyzed: des na lag brda la sogs pa ltar 'dod pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, like the sign language, etc., the object is the cause and effect by desire.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: 'dod pas brtags pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu'i dngos po ni thag pa dang / phur pa'i 'brel pa bzhin du don dam pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pas brtags pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu'i dngos po ni thag pa dang / phur pa'i 'brel pa bzhin du don dam pa la ma yin no //
translated: The object of cause and effect designated by desire is like the connection of rope and peg, but not in the ultimate.

original: gdon mi za bar de ltar rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar de ltar rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not necessarily so.

original: des na 'di dngos kyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di dngos kyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not an inference of the actual.

original: 'o na ci ltar rang bzhin gyi rtags yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar rang bzhin gyi rtags yin zhe na /
translated: Well, how is it a reason of nature?

original: nye bar len par gyur pa'i don gang zhig brda gsal bar bya ba dang / 'dod pas de lta bar byed pa de ni /
analyzed: nye bar len par gyur pa'i don gang zhig brda gsal bar bya ba dang / 'dod pas de lta bar byed pa de ni /
translated: Any object that becomes appropriated, which is clarified by the sign and is made to appear by desire,

original: don dam par rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par rgyu ma yin te /
translated: is not ultimately the cause.

original: gzhan brjod par 'dod pa 'am /
analyzed: gzhan brjod par 'dod pa 'am /
translated: It is either another, or

original: brjod par 'dod pa med na don de brjod par 'dod pa med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa med na don de brjod par 'dod pa med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If there is no desire to express, then that object exists even though there is no desire to express it.

original: gang zhig med par gang yod pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin no //üîΩde'i phyir / 'di ni nyer len nyid du ni //
analyzed: gang zhig med par gang yod pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin no // de'i phyir / 'di ni nyer len nyid du ni //
translated: And that which exists without something else does not cause that other thing.üîΩTherefore,

original: 'dod pa tsam gyis brjod bya yin //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyis brjod bya yin //
translated: it is only by mere assertion that it is accepted as appropriation.

original: de tsam las ni byung 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: de tsam las ni byung 'gyur ba'i //
translated: The nature that arises from that alone

original: rang bzhin brjod par bya ba yin //
analyzed: rang bzhin brjod par bya ba yin //
translated: is what is to be expressed.

original: nye bar len pa nyid du rnam par @180b gzhag pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nye bar len pa nyid du rnam par @180b gzhag pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: The mere fact that it is posited as appropriation is what is to be expressed.

original: des na nye bar len pa nyid du tha snyad byed pa nyid ni grags pa yin no //
analyzed: des na nye bar len pa nyid du tha snyad byed pa nyid ni grags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mere fact that it is designated as appropriation is well known.

original: tha snyad grags pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tha snyad grags pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the designation is well known,

original: nye bar len pa yang grags pa nyid do //
analyzed: nye bar len pa yang grags pa nyid do //
translated: appropriation is also well known.

original: des na brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid nye bar len pa nyid du snang bas gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid nye bar len pa nyid du snang bas gnod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mere fact that it is not to be expressed appears to be appropriation, and that is the fault.

original: gal te 'ga' zhig gang gis nye bar len pa dang / 'bras bu nyid du mi snang ba de nyid ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig gang gis nye bar len pa dang / 'bras bu nyid du mi snang ba de nyid ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: If something is not perceived as a basis of appropriation or as an effect, then it is not an object of expression.

original: sgra de las de mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra de las de mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that object is not perceived from that word.

original: gal te don de 'dod kyang nye bar len pa dang / 'bras bu'i rtogs pa la mi snang ba yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te don de 'dod kyang nye bar len pa dang / 'bras bu'i rtogs pa la mi snang ba yin na ni /
translated: If that object is desired, but is not perceived as a basis of appropriation or as an effect,

original: brjod bya ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod bya ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is not an object of expression.

original: gal te mi snang ba nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te mi snang ba nyid ma yin nam /
translated: If it is not the case that it is not perceived,

original: phyi rol gyi don nyid ni nye bar len pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don nyid ni nye bar len pa ma yin te /
translated: then it is not the case that external objects are not bases of appropriation,üîΩbecause they exist even when they do not exist.

original: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni brjod pa nyid yin no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni brjod pa nyid yin no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that this is what is being said, then that is not so,

original: 'dod pa yod na snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa yod na snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it is desired, it is perceived.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe don mthong ba yod na /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe don mthong ba yod na /
translated: If an external object is seen,

original: de brjod par 'dod pa med kyang shin tu goms pas sbyor ba de'i tshe nyid lan ci ste mi snang ngam /
analyzed: de brjod par 'dod pa med kyang shin tu goms pas sbyor ba de'i tshe nyid lan ci ste mi snang ngam /
translated: then why is it not perceived when one desires to express it, even though one is not accustomed to doing so?

original: 'on te de las phyi rol gyi don snang ba med pa'i phyir rtogs pa po de skad brjod na /
analyzed: 'on te de las phyi rol gyi don snang ba med pa'i phyir rtogs pa po de skad brjod na /
translated: But if you say that it is so called because there is no external object that appears,

original: de lta na rjes su dpag pa yang phyi rol gyi don gyi yul can du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na rjes su dpag pa yang phyi rol gyi don gyi yul can du mi 'gyur te /
translated: then inference would not have an external object as its object,

original: de la mi snang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩ'on te rnam par rtog pa de las kyang der lhag par zhen pas dngos po nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir de skad brjod na /
analyzed: de la mi snang ba nyid kyi phyir ro // 'on te rnam par rtog pa de las kyang der lhag par zhen pas dngos po nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir de skad brjod na /
translated: because it does not appear in that .üîΩBut if you say that it is so called because the thing itself is engaged in that, because of the adherence to that in the conceptual thought,

original: de lta yin na brjod par bya ba nyid la yang de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de lta yin na brjod par bya ba nyid la yang de bzhin nyid do //
translated: then the object itself would be the reality.

original: phyi rol gyi don thams cad kyi tshe 'thob pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don thams cad kyi tshe 'thob pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not obtained in all cases of external objects,

original: grags pa ni don dam pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grags pa ni don dam pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because what is renowned is not a valid cognition in the ultimate.

original: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid kyis brjod bya dang / rjod byed kyi dngos po med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid kyis brjod bya dang / rjod byed kyi dngos po med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not the case that the nonexistence of the object and the means of knowledge is due to their invalidity,

original: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni de lta bu nyid du grags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni de lta bu nyid du grags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object and the means of knowledge are renowned as just that .

original: de'i phyir ; don gang nye bar len nyid du //
analyzed: de'i phyir ; don gang nye bar len nyid du //
translated: The object which is the basis of appropriation

original: gnas ldan de ni brjod bya nyid //üîΩ'dod skyes nyid len de ni brjod bya nyid //
analyzed: gnas ldan de ni brjod bya nyid // 'dod skyes nyid len de ni brjod bya nyid //
translated: Is the expressed object.üîΩThe arising of desire is the basis of appropriation.

original: 'dod skyes nyid len nyid de las //
analyzed: 'dod skyes nyid len nyid de las //
translated: That is the expressed object.üîΩThe arising of desire is not the basis of appropriation.

original: dgag par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dgag par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: That cannot be denied.

original: don rnams thams cad de 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: don rnams thams cad de 'dra ba'i //
translated: All objects are like that.

original: grags yul brjod bya yin par 'dod //
analyzed: grags yul brjod bya yin par 'dod //
translated: The object of fame is the expressed object.

original: des na 'dod par rag las pas //
analyzed: des na 'dod par rag las pas //
translated: Therefore, since it depends on desire,

original: 'jug pa'i sgra la de la nges yod min //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i sgra la de la nges yod min //
translated: The engaging sound does not have that.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the summary.

original: des na rung ba slob dpon grags pa'i sgrar bzhed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rung ba slob dpon grags pa'i sgrar bzhed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the master Ya≈õomitra asserts that the sound is suitable.

original: de nyid ga las she na /
analyzed: de nyid ga las she na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'dir smras pa /üîΩdes ni thun mong ma yin pa //
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / des ni thun mong ma yin pa //
translated: Here it is said:üîΩBy the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù

original: nyid kyi sgras ni bstan pa de //üîΩgal te ma lus rung nyid las //
analyzed: nyid kyi sgras ni bstan pa de // gal te ma lus rung nyid las //
translated: That is taught.üîΩIf it is asserted that the complete is not the expressed object

original: brjod bya min bzhed na mi 'gyur //
analyzed: brjod bya min bzhed na mi 'gyur //
translated: Because of suitability, that is not so.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore it is explained:

original: gzhan du 'dir ni gnod pa yi //
analyzed: gzhan du 'dir ni gnod pa yi //
translated: Otherwise, here the reason of contradiction

original: @181a * // gtan tshigs thun mong nyid mi 'gyur //
analyzed: @181a * // gtan tshigs thun mong nyid mi 'gyur //
translated: Would not be common.

original: gal te slob dpon rung ba nyid bzhed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te slob dpon rung ba nyid bzhed pa ma yin na /
translated: If the master did not accept the valid cognition,

original: ci ltar gnod par byed pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ltar gnod par byed pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: how could the reason of the inferential cognition that is to be refuted be unique?

original: yod pa nyid ni zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba ma yin pa bum pa la sogs pa dag la grub pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: yod pa nyid ni zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba ma yin pa bum pa la sogs pa dag la grub pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because existence is established in things such as pots that are not expressed by the word ‚Äúmoon.‚Äù

original: / gang gi tshe thams cad de'i brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni 'gyur ba nyid de /
analyzed: / gang gi tshe thams cad de'i brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni 'gyur ba nyid de /
translated: When everything is just that which is to be expressed, then it is unique,

original: gang la yang zla ba ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang la yang zla ba ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established that anything is not the moon.

original: slob dpon gyis ni gang la thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir /üîΩrjes su dpag pa med la sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i don dang 'gal bas gsal ba de ni phyogs ma yin no zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ni gang la thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir / rjes su dpag pa med la sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i don dang 'gal bas gsal ba de ni phyogs ma yin no zhes gsungs te /
translated: The master says that because it is not unique,üîΩit is not a position that is refuted by the reason of the inferential cognition that is to be refuted, but rather by the meaning of the scripture that is accepted.

original: yul gang la mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i rjes su dpag pa thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir de med do //
analyzed: yul gang la mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i rjes su dpag pa thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir de med do //
translated: Because the inferential cognition that is to be refuted is unique with regard to the object, it does not exist there.

original: med pa na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa gnod par byed pa yod pa de ni phyogs ma yin no //üîΩde skad du gsungs pa ni 'di dgag par mi nus pa nyid dam /
analyzed: med pa na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa gnod par byed pa yod pa de ni phyogs ma yin no // de skad du gsungs pa ni 'di dgag par mi nus pa nyid dam /
translated: This is not a position.üîΩThis is taught in order to show that it is impossible to refute this,

original: bzlog pa'i tshad ma med par nges pa nyid du ston pa yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i tshad ma med par nges pa nyid du ston pa yin no //
translated: or that there is no valid cognition that can refute it.

original: tshad ma med par ni 'gog pa ma yin la /
analyzed: tshad ma med par ni 'gog pa ma yin la /
translated: It is not that there is no refutation without a valid cognition.

original: nges par byed pa yod na mi nges pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: nges par byed pa yod na mi nges pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And when there is a valid cognition that ascertains it, it is not that there is no ascertainment.

original: 'dir ni phyi ma snga ma dang bcas pa snga ma phyi ma dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'dir ni phyi ma snga ma dang bcas pa snga ma phyi ma dang bcas pa /
translated: Here, the latter has the former, and the former has the latter.

original: 'di gnyis phyi ma snga ma yi //
analyzed: 'di gnyis phyi ma snga ma yi //
translated: These two have the latter and the former.

original: don la byed pa 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: don la byed pa 'jug pa yin //
translated: They engage in the meaning.

original: gang gi tshe re zhig sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gtso bor yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe re zhig sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gtso bor yin la /
translated: When at times what is renowned from the scriptures is primary,

original: cha shas snga mar khyad par nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni bzlog pa'i tshad ma med par nges pa yin la /
analyzed: cha shas snga mar khyad par nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni bzlog pa'i tshad ma med par nges pa yin la /
translated: and the former part is the qualifier, then there is ascertainment without a valid cognition that can refute it.

original: gang gi tshe cha shas phyi ma khyad par nyid yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe cha shas phyi ma khyad par nyid yin la /
translated: When the latter part is the qualifier,üîΩand the former part is the qualifier,üîΩthen there is ascertainment without a valid cognition that can refute it.

original: snga ma gtso bor yin pa de'i tshe ni 'gog par mi nus pa yin no //
analyzed: snga ma gtso bor yin pa de'i tshe ni 'gog par mi nus pa yin no //
translated: If the former is primary, then it cannot be refuted.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid du chug pa de lta na yang ci ltar dgag par mi nus /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid du chug pa de lta na yang ci ltar dgag par mi nus /
translated: Even if it is accepted that it is not shared by others through inference, then how can it not be refuted?

original: rjes su dpag pa kho na ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa kho na ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Inference alone is not a valid cognition,

original: mngon sum yang srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum yang srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because direct perception is also possible.

original: 'dir lan du /
analyzed: 'dir lan du /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: de 'gog rjes dpag las 'gyur te //üîΩsgra don la dbang 'jug med phyir //
analyzed: de 'gog rjes dpag las 'gyur te // sgra don la dbang 'jug med phyir //
translated: Its refutation arises from inference,üîΩbecause the sense faculty does not engage with the meaning of the term.

original: gal te sgra las 'byung ba'i grags pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de mngon sum nyid ma yin nam ;
analyzed: gal te sgra las 'byung ba'i grags pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de mngon sum nyid ma yin nam ;
translated: If the nature that arises from terms is not direct perception itself,

original: des na rjes su dpag pa med par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa med par 'gyur bas /
translated: then inference would not exist,

original: thun mong ma yin par brjod pa don med pa ste ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin par brjod pa don med pa ste ma yin zhe na /
translated: and it would be meaningless to say it is not shared.

original: ma yin te /üîΩsgra'i don la dbang po mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te / sgra'i don la dbang po mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, it is not so.üîΩBecause the sense faculty does not engage with the meaning of the term.

original: sgra'i don mngon du bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i don mngon du bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the term cannot be actualized.

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i don gyi rung ba nyid sgra'i don du nges pa tha snyad kyi rgyu yin pas /üîΩ@181b gal te snang ba yin du chug pa de lta na yang de las tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pas na /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i don gyi rung ba nyid sgra'i don du nges pa tha snyad kyi rgyu yin pas / @181b gal te snang ba yin du chug pa de lta na yang de las tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pas na /
translated: The object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.

original: rung ba nyid dgag pa dang / snang ba'i sgra dang 'brel pa can nam /üîΩ'brel pa ni mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no //üîΩsgra ni nyan pa'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba yin la de'i don ni rnam par rtog pa 'am /
analyzed: rung ba nyid dgag pa dang / snang ba'i sgra dang 'brel pa can nam / 'brel pa ni mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no // sgra ni nyan pa'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba yin la de'i don ni rnam par rtog pa 'am /
translated: The object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa pa snang ba yin no //üîΩ'di dag phan tshun yul 'chol bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //üîΩgal te me dang du ba dag kyang rang yul can gyi rnam par shes pa la snang ba'i phyir ci ltar der 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa pa snang ba yin no // 'di dag phan tshun yul 'chol bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no // gal te me dang du ba dag kyang rang yul can gyi rnam par shes pa la snang ba'i phyir ci ltar der 'gyur /
translated: The object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.

original: dri dang dri dang ldan pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dri dang dri dang ldan pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no zhe na /
translated: The object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.üîΩThe object that is suitable as the referent of a word is ascertained as the meaning of the word.

original: der yang skyon du 'gyur mod de lta na yang de bsgrub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: der yang skyon du 'gyur mod de lta na yang de bsgrub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Even if it were, it would not prove what you want to prove.

original: de dag ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pas 'dzin pa des na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de dag ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pas 'dzin pa des na nyes pa med do //
translated: They are apprehended by the sense consciousnesses, so there is no fault.

original: 'di la ni rang rig pas shes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: 'di la ni rang rig pas shes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin gyi /
translated: Here, the self-awareness apprehends the character of the consciousness,

original: rjod par byed pa nyid ni ma yin la /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa nyid ni ma yin la /
translated: but it does not express it.

original: 'brel pa khyab pa la yang mngon sum la snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa khyab pa la yang mngon sum la snang ba ma yin no //
translated: And in the case of a relation, the pervasion is not evident to direct perception.

original: sgra'i tha snyad la ni mi snang ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i tha snyad la ni mi snang ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And in the case of verbal conventions, there is no invisibility.

original: des na mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no //
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the object of direct perception.

original: mngon sum ni dngos po'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum ni dngos po'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because direct perception has a real object.

original: des na 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul nyid do //
analyzed: des na 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is the object of inference.

original: gal te brtags nas gzhan las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag par gzhan gnod par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te brtags nas gzhan las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag par gzhan gnod par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were inferred by being produced from a conceptual other, it would be harmed by another.

original: gal te yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin mod ;
analyzed: gal te yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin mod ;
translated: If you say that the reason ‚Äúbecause it exists‚Äù is not common,

original: gtan tshigs gzhan yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is another reason,

original: bshad pa ga la yod pa nyid kyang ste /
analyzed: bshad pa ga la yod pa nyid kyang ste /
translated: we reply: How can there be existence?

original: rjes 'gro med der gtan tshigs rnams //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med der gtan tshigs rnams //
translated: There is no pervasion, and the reasons are not established.

original: thun mong ma yin pa nyid ces //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa nyid ces //
translated: It is not the case that there is a common locusüîΩof the reason and the absence of the probandum.

original: de ltar gtan tshigs dper brjod pa //üîΩ'bras bu dang ni ldan par 'dod //
analyzed: de ltar gtan tshigs dper brjod pa // 'bras bu dang ni ldan par 'dod //
translated: Thus, the reason is an example of a reasonüîΩthat is said to be inconclusive.

original: gang la dngos po ma lus pa khyab pa'i yod pa nyid thun mong ma yin par byas pa der khyab pa med par nyon mongs pa gzhan dag smos su ci yod /
analyzed: gang la dngos po ma lus pa khyab pa'i yod pa nyid thun mong ma yin par byas pa der khyab pa med par nyon mongs pa gzhan dag smos su ci yod /
translated: If existence is made to be a common locus of all things, then how can there be any other afflictions that are not pervaded by it?

original: stobs dang ldan pa'i phyogs bzlog par nus pa de don du gnyer ba ni de las gzhan la bzod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs dang ldan pa'i phyogs bzlog par nus pa de don du gnyer ba ni de las gzhan la bzod pa ma yin no //
translated: One who seeks to refute a powerful position cannot do so by relying on something else.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyogs gtan tshigs dang ldan par bstan te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyogs gtan tshigs dang ldan par bstan te /
translated: For that reason, the position is taught to be endowed with a reason.

original: ri bong can ni zla ba ma yin te yod pa'i phyir zhes so //
analyzed: ri bong can ni zla ba ma yin te yod pa'i phyir zhes so //
translated: The rabbit does not have the mark of the moon because it exists.

original: de lta ma yin na phyogs ltar snang ba 'god pa'i skabs su gtan tshigs nye bar dgod pa'i skabs ga la yod /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na phyogs ltar snang ba 'god pa'i skabs su gtan tshigs nye bar dgod pa'i skabs ga la yod /
translated: Otherwise, when the apparent position is stated, how could there be an occasion to state the reason?

original: gzhan du ni sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa 'am /
analyzed: gzhan du ni sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa 'am /
translated: Otherwise, it would not be a sound that is heard.

original: bum pa rtag pa yin no zhes bya bar yang gtan tshigs dgod par thal lo //
analyzed: bum pa rtag pa yin no zhes bya bar yang gtan tshigs dgod par thal lo //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow, absurdly, that one could state as a reason that sound is not to be heard or that a pot is permanent.

original: ci ste tshad mas gnod pa la gtan tshigs mi srid na /
analyzed: ci ste tshad mas gnod pa la gtan tshigs mi srid na /
translated: If you say that a reason is not possible when it is contradicted by a valid cognition,

original: 'dir yang de ltar 'gyur @182a * //
analyzed: 'dir yang de ltar 'gyur @182a * //
translated: then this would be the case here as well,

original: ba'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: ba'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: so this is just babbling.

original: gal te 'di dgag par mi nus pa nyid du ston pa yin no zhes brjod pas na mnyan par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dir yang thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di dgag par mi nus pa nyid du ston pa yin no zhes brjod pas na mnyan par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dir yang thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is meant to show that it is impossible to refute this, then it would follow, absurdly, that it is not to be heard.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: In response to this we say:

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa 'di //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa 'di //
translated: This popular saying that comes from scripture

original: dngos kyi tshad ma min par brjod //
analyzed: dngos kyi tshad ma min par brjod //
translated: is said not to be a valid cognition in fact.

original: des na gnyen po med pa la ;
analyzed: des na gnyen po med pa la ;
translated: Therefore, since it is not a remedy,

original: / gyur phyir 'di la nyes pa med //
analyzed: / gyur phyir 'di la nyes pa med //
translated: there is no fault in this.

original: 'dir gnod par byed par srid kyi mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dag las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gnod par byed par srid kyi mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dag las ni ma yin te /
translated: Here it is possible that it is contradicted, but not by direct perception or inference.

original: des na 'dir bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir bsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore it is refuted here.

original: rjes su dpag pa gnyen po med pa nyid du brjod pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa gnyen po med pa nyid du brjod pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The reply to this is that inference is said to be without a counter-correlate.

original: 'o na ci ltar gnyen po mi srid do //
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar gnyen po mi srid do //
translated: How is it that a counter-correlate is impossible?

original: thams cad ni brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad ni brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: All is not to be expressed.

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /üîΩ// / bam po drug pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa / // / bam po drug pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: sgra ni brda la brten pa can //
analyzed: sgra ni brda la brten pa can //
translated: Sound is based on convention.

original: de yang 'dod tsam brten pa yin //
analyzed: de yang 'dod tsam brten pa yin //
translated: That is also based on mere desire.

original: sgra yis grub pa mi 'grub min //
analyzed: sgra yis grub pa mi 'grub min //
translated: Sound does not establish what is not established.

original: de ltar sgra byung grags pa'i tshig / sgra las byung ba'i rang bzhin thams cad grub pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ltar sgra byung grags pa'i tshig / sgra las byung ba'i rang bzhin thams cad grub pa nyid yin te /
translated: Thus, all that is based on sound is well-known.

original: 'dod pa tsam gyi brda sbyar ba'i sgra tsam las 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyi brda sbyar ba'i sgra tsam las 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sound is based on mere desire, because it arises from mere sound that is conventionally designated.

original: sgra ni gang du yang 'jug par mi nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni gang du yang 'jug par mi nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Sound is not incapable of engaging anywhere.

original: don 'di nyid sgra las byung ba'i grags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: don 'di nyid sgra las byung ba'i grags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod pa yin no //
translated: This very meaning is expressed by well-known based on sound and so on.

original: gzhan du na thun mong ma yin pa nyid du bstan par mi nus so zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: gzhan du na thun mong ma yin pa nyid du bstan par mi nus so zhes bstan zin to //
translated: Otherwise, it could not be taught as being unique.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa med pas na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gnod pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa med pas na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gnod pa med pa yin la /
translated: If it is not inference, then it is not invalidated by the unmistaken cognition that arises from the scriptures.

original: gnod pa med pa nyid yin pas kyang rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir phan tshun brten pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa nyid yin pas kyang rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir phan tshun brten pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And if it is not invalidated, then it is not inference. Thus, there is the fault of mutual dependence.

original: sgra byung grags pa 'dod tsam gyis //
analyzed: sgra byung grags pa 'dod tsam gyis //
translated: The engagement of the mere desire for what is renowned from scriptures

original: 'jug pa rang nyid las mi 'grub //üîΩma yin yod nyid rang nyid las //
analyzed: 'jug pa rang nyid las mi 'grub // ma yin yod nyid rang nyid las //
translated: is not established from itself.

original: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: If it is not a valid cognition, then existence is not from itself.

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa 'dod pa tsam gyis rjes su byed pa gzhan las byed pa gzhan las mi mthun pa'i phyogs med par rtogs pa ltos pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa 'dod pa tsam gyis rjes su byed pa gzhan las byed pa gzhan las mi mthun pa'i phyogs med par rtogs pa ltos pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The engagement of the mere desire for what is renowned from scriptures does not realize the absence of a discordant factor from another factor due to dependence on another factor.

original: de stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir rang nyid las yin no //
analyzed: de stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir rang nyid las yin no //
translated: It is from itself because it is powerful.

original: 'gog par byed pa yod pa nyid kyang rang nyid las ma 'brel pas na thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gog par byed pa yod pa nyid kyang rang nyid las ma 'brel pas na thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the existence of the refutation is not related to itself, so it is not shared.

original: gal te yod pa nyid ni brjod bya ma yin par rtogs pa des na brjod bya ma yin pas khyab pa'i phyir ci ste 'gog par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yod pa nyid ni brjod bya ma yin par rtogs pa des na brjod bya ma yin pas khyab pa'i phyir ci ste 'gog par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think that existence is not the object of expression, then since it is not the object of expression, why is it not refuted?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: 'dod pa tsam gyis 'byor ba ni dgag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyis 'byor ba ni dgag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that one cannot refute something by mere assertion.

original: gal te yod pa nyid brjod bya ma yin na yod pa'i sgra nyid @182b kyis ji ltar brjod par bya /
analyzed: gal te yod pa nyid brjod bya ma yin na yod pa'i sgra nyid @182b kyis ji ltar brjod par bya /
translated: If existence is not the object of expression, then how can the word ‚Äúexists‚Äù express it?

original: de'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpog pa gnod pa med pa'i sgra las byung ba'i grags pa ni gnod par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpog pa gnod pa med pa'i sgra las byung ba'i grags pa ni gnod par byed pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since it is not shared, the well-known inference that is not undermined undermines it.

original: gal te gnod par byas pa yang gnod byed du dogs na /
analyzed: gal te gnod par byas pa yang gnod byed du dogs na /
translated: If you think that what is undermined also undermines,

original: de lta yin na 'gar yang gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos por mi 'gyur bas na 'gro ba rtogs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na 'gar yang gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos por mi 'gyur bas na 'gro ba rtogs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then the entities of the object of harm and the agent of harm would never occur, and so the world would be devoid of understanding.

original: des na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa nyid gnod par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: des na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa nyid gnod par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the well-known fact that arises from the scriptures is what harms.

original: de las bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the opposite of that.üîΩThus, it is said:

original: des na / rjes su dpag pas sgrub rnams la //
analyzed: des na / rjes su dpag pas sgrub rnams la //
translated: ‚ÄúThe proof by way of inference

original: 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa can //
analyzed: 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa can //
translated: has no error of contradiction.

original: med par ston yin de lta bu'i //
analyzed: med par ston yin de lta bu'i //
translated: It is a demonstration of nonexistence.

original: rtogs pa rjes dpog yin phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa rjes dpog yin phyir ro //
translated: Because the understanding is inferential.‚Äù

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gnyen po'i phyogs med par bstan pas ni ci ltar rjes su dpag pa 'di gnyen po'i phyogs med pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yin no zhes bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gnyen po'i phyogs med par bstan pas ni ci ltar rjes su dpag pa 'di gnyen po'i phyogs med pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yin no zhes bstan pa yin te /
translated: The demonstration of the nonexistence of the position of the antidote by the well-known fact that arises from the scriptures teaches that just as this inference is devoid of the position of the antidote, so too are the others.

original: gnyen po srid na ni de yang tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyen po srid na ni de yang tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If the antidote were possible, then it would not be a harm because it would not be a valid means of knowledge.

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: It would be like the well-known fact that arises from the scriptures.

original: des na yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /üîΩdper na 'di na me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: des na yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin te / dper na 'di na me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, it is not a proof, because it is not a common locus of the reason and the opposite of the probandum.üîΩFor example, it is like the case where someone says, ‚ÄúHere there is fire, because there is smoke.‚Äù

original: 'di na me med de yod pa'i phyir me dang bral ba'i phyogs bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di na me med de yod pa'i phyir me dang bral ba'i phyogs bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Then someone else says, ‚ÄúHere there is no fire, because there is fire.‚Äù

original: gal te 'dod pa tsam nyid kyis sbyar bas rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bum pa la yang zla ba nyid yod pas dpe med par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'dod pa tsam nyid kyis sbyar bas rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bum pa la yang zla ba nyid yod pas dpe med par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one were to argue that the example is not established because the mere desire to apply the reason is the means of expression, then the moon would exist in a pot, because it exists.

original: 'di ni me med pa'i phyogs yod pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni me med pa'i phyogs yod pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But it is not the case that there is a place where there is no fire.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa yis //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa yis //
translated: Because of the well-known expression that arises from the words,

original: gnod pa yod pa thun mong nyid //üîΩma yin 'dir yang 'bras bu yi //
analyzed: gnod pa yod pa thun mong nyid // ma yin 'dir yang 'bras bu yi //
translated: the existence of the refutation is common to both.üîΩHere, why is it not the case that the reason is refuted

original: gtan tshigs kyis gnod ci ste min //üîΩdu ba dang ldan sa phyogs su //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis gnod ci ste min // du ba dang ldan sa phyogs su //
translated: by the effect?üîΩThe fire that is established by inference

original: rjes su dpag pas bsgrubs pa'i me //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas bsgrubs pa'i me //
translated: in a place that possesses smoke

original: de ci mi 'gog pa dag la //
analyzed: de ci mi 'gog pa dag la //
translated: is not refuted by anyone.

original: gnod byed yin par ma rtogs sam //
analyzed: gnod byed yin par ma rtogs sam //
translated: Or do you not understand that they are the violators?

original: mi mthun phyogs kyis gnod par ni //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs kyis gnod par ni //
translated: The possibility of harm by adverse conditions

original: dogs pa sngar nyid bzlog zin to //
analyzed: dogs pa sngar nyid bzlog zin to //
translated: Has already been refuted earlier.

original: des na tshad ma thams cad la //
analyzed: des na tshad ma thams cad la //
translated: Therefore, in all cases of valid cognition,

original: dgra zla srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dgra zla srid pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no possibility of an adversary.

original: des na rjes su dpag pa las //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa las //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction in inference

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul can yod min ;
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul can yod min ;
translated: Nor is there any possibility of error.

original: / de lta ma yin te tshad ma la gnod pa srid pa yin na thams cad la yid brtan du med do //
analyzed: / de lta ma yin te tshad ma la gnod pa srid pa yin na thams cad la yid brtan du med do //
translated: If it were not so, if there were a possibility of harm to valid cognition, then nothing would be reliable.

original: gang du ma mthong ba de la yid brtan pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gang du ma mthong ba de la yid brtan pa med do zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that one cannot rely on what is not seen,

original: ma yin te mi dmigs pa tsam ni tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te mi dmigs pa tsam ni tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is not so, because mere non-apprehension is not a valid cognition.

original: gnod pa yod kyang rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir te /üîΩdmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa @183a * //
analyzed: gnod pa yod kyang rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir te / dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa @183a * //
translated: Even if there is harm, one cannot know it,

original: ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not have the characteristics of an object of apprehension.

original: 'dis brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa can nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa can nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also eliminates the claim that it has the property of being singular, which is what is intended to be expressed.

original: 'di ltar de yang ma dmigs pa tsam gyis rtogs sam /
analyzed: 'di ltar de yang ma dmigs pa tsam gyis rtogs sam /
translated: In this way, is that known by mere non-apprehension,

original: 'brel pas yin /
analyzed: 'brel pas yin /
translated: or by connection?

original: gal te ma dmigs par rtogs par byed na ni tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te ma dmigs par rtogs par byed na ni tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ci yang ma yin no //
translated: If it is understood through non-observation, then it is not a valid cognition, and so it is nothing at all.

original: 'on te 'brel pas yin na /
analyzed: 'on te 'brel pas yin na /
translated: But if it is through a relation,

original: de las 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can mi srid pa nyid do //
analyzed: de las 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can mi srid pa nyid do //
translated: then it is impossible for there to be a non-erroneous contradiction with that.

original: de la ni 'brel pa dang ldan pa gzhan srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ni 'brel pa dang ldan pa gzhan srid pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case, it is not possible for there to be another that has a relation,

original: gcig la yod pa dang med pa dag mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig la yod pa dang med pa dag mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible for something to both exist and not exist in one thing.

original: de'i phyir dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa la 'gal ba 'khrul pa can mi srid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa la 'gal ba 'khrul pa can mi srid do //
translated: Therefore, in an inference based on the power of fact, it is impossible for there to be a non-erroneous contradiction.

original: gal te thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa la 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can med pa ston pa yin na de'i tshe gang la thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa med la /
analyzed: gal te thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa la 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can med pa ston pa yin na de'i tshe gang la thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa med la /
translated: If you are showing that there is no non-erroneous contradiction with an inference because it is not shared, then at that time, there is no inference because it is not shared.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis rab tu 'grub pa 'gal ba'i don gyis gsal ba der yang phyogs ma yin no zhes 'di rjes su dpag pa nyid pa ci ste mi brjod /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis rab tu 'grub pa 'gal ba'i don gyis gsal ba der yang phyogs ma yin no zhes 'di rjes su dpag pa nyid pa ci ste mi brjod /
translated: The reason of effect and the reason of essence are established by the meaning of contradiction.  It is not the case that this is not stated in the case of inference.

original: de bzhin du mngon sum la yang brjod par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon sum la yang brjod par bya'o zhe na /
translated: In the same way, it should be stated in the case of perception.

original: 'di ni cung zad kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni cung zad kyang ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case at all.

original: 'di ltar 'di nyid kyi mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa la yang brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di nyid kyi mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa la yang brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is because it is stated in the case of both perception and inference.

original: gang zhig mngon sum la ni dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig mngon sum la ni dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Someone might say, ‚ÄúIn the case of perception, the thing does not exist,üîΩbecause it is a conception, like the conception of one who has an eye disease, who perceives hairs, bees, and so on.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir skra dang sbrang bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa can rab rib can gyis rtogs pa bzhin no zhes zer ba de la lan 'di gdab ste /üîΩ'brel pa grub pas dngos po ni //
analyzed: rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir skra dang sbrang bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa can rab rib can gyis rtogs pa bzhin no zhes zer ba de la lan 'di gdab ste / 'brel pa grub pas dngos po ni //
translated: The response to that is:üîΩThe existence of a thing is established

original: med pa min par sgrub par byed //üîΩ'di ltar 'brel pa yod pa ni //
analyzed: med pa min par sgrub par byed // 'di ltar 'brel pa yod pa ni //
translated: by the establishment of its relation.üîΩThus, the existence of a thing

original: kun la dngos po yod pa yin //
analyzed: kun la dngos po yod pa yin //
translated: exists for all who have a relation.

original: gal te 'brel pa dang mi ldan pa'i rtogs pa la dngos po yod par the tshom za ba'am /
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa dang mi ldan pa'i rtogs pa la dngos po yod par the tshom za ba'am /
translated: If you doubt the existence of a thing that is not related to a cognition,

original: gzhan du brjod pa ni grub pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan du brjod pa ni grub pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur /
translated: or if you say that it is otherwise, then you would be proving what is already established.

original: 'on te bzlog pa la yin na ni de'i tshe thams cad la dngos po yod pa'i phyir bzlog pa'i phyogs thun mong ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te bzlog pa la yin na ni de'i tshe thams cad la dngos po yod pa'i phyir bzlog pa'i phyogs thun mong ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: But if you say that it is the opposite, then at that time, since a thing exists for all, the opposite position is not unique.

original: gal te mngon sum la rjes su dpag pa 'am /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum la rjes su dpag pa 'am /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it possible that inference or

original: gzhan pa'i gnod par byed pa mi srid pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan pa'i gnod par byed pa mi srid pa ma yin nam /
translated: another cognition could contradict a perception?

original: de ni mngon du mthong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mngon du mthong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is directly seen.

original: mngon du mthong ba ji ltar med par bsgrub par nus te /
analyzed: mngon du mthong ba ji ltar med par bsgrub par nus te /
translated: How can it be possible to prove that what is directly seen does not exist?

original: de nyid kyi tshe de nyid mthong ba dang mi mthong ba ni srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe de nyid mthong ba dang mi mthong ba ni srid pa ma yin no //
translated: At that time, it is not possible that it is seen and not seen.

original: des ni mi dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: des ni mi dmigs pa'am /
translated: By that, non-apprehension or

original: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis med par bsgrub pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis med par bsgrub pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: another reason does not prove non-existence.

original: de ni ma yin no 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ni ma yin no 'di ltar /
translated: That is not so. Because:

original: mngon sum byas pa'i rtogs pa ni //
analyzed: mngon sum byas pa'i rtogs pa ni //
translated: A cognition that has a direct object

original: 'ga' @183b la'ang gnod pa yod min na //
analyzed: 'ga' @183b la'ang gnod pa yod min na //
translated: If it does not invalidate any,üîΩthen it is not a means of valid cognition,

original: de lta min na khyad med phyir //
analyzed: de lta min na khyad med phyir //
translated: because it is not different from the others.

original: thams cad tshad ma nyid du thal //
analyzed: thams cad tshad ma nyid du thal //
translated: And it would follow, absurdly, that all would be means of valid cognition.

original: sgra la sogs pa mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i rtog pa la yang gnod par byed pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i rtog pa la yang gnod par byed pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the nature of the direct perception of sound and so on would not be invalidated by mistaken conceptual thoughts.

original: des na mngon du byed pa tsam gyis ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: des na mngon du byed pa tsam gyis ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, mere direct perception is not a means of valid cognition.

original: 'dis ni gnod pa med pa nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni gnod pa med pa nyid kyang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also refutes the claim that it is nondeceptive.

original: mngon du byed pa bzhin du gnod pa med pa nyid kyi ngo bo yang ha cang ma khyab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa bzhin du gnod pa med pa nyid kyi ngo bo yang ha cang ma khyab pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature of being nondeceptive is not too broad, just like the nature of being direct perception.

original: mi slu ba can gnod pa med par gyur pa tshad ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mi slu ba can gnod pa med par gyur pa tshad ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you claim that it is a means of valid cognition because it is nondeceptive and nondeceived,

original: de ni aa ru ra zos na lhas 'khru bar byed do zhes pa'i tshul du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni aa ru ra zos na lhas 'khru bar byed do zhes pa'i tshul du 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be like the claim that if you eat myrobalan plums, the gods will wash you.

original: gal te mi slu ba dang ldan pa yin na gnod pa med pas ci bya ste ;
analyzed: gal te mi slu ba dang ldan pa yin na gnod pa med pas ci bya ste ;
translated: If it is endowed with nondeceptiveness, what is the use of being nondeceived?

original: mi slu ba nyid kyis tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi slu ba nyid kyis tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a means of valid cognition by virtue of being nondeceptive.

original: 'on te don byed pa'i yul la gnod pa byed pa nyid 'dzin pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te don byed pa'i yul la gnod pa byed pa nyid 'dzin pa yin na /
translated: But if it is the apprehension of the object that is harmed,

original: de ltar yin na de'i mi slu ba nyid pas skyon med do //
analyzed: de ltar yin na de'i mi slu ba nyid pas skyon med do //
translated: then there is no fault, because it is nondeceptive.

original: mi slu ba de yang snang ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mi slu ba de yang snang ba ni ma yin te /
translated: And that nondeceptiveness is not the appearance,

original: snang ba'i rang bzhin 'brel pa yod pa yin pa'i phyir mi snang yang rtogs par bya ba yin no ;
analyzed: snang ba'i rang bzhin 'brel pa yod pa yin pa'i phyir mi snang yang rtogs par bya ba yin no ;
translated: because the nature of the appearance is related to it, and so it is to be understood even when it does not appear.

original: /'brel pa de ni rjes su dpag pa la yang yod pa'i phyir de la gnyen po srid na gnyi ga la 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: /'brel pa de ni rjes su dpag pa la yang yod pa'i phyir de la gnyen po srid na gnyi ga la 'gyur ba'am /
translated: And because that relation exists in inference as well, if a remedy is possible in that case, then it is possible in both cases.

original: yang na ni 'gal ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir mtshungs so //
analyzed: yang na ni 'gal ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir mtshungs so //
translated: Or else, because there is no contradiction, they are similar.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum yang mngon du byed pas ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum yang mngon du byed pas ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, perception is not a valid cognition because it is not a means of knowledge that makes known.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩmngon sum yang ni don med na //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / mngon sum yang ni don med na //
translated: For this very reason,üîΩif perception is meaningless,

original: mi 'byung ba las tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba las tshad ma nyid //
translated: then it is a valid cognition because it does not arise from that which is unreal.

original: 'brel pa yi ni rang bzhin de'i //
analyzed: 'brel pa yi ni rang bzhin de'i //
translated: That nature of the relation

original: rgyu yin pas na gnyi ga mtshungs //
analyzed: rgyu yin pas na gnyi ga mtshungs //
translated: is the cause of it, so both are similar.

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: 'brel pa nyid tshad ma'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa nyid tshad ma'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The relation itself is the cause of valid knowledge.

original: gal te dgos pa 'di tsam du zad na mngon sum de nyid du gnyen po med par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te dgos pa 'di tsam du zad na mngon sum de nyid du gnyen po med par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: If the purpose is merely this, then why not say ‚Äúwithout inference‚Äù in order to show that there is no antidote to that direct perception?

original: rjes su dpag pa med pa la zhes ci ste ma brjod rim gyis thob pa'i go rims bzlog pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa med pa la zhes ci ste ma brjod rim gyis thob pa'i go rims bzlog pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is pointless to reverse the order in which they are obtained.

original: de yang mi bzang ste /
analyzed: de yang mi bzang ste /
translated: That is not good.üîΩBecause:

original: 'di ltar / sgra byung grags pa'i tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sgra byung grags pa'i tshad ma nyid //
translated: The valid knowledge of renown that arises from words

original: gnod pa dang ni mi ldan pa //
analyzed: gnod pa dang ni mi ldan pa //
translated: Is not undermined.üîΩIn order to show that, the reversed valid knowledge

original: bstan phyir bzlog pa'i tshad ma dag / dpe las 'di nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: bstan phyir bzlog pa'i tshad ma dag / dpe las 'di nyid du bshad do //
translated: Is explained in this life through examples.

original: gal te mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pa der gegs byed pa'i tshad ma sel bar brjod na ni /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pa der gegs byed pa'i tshad ma sel bar brjod na ni /
translated: If you say that direct perception or inference is stated to eliminate the valid knowledge that obstructs it,

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa la don gyis bstan par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa la don gyis bstan par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then it would not be implicitly taught in the inference of renown that arises from words.

original: des na don 'dis dang por thob par rgal ba yin no //üîΩgzhan yang / gang du brtan min rjes dpag la'ang //
analyzed: des na don 'dis dang por thob par rgal ba yin no // gzhan yang / gang du brtan min rjes dpag la'ang //
translated: Therefore, this meaning is the first thing to be obtained.üîΩMoreover:üîΩWhere there is no inference of stability,

original: bzlog pa'i rjes dpag yod min pa //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i rjes dpag yod min pa //
translated: There is no reversed inference.

original: der ni brtan pa'i rjes dpag @184a * //
analyzed: der ni brtan pa'i rjes dpag @184a * //
translated: There, the inference of the stable

original: la ; / shin tu ring bar nges byas nyid //
analyzed: la ; / shin tu ring bar nges byas nyid //
translated: is determined to be very remote.

original: gang du sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gting brtan pa ma yin pa'i rjes su dpag pa la yang thun mong ma yin pa nyid du byed pa'i rgyus bzlog pa'i tshad ma med pa de shin tu rtsa ba brtan pa ni bzlog pa'i tshad ma med par 'bad
analyzed: gang du sgra las byung ba'i grags pa gting brtan pa ma yin pa'i rjes su dpag pa la yang thun mong ma yin pa nyid du byed pa'i rgyus bzlog pa'i tshad ma med pa de shin tu rtsa ba brtan pa ni bzlog pa'i tshad ma med par 'bad
translated: Where the inference arising from the word is not stable, even there, by the reason of being uncommon, the absence of a countering valid cognition is the very stable root.

original: mi dgos par grub po //
analyzed: mi dgos par grub po //
translated: Without effort, it is established that there is no countering valid cognition.

original: gal te mi mthun pa med pa nyid rung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas thams cad 'dod pa'i sgras brjod par rung ba de'i phyir 'dir dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur te /
