analyzed: gal te mi mthun pa med pa nyid rung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas thams cad 'dod pa'i sgras brjod par rung ba de'i phyir 'dir dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: If it is suitable that there is no disagreement, then by the reasoning of being suitable to be expressed by the word of all desires, therefore here it would be an inference that engages by the power of the fact,

original: de ltar mngon sum gyis dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum gyis dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is observed by direct perception.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so,

original: rjes su mthun pa nyid kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa nyid kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is also no compatibility.

original: ji ltar de'i mi mthun pa nyid rtogs pa med pa de bzhin du rjes su mthun pa nyid kyang mngon sum mam /
analyzed: ji ltar de'i mi mthun pa nyid rtogs pa med pa de bzhin du rjes su mthun pa nyid kyang mngon sum mam /
translated: Just as there is no realization of its discordance, so too there is no realization of its concordance.üîΩ

original: gzhan las rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan las rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as the non-establishment of the reason is not understood by perception, in the same way, the non-establishment of the concordant example is not understood by perception or by other means of valid knowledge.

original: des na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i 'di dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag par ci ltar 'gyur /üîΩde la 'dod pa tsam las byung ba'i chos /
analyzed: des na sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i 'di dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag par ci ltar 'gyur / de la 'dod pa tsam las byung ba'i chos /
translated: Therefore, how can this inference based on what is renowned from statements be an inference based on the power of the fact?

original: dngos po ma yin pa la gnod par byed pa der ci 'brel pa'i stobs las byung ba gnod par 'gyur ram zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig 'dir dgos par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pa la gnod par byed pa der ci 'brel pa'i stobs las byung ba gnod par 'gyur ram zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig 'dir dgos par bstan pa yin no //
translated: Here, it is taught that the mere point is this: how can a non-entity that arises from mere desire be invalidated by something that arises from the power of the fact?

original: gal te 'dod tsam gzhan gyi dring 'jog chos //
analyzed: gal te 'dod tsam gzhan gyi dring 'jog chos //
translated: If a phenomenon arises from mere desire,

original: gdon mi za bar gnod bya min //üîΩde ni nye ba nyid kyis na //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar gnod bya min // de ni nye ba nyid kyis na //
translated: it is certainly not to be invalidated.üîΩBecause it is directly perceived

original: kun gyi tshe na rtogs phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gyi tshe na rtogs phyir ro //
translated: at all times by everyone.

original: dngos po'i stobs las 'byung gang yin //
analyzed: dngos po'i stobs las 'byung gang yin //
translated: That which arises from the power of the fact

original: de ni la lar med kyang srid //
analyzed: de ni la lar med kyang srid //
translated: may sometimes not exist.

original: gang phyir rgyu rnams 'bras bu la //
analyzed: gang phyir rgyu rnams 'bras bu la //
translated: Because the causes

original: nges pa nyid ni yod ma yin //üîΩdes na dngos po las byung ba'i //
analyzed: nges pa nyid ni yod ma yin // des na dngos po las byung ba'i //
translated: There is no certainty.üîΩTherefore, there is the fear of the invalidity

original: tshad ma gnod byed dogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshad ma gnod byed dogs par 'gyur //
translated: Of the valid cognition that arises from the thing.

original: de phyir gnod byed spangs pa 'di //
analyzed: de phyir gnod byed spangs pa 'di //
translated: Therefore, the avoidance of invalidity

original: de nyid du ni rigs pa yin //üîΩsnum khur dang ni dbyig pa'i tshul//
analyzed: de nyid du ni rigs pa yin // snum khur dang ni dbyig pa'i tshul//
translated: Is reasonable in reality.üîΩThe response that is given

original: lan du brjod pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: lan du brjod pa gang yin pa //
translated: In the manner of the oil-seller

original: de ni yod min dang po las //
analyzed: de ni yod min dang po las //
translated: Is not the case, because of the first

original: rgal bas de yi rim las 'das //
analyzed: rgal bas de yi rim las 'das //
translated: Refutation, which is passed over in order.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: gang du tha snyad tsam las grub pa yin //
analyzed: gang du tha snyad tsam las grub pa yin //
translated: Where there is establishment by mere convention,

original: 'brel pas rjes dpog dngos pos 'jug min pa //
analyzed: 'brel pas rjes dpog dngos pos 'jug min pa //
translated: The engagement of the thing by the inference from the relation

original: gnod pa med der gzhan la gnod pa ni //
analyzed: gnod pa med der gzhan la gnod pa ni //
translated: Is not invalidated, and there is no invalidation of the other.

original: yod par 'gyur zhes ji ltar dpyod par 'gyur //
analyzed: yod par 'gyur zhes ji ltar dpyod par 'gyur //
translated: How could there be an investigation of existence?

original: don 'di 'di ltar ston par byed pas na //
analyzed: don 'di 'di ltar ston par byed pas na //
translated: Since this meaning is shown in this way,

original: rigs pa'i chos kyi rjes 'gro nyams //
analyzed: rigs pa'i chos kyi rjes 'gro nyams //
translated: The degeneration of following the doctrine of reasoning

original: rag las pa dag 'dor ba yang //
analyzed: rag las pa dag 'dor ba yang //
translated: Is abandoned by depending on the other.

original: de spangs pas byas nas ni 'jug pa mthong //
analyzed: de spangs pas byas nas ni 'jug pa mthong //
translated: Having made that abandonment, one sees the engagement.

original: bde blag grub pa'i mngon par 'dod pa de //
analyzed: bde blag grub pa'i mngon par 'dod pa de //
translated: The desired easy establishment

original: sad pa'ang de dang mtshungs par grub pa nyid //
analyzed: sad pa'ang de dang mtshungs par grub pa nyid //
translated: and the waking state is established as being similar to that.

original: dngos pos 'jug la 'di 'dra yod min te //
analyzed: dngos pos 'jug la 'di 'dra yod min te //
translated: But there is no such thing as a cognition that engages with real entities.

original: gzhi @184b 'dzin pa ni skyon par nus ma yin //
analyzed: gzhi @184b 'dzin pa ni skyon par nus ma yin //
translated: And the apprehension of a basis is not capable of being erroneous.

original: de ltar lam ngan zhugs pa'i rtogs pa thams cad 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: de ltar lam ngan zhugs pa'i rtogs pa thams cad 'gyur ba'i //
translated: Thus, all the cognitions of those who have entered a bad path are transformed

original: tshul 'di thob pa ma yin rnams kyis 'phrogs pa min grang yang //
analyzed: tshul 'di thob pa ma yin rnams kyis 'phrogs pa min grang yang //
translated: by this method, which is not obtained by those who are not liberated.

original: 'di la ji ltar blo ngan min nyams med pa rnams kyi lta bar 'gyur ba 'am gsal ba nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la ji ltar blo ngan min nyams med pa rnams kyi lta bar 'gyur ba 'am gsal ba nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But how can this be the view of those who are not impaired by the fault of bad logic? Or how can it be seen to be clear?

original: de'i phyir 'di nyid du gnod pa med par bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di nyid du gnod pa med par bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the correct statement: ‚ÄúHere, there is no fault.‚Äù

original: yang na 'jig rten brjod pa la //
analyzed: yang na 'jig rten brjod pa la //
translated: Or, in the expression of the world,

original: rjes dpag med par brjod pa yin //
analyzed: rjes dpag med par brjod pa yin //
translated: it is said to be without inference.

original: des ni rjes su dpag pa las //
analyzed: des ni rjes su dpag pa las //
translated: By that, from inference,

original: grags pa tha dad yul can nyid //
analyzed: grags pa tha dad yul can nyid //
translated: it has a different object of renown.

original: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: By ‚Äúthat‚Äù and so on.

original: gang la thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang la thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not common,

original: rjes su dpag pa med ces bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel lo //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa med ces bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba dang 'brel lo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthere is no inference‚Äù is connected with the phrase ‚Äúto prove.‚Äù

original: zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid la dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa dngos po sgrub pa la ston pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid la dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa dngos po sgrub pa la ston pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no inference based on the force of real entities that can prove the existence of the object denoted by the word ‚Äúmoon.‚Äù

original: gal te sgrub par byed pa'i rjes su dpag pa med na /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed pa'i rjes su dpag pa med na /
translated: If there is no inference to prove the existence of the object denoted by the word ‚Äúmoon,‚Äù

original: 'o na gang gis zlog par byed pa la gnod pa byed ce na /
analyzed: 'o na gang gis zlog par byed pa la gnod pa byed ce na /
translated: then what is it that you are refuting when you say that the word ‚Äúmoon‚Äù does not denote a nonentity?

original: med pa ni 'gal ba'i don sgra las byung ba'i grags pas gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: med pa ni 'gal ba'i don sgra las byung ba'i grags pas gsal ba yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúnonentity‚Äù is a well-known term that expresses the meaning of contradiction.

original: rjes su dpag pa 'gog pa 'dis ni dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa 'gog pa 'dis ni dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This refutation of inference shows that it is not an inference based on the force of real entities.

original: gal te 'di rjes su dpag pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di rjes su dpag pa yin na /
translated: If this is an inference,

original: rjes su dpag pa 'gog pas bzlog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa 'gog pas bzlog par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is refuted by the refutation of inference.

original: rjes su dpag par mi 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par mi 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that we do not accept it as an inference.

original: 'gro la grags pa rang bzhin rtags //
analyzed: 'gro la grags pa rang bzhin rtags //
translated: It is a well-known inference for the world.

original: zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said,üîΩ‚ÄúThe mind is the creator of all.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar 'di sgra las byung ba'i grags pa tsam 'ba' zhig gnod par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di sgra las byung ba'i grags pa tsam 'ba' zhig gnod par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, it is only the mere renown that arises from words that is refuted.

original: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not an inference that engages through the power of the fact.

original: rung ba tsam nyid na mngon du phyogs par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba tsam nyid na mngon du phyogs par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: If it is merely suitable, it is not possible for it to appear.

original: de la ni dngos po tsam snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ni dngos po tsam snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because only the mere thing appears to it.

original: 'on te yang gal te rnam par mi rtog pa yin pa'i phyir dngos po tsam snang ba yin gyi brjod bya rjod byed kyi ngo bo ma yin na /
analyzed: 'on te yang gal te rnam par mi rtog pa yin pa'i phyir dngos po tsam snang ba yin gyi brjod bya rjod byed kyi ngo bo ma yin na /
translated: If you say that it is because it is nonconceptual that only the mere thing appears and not the nature of the expressed and expresser,

original: 'o na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang mi snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang mi snang ba nyid do //
translated: then the state of being cause and effect would not appear to it.

original: de la ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang yin pa de bzhin du brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang yin pa de bzhin du brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po yang yin no zhe na /
translated: Just as the state of being cause and effect is, so too is the state of being the expressed and expresser.

original: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di thams cad kyi yul yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di thams cad kyi yul yin gyi /
translated: This is true, but the state of being cause and effect is the object of that consciousness.

original: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not a thing that is the expressed and the expresser.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / brjod bya rjod byed ngo bo 'di //
analyzed: 'di ltar / brjod bya rjod byed ngo bo 'di //
translated: This nature of the expressed and the expresser

original: yul dang dus kyis mi gzhan 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: yul dang dus kyis mi gzhan 'jug pa yin //
translated: Is the engagement of another through place and time.

original: dngos po de la ci //
analyzed: dngos po de la ci //
translated: What is that thing?

original: rgyu 'bras nyid yod ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras nyid yod ma yin no //
translated: It does not exist as cause and effect.

original: @185a * // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la gal te don dam par mngon sum gyi tshad mas ma grub pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: @185a * // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la gal te don dam par mngon sum gyi tshad mas ma grub pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even though the nature of cause and effect is not established by the valid knowledge of direct perception in an ultimate sense,

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag la bye brag med par grub pa'i dbang gis na mngon sum lta bur snang ngo //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag la bye brag med par grub pa'i dbang gis na mngon sum lta bur snang ngo //
translated: it appears as if it were direct perception due to the power of being established without distinction for all transmigrating beings.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / nga yis sngon mthong du ba de //
analyzed: 'di ltar / nga yis sngon mthong du ba de //
translated: The smoke that I saw before

original: me yi rgyu dang ldan pa yin //üîΩgzhan du 'di nyid 'di zhes pa'i //
analyzed: me yi rgyu dang ldan pa yin // gzhan du 'di nyid 'di zhes pa'i //
translated: Is endowed with the cause of fire.üîΩOtherwise, how could the cognition

original: shes pa skye bar ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: shes pa skye bar ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is just that‚Äù arise?

original: gal te sngar ma brtags pa de lta na yang ngas sngar mthong ba nyid do //
analyzed: gal te sngar ma brtags pa de lta na yang ngas sngar mthong ba nyid do //
translated: Even though it was not examined before, it is just what I saw before.

original: 'o na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well then, direct perception would be conceptual.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: sngar rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sngar rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: because previously there was no conceptualization.

original: rnam par rtog pa med bzhin bdag gis mthong ngo zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med bzhin bdag gis mthong ngo zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood that ‚ÄúI saw it without conceptualization.‚Äù

original: dus gzhan du byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i sngar byung ba'i mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bas pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: dus gzhan du byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i sngar byung ba'i mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bas pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: A conceptualization that occurs at another time is not the cause of the sign of a prior perception that is without conceptualization,

original: de dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not related to that.

original: gal te phyis kyi dus su byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yul med pa nyid yin pas ci ltar na des rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du rnam par 'jog /
analyzed: gal te phyis kyi dus su byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yul med pa nyid yin pas ci ltar na des rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du rnam par 'jog /
translated: If the conceptualization that occurs at a later time does not have an object, how can it be posited as without conceptualization?

original: 'das pa'i yul ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'das pa'i yul ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: A past object does not become manifest,

original: des na ji ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du rnam par 'jog ce na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: des na ji ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du rnam par 'jog ce na / ma yin te /
translated: so how can it be posited as without conceptualization?

original: mi dmigs pa 'das pa'i yul can nyid du mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa 'das pa'i yul can nyid du mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is not contradictory that nonapprehension has a past object.

original: 'di ltar 'das pa dang da ltar bar sgrub pa po'i mngon sum log pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'das pa dang da ltar bar sgrub pa po'i mngon sum log pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the non-observation that has the characteristic of the cessation of the direct perception of the agent in the past and present establishes the term non-existent.

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad mtha' dag ni de lta bu nyid de /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad mtha' dag ni de lta bu nyid de /
translated: All worldly conventions are just like that.

original: de ltar ma yin na tha snyad med par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na tha snyad med par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If it were not so, then there would be no conventions.

original: 'ga' yang 'dug par yang mi bya 'gro bar yang mi bya bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde'i phyir / gang tshe 'das dang da ltar gyi //
analyzed: 'ga' yang 'dug par yang mi bya 'gro bar yang mi bya bar 'gyur ro // de'i phyir / gang tshe 'das dang da ltar gyi //
translated: One would not do anything, nor would one go anywhere.üîΩTherefore,üîΩwhen the direct perception of the past and present

original: mngon sum log par 'gyur ba la //
analyzed: mngon sum log par 'gyur ba la //
translated: ceases,

original: rtogs pa po yi dran pa yi //
analyzed: rtogs pa po yi dran pa yi //
translated: the recollection of the cognizer

original: 'du byed rmongs pa med gyur pa //üîΩde tshe des ni med gyur pa'i //
analyzed: 'du byed rmongs pa med gyur pa // de tshe des ni med gyur pa'i //
translated: is not confused with respect to the formative forces.üîΩThen, by that,

original: tha snyad rab tu 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: tha snyad rab tu 'jug pa yin //
translated: the engagement of the convention of non-existence occurs.

original: dngos po 'di rnams bcad par ni //
analyzed: dngos po 'di rnams bcad par ni //
translated: The cessation of these things

original: 'gro ba kun la 'grub pa yi //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la 'grub pa yi //
translated: is established for all migrating beings.

original: brjod par bya ba dang / rjod par byed pa'i dngos po ni ngas mngon sum gyis bzung ngo zhes rtogs pa su yang med do //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang / rjod par byed pa'i dngos po ni ngas mngon sum gyis bzung ngo zhes rtogs pa su yang med do //
translated: No one has the idea that the thing that is expressed and the thing that expresses are apprehended by me in a direct perception.üîΩFor,

original: 'di ltar ; mthong ba tsam gyis ma bstan par //
analyzed: 'di ltar ; mthong ba tsam gyis ma bstan par //
translated: Without being taught, one does not know

original: sgra don brjod bya rjod byed du //üîΩ'dzin min bstan pa de yang ni //
analyzed: sgra don brjod bya rjod byed du // 'dzin min bstan pa de yang ni //
translated: that the word refers to the object.üîΩAnd that teaching is not

original: de ltar nyid du rtogs pa med //
analyzed: de ltar nyid du rtogs pa med //
translated: known in that way.

original: mthong ba med pa nye bar bstan pa 'di ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba med pa nye bar bstan pa 'di ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: This teaching of non-apprehension of seeing is the expressed.

original: 'di ni rjod par byed pa'o zhes sgra dang don dag 'brel pa rtogs pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: 'di ni rjod par byed pa'o zhes sgra dang don dag 'brel pa rtogs pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no one who knows the connection between the word and the object, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is the expresser and this is the expressed.‚Äù

original: nye bar bstan @185b pa yang gal te 'ga' zhig smra ba na 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: nye bar bstan @185b pa yang gal te 'ga' zhig smra ba na 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: If the teaching is spoken by someone, then it is just a desire.

original: gzhan du na 'chad pa'i rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'chad pa'i rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, there would be no conceptualization of explanation.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni gzhan du bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni gzhan du bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The relation of cause and effect cannot be established in another way.

original: gal te ming gi las ni mngon sum zhes //
analyzed: gal te ming gi las ni mngon sum zhes //
translated: If the activity of the name is direct perception,

original: bye brag pa dag rjod par byed //
analyzed: bye brag pa dag rjod par byed //
translated: the Vai≈õe·π£ikas say.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni mchod sbyin zhes//
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni mchod sbyin zhes//
translated: Thus, this is a sacrifice.

original: dngos po'i brda yi dus su ni //
analyzed: dngos po'i brda yi dus su ni //
translated: At the time of the convention of the thing,

original: mthong zhing thos na de bzhin du //
analyzed: mthong zhing thos na de bzhin du //
translated: if one sees and hears,

original: mngon sum nyid las rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid las rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: then one understands from direct perception.

original: brda byed pa'i dus na gang gi tshe lhas byin la sogs pa ming bya bar 'dod pa'i yul gyi dngos po mdun na gnas pa mthong ba dang / lhas byin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rna ba'i yul du dpyod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: brda byed pa'i dus na gang gi tshe lhas byin la sogs pa ming bya bar 'dod pa'i yul gyi dngos po mdun na gnas pa mthong ba dang / lhas byin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rna ba'i yul du dpyod pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the one who makes the convention sees the thing that is the object of the desire to designate a name, such as Devadatta, standing in front, and analyzes the object of the ear, such as ‚ÄúDevadatta,‚Äù at that time,

original: tha snyad byed pa'i skye bo dag 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes nges pa yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad byed pa'i skye bo dag 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes nges pa yin no //
translated: the people who make the convention ascertain, ‚ÄúThis is his name.‚Äù

original: rigs tha dad pa mngon sum gyis gzung ba dag la 'brel pa nges par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs tha dad pa mngon sum gyis gzung ba dag la 'brel pa nges par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the ascertainment of the connection between the apprehended objects of different types of direct perception is not ascertained.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gzhan du dran dang myong ba dang / phan tshun du ni 'brel 'gyur bar //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gzhan du dran dang myong ba dang / phan tshun du ni 'brel 'gyur bar //
translated: The memory and experience of another

original: yongs su nges par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: yongs su nges par mi 'gyur te //
translated: would not be ascertained.

original: rigs mi mthun par gnas phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun par gnas phyir ro //
translated: Because they would exist in different types.

original: de ni de ltar ma yin te //
analyzed: de ni de ltar ma yin te //
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar gal te ming can dag /'brel pa mngon sum gyis 'dzin na //üîΩdus gzhan dag tu gzhan nyid du //
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te ming can dag /'brel pa mngon sum gyis 'dzin na // dus gzhan dag tu gzhan nyid du //
translated: If the connection between the name and the named were apprehended by perception,

original: 'dzin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then at another time, it would not be apprehended as different.

original: gal te ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa mngon sum gyi tshad mas rtogs pa yin na ;
analyzed: gal te ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa mngon sum gyi tshad mas rtogs pa yin na ;
translated: If the connection between the name and the named were understood by the valid knowledge of perception,

original: ci ltar yul gzhan du mi gzhan la gzhan du 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ltar yul gzhan du mi gzhan la gzhan du 'gyur /
translated: then how could it be different in another place or in another person?

original: mngon sum gyis grub pa ni sngon po la sogs pa 'am /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis grub pa ni sngon po la sogs pa 'am /
translated: What is established by perception is either blue, etc.,

original: dngos po dang 'brel pa gzhan yang rung ste /
analyzed: dngos po dang 'brel pa gzhan yang rung ste /
translated: or it is a connection with an entity, or something else,

original: gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: but it is not different.üîΩIn the same way, the understanding of the name and the named is seen to be associated with the indication.

original: de bzhin du ming dang ming can gyi rtogs pa ni nye bar bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan par mthong ba nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ming dang ming can gyi rtogs pa ni nye bar bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan par mthong ba nyid do //
translated: Thus,

original: 'di ltar / re zhig 'di yi ming 'di zhes //
analyzed: 'di ltar / re zhig 'di yi ming 'di zhes //
translated: First, this is its name.

original: 'dis brjod 'di ni gsal nyid de //
analyzed: 'dis brjod 'di ni gsal nyid de //
translated: This is expressed by this. This is just the manifestation.

original: 'di yi ming 'di yin nyid de //
analyzed: 'di yi ming 'di yin nyid de //
translated: This is just the name of this.

original: yongs su gsal bar mi shes so //
analyzed: yongs su gsal bar mi shes so //
translated: It is not fully understood.

original: res 'ga' 'di ni dus gzhan tshe //
analyzed: res 'ga' 'di ni dus gzhan tshe //
translated: Sometimes, at another time,

original: gzhan nyid / du ni byed par 'gyur //üîΩgzhan dang gzhan du 'dod pa zhes //
analyzed: gzhan nyid / du ni byed par 'gyur // gzhan dang gzhan du 'dod pa zhes //
translated: How could it be otherwise?üîΩWhat is the point of denying

original: bya ba gang gis 'gog par byed //
analyzed: bya ba gang gis 'gog par byed //
translated: what is accepted as it is?

original: bdag kyang 'di lta nyid zhugs te //
analyzed: bdag kyang 'di lta nyid zhugs te //
translated: I too am engaged in this very same

original: 'dod pa 'ga' yang gang gis kyang //
analyzed: 'dod pa 'ga' yang gang gis kyang //
translated: desire,

original: dgag par tshang ba nyid yin yang //
analyzed: dgag par tshang ba nyid yin yang //
translated: but I am not able to stop it

original: nam yang nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nam yang nus pa ma yin no //
translated: in any way whatsoever.

original: gal te dang po dang tha mar gnas thur du skyes bu gsum gyi rjes su song ba can dgra bo la med pa'i ming gang gis phar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i rigs @186a * //
analyzed: gal te dang po dang tha mar gnas thur du skyes bu gsum gyi rjes su song ba can dgra bo la med pa'i ming gang gis phar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i rigs @186a * //
translated: If the first and last are the same, and the middle is the same as the three, then by what reason is it said that the name of the enemy is not to be uttered?

original: pas ci ltar 'dod pa mi bzlog ce na /
analyzed: pas ci ltar 'dod pa mi bzlog ce na /
translated: How can desire be averted as one wishes?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: de'i mtshan ma nyid dang ldan pa dang du ma nyid yin pas ci ltar log /'di yang nye bar bstan pa tsam ste /
analyzed: de'i mtshan ma nyid dang ldan pa dang du ma nyid yin pas ci ltar log /'di yang nye bar bstan pa tsam ste /
translated: Since it has the characteristic of that and is manifold, how can it be averted? This is merely an illustration;

original: 'di las 'das te nye bar stan par ma mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di las 'das te nye bar stan par ma mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not that nothing else is seen beyond this.

original: des na ming gi las ni mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: des na ming gi las ni mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the function of the name is not direct.

original: de'i phyir brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ltar ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ltar ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the expressed and the expresser are not like the things that are cause and effect.

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
translated: Inference based on what is renowned from statements is not inference that engages by the power of things.üîΩIt is not a separate type of inference

original: des ni dngos rnams yod med pa'i //üîΩrjes su 'jug can rjes dpag las //üîΩtha dad de dbang mi 'jug pa //
analyzed: des ni dngos rnams yod med pa'i // rjes su 'jug can rjes dpag las // tha dad de dbang mi 'jug pa //
translated: that engages the existent and the nonexistent.

original: de 'dod las skyes yin zhes bstan //
analyzed: de 'dod las skyes yin zhes bstan //
translated: It is taught that it arises from desire.

original: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpog pa 'di ni 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i grags pa'i rjes su dpog pa 'di ni 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa yin la /
translated: This inference based on what is renowned from statements engages by mere desire.

original: dngos po'i stobs kyis byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i stobs kyis byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not arise by the power of things.

original: des na dngos po go bar byed pa ma yin no //üîΩme la sbyin sreg sogs sgra la //
analyzed: des na dngos po go bar byed pa ma yin no // me la sbyin sreg sogs sgra la //
translated: Therefore it does not make things known.üîΩJust as the meaning of ‚Äúfire sacrifice‚Äù

original: ci ltar don 'di brtags pa ltar //üîΩde bzhin khyi sha la sogs pa //
analyzed: ci ltar don 'di brtags pa ltar // de bzhin khyi sha la sogs pa //
translated: is imputed in dependence on the words,üîΩso too you should impute

original: gzhan yang 'dod pas brtags par gyis //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pas brtags par gyis //
translated: the meaning of ‚Äúdog meat‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dod pas brtags pa la brten pa can gyi don dag la dngos po nges pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'dod pas brtags pa la brten pa can gyi don dag la dngos po nges pa ci zhig yod /
translated: What certainty is there in things that are based on what is imagined by desire?

original: 'on te ma mthong ba dang 'gal ba mi rtog ste /
analyzed: 'on te ma mthong ba dang 'gal ba mi rtog ste /
translated: Or, if one does not conceive of what is not seen as contradictory,

original: gzhan rtog na ni ma mthong ba bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin no //üîΩgang du 'di rtogs mngon 'dod pa'i //
analyzed: gzhan rtog na ni ma mthong ba bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin no // gang du 'di rtogs mngon 'dod pa'i //
translated: then if something else is conceived, it is not taught that one does not see.üîΩWhere is there any attainment of the result

original: 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba med //
translated: that is desired by one who understands this?

original: de lta min na ming gis ni //
analyzed: de lta min na ming gis ni //
translated: If it were otherwise, then by mere name

original: kun gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: kun gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: everything would be accomplished for everyone.

original: zhe na / de ni bden te nged kyang de ltar dam bca' ba yin no //
analyzed: zhe na / de ni bden te nged kyang de ltar dam bca' ba yin no //
translated: We agree with that, and we also hold that position.

original: 'on kyang khyed cag nyid don med par 'di gzhag pa la sbugs chen por 'jug par zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang khyed cag nyid don med par 'di gzhag pa la sbugs chen por 'jug par zad do //
translated: However, you alone are greatly confused about this useless matter.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / gal te don ni brgyud pa yis ;üîΩ/ nges pa la ni sdod byed na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te don ni brgyud pa yis ; / nges pa la ni sdod byed na //
translated: If the meaning is to be ascertained through a derivation,

original: de nyid nye bar bstan par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid nye bar bstan par 'gyur //
translated: then that itself should be taught.

original: don la long ba brgyud pa nyid //
analyzed: don la long ba brgyud pa nyid //
translated: The derivation is blind with regard to the meaning.

original: gal te don ni rig byed pa //
analyzed: gal te don ni rig byed pa //
translated: If the meaning is to be known through the Veda,

original: dbang po las 'das mthong yod na //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das mthong yod na //
translated: then if the Veda is seen to be beyond the senses,

original: de ltar yin na phan tshun du //
analyzed: de ltar yin na phan tshun du //
translated: In that case, there would be mutual

original: 'gal ba pa ni nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gal ba pa ni nyid du 'gyur //
translated: contradiction.

original: khyed las dbang po las 'das pa mthong ba gzhan yod pa'i skabs rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no //
analyzed: khyed las dbang po las 'das pa mthong ba gzhan yod pa'i skabs rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no //
translated: For you, it is not difficult to find an opportunity to see something that is beyond the senses.

original: 'o na don 'di yang 'ga' zhig gis brtags pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'o na don 'di yang 'ga' zhig gis brtags pa nyid yin no //
translated: But this matter is also imagined by some.

original: de nyid kyis yid ches pa ma yin pas na gzhan dag kyang brtag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis yid ches pa ma yin pas na gzhan dag kyang brtag par bya ba yin no //
translated: Since it is not credible by itself, others should also investigate it.

original: rang gi shes pas de mi shes pa la bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi shes pas de mi shes pa la bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is taught to those who do not know it through their own understanding.

original: de nyid shes mod khyod la dpyad pas ci bya //
analyzed: de nyid shes mod khyod la dpyad pas ci bya //
translated: If you know it, what is the use of analysis for you?

original: de ma dpyad par slu @186b bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang 'gyur des na sems so zhe na /üîΩ'o na nye bar bstan pa tsam gyis yid ches pa 'or cig / rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi rjes su mthun par rtog go zhe na /
analyzed: de ma dpyad par slu @186b bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang 'gyur des na sems so zhe na / 'o na nye bar bstan pa tsam gyis yid ches pa 'or cig / rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi rjes su mthun par rtog go zhe na /
translated: If it is not analyzed, it is called deceptive. Therefore, it is the mind.üîΩThen, give up the idea that it is credible just through demonstration.üîΩIt is imagined in accordance with the nature and conditions.

original: rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi don de yang nye bar bstan pa nyid las grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi don de yang nye bar bstan pa nyid las grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: But is the meaning of nature and conditions not established by the demonstration itself?

original: des na de yang sbyor ba mthong ba nyid las bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: des na de yang sbyor ba mthong ba nyid las bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, that also is to be established from the seeing of the proof.

original: sbyor ba yang rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi don las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi don las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And the proof is born from the meaning of the nature and the condition.

original: long ba brgyud pa dang phan tshun brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: long ba brgyud pa dang phan tshun brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is a series of blind men, and mutually dependent.

original: de ltar na chos su mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na chos su mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Thus, it is not a phenomenon.

original: 'di la bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: gzhan yang de ltar na chos su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang nye bar bstan pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de ltar na chos su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang nye bar bstan pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Moreover, this is also taught as ‚Äúthus it is a phenomenon.‚Äù Therefore, this is mere quibbling.

original: gal te ri bong can ni zla ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te ri bong can ni zla ba yin no //
translated: If the rabbit-possessor is the moon,

original: yod pa'i phyir grub pa'i brjod bya bzhin no //
analyzed: yod pa'i phyir grub pa'i brjod bya bzhin no //
translated: it exists, like the expressed object.

original: des na rjes su dpag pa 'di ji ltar dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa 'di ji ltar dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how is this inference not engaged by the power of the fact?

original: 'di la bshad zin te /
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin te /
translated: This has already been explained.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / ri bong can zlar mi 'dod par //
analyzed: gzhan yang / ri bong can zlar mi 'dod par //
translated: without asserting the rabbit-possessor as the moon,

original: de grags gang zhig 'dod par 'gyur //
analyzed: de grags gang zhig 'dod par 'gyur //
translated: what is renowned as that?

original: de phyir de la dpe med can //
analyzed: de phyir de la dpe med can //
translated: Therefore, it is without example.

original: de ni thun mong ma yin 'dod //
analyzed: de ni thun mong ma yin 'dod //
translated: It is asserted to be unique.

original: grags pa mtha' dag spong bar byed pa la //
analyzed: grags pa mtha' dag spong bar byed pa la //
translated: and it is not accepted that the rabbit-haver is the moon.

original: dpe med pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa med la zhes bshad zin pa yin no //
analyzed: dpe med pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa med la zhes bshad zin pa yin no //
translated: It has already been explained that the inference is not accepted because it is not an example and because it is not common.

original: ri bong can zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin par 'gro ba mtha' dag gi grags pa las 'byung ba de ltar mi 'dod pa de ni grags pa gzhan yang mi 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ri bong can zla ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin par 'gro ba mtha' dag gi grags pa las 'byung ba de ltar mi 'dod pa de ni grags pa gzhan yang mi 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di grub pa yin no //
translated: The entire world knows that the moon is the one to be referred to by the word ‚Äúrabbit-haver,‚Äù but you do not accept that. This is the point that is established.

original: des na yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni de la ltos te dpe med pa can yin no //
analyzed: des na yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni de la ltos te dpe med pa can yin no //
translated: Therefore, the inference that the rabbit-haver exists, etc., is not accepted because it is not an example.

original: de la gtan tshigs thams cad kyang thun mong ma yin pa nyid do zhes bshad zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs thams cad kyang thun mong ma yin pa nyid do zhes bshad zin pa nyid do //
translated: It has already been explained that all reasons are not accepted as common.

original: des na ri bong can zla ba ma yin te /
analyzed: des na ri bong can zla ba ma yin te /

original: de ci ltar gzhan la rnam pa gzhan du 'jug /'jug bzhin par mthong ba des na 'jug pa zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na /üîΩma yin te /üîΩ'dod pa tsam gyis bcug zin pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ci ltar gzhan la rnam pa gzhan du 'jug /'jug bzhin par mthong ba des na 'jug pa zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na / ma yin te / 'dod pa tsam gyis bcug zin pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?üîΩBut if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?

original: 'dod pa tsam gyis zhugs pa las khyad par gzhan mthong ba ni med do //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyis zhugs pa las khyad par gzhan mthong ba ni med do //
translated: But if one engages in it through its intrinsic reality, then how could one be turned away from it through any other intrinsic reality?

original: 'dod pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because the object of desire is not perceived.

original: ma dmigs pa 'di ni 'das pa'i 'dod pa la yang srid pa yin no //
analyzed: ma dmigs pa 'di ni 'das pa'i 'dod pa la yang srid pa yin no //
translated: This nonperception is possible also in regard to past desire.

original: ma dmigs pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi gnod pa byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma dmigs pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi gnod pa byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This nonperception does not negate all desire,

original: da ltar nye bar gnas pa'i khyad par nyid kyis gnod par byed pa yin gyi thams cad kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar nye bar gnas pa'i khyad par nyid kyis gnod par byed pa yin gyi thams cad kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: because it negates only the desire that is present, not all desire.

original: de'i phyir gal te 'dir 'das nas yun ring du lon pa 'ga' zhig gi 'dod pa byung ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te 'dir 'das nas yun ring du lon pa 'ga' zhig gi 'dod pa byung ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, if desire arises here in regard to something that has long since passed,

original: de'i nye bar bstan pa las da ltar ba rnams tha snyad byed pa'i phyir 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de'i nye bar bstan pa las da ltar ba rnams tha snyad byed pa'i phyir 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
translated: and if one engages in verbal and physical actions on the basis of that memory, what contradiction is there?

original: des na rgyu mtshan bzhin du rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa la yang 'dod pas 'jug pa yin pas rgyu mtshan brtags pa don med pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: des na rgyu mtshan bzhin du rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa la yang 'dod pas 'jug pa yin pas rgyu mtshan brtags pa don med pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Thus, just as one engages in desire on the basis of a reason, one also engages in desire on the basis of one who possesses a reason. Therefore, what is the point of investigating the reason?

original: gzhan dag smra ba ni sngar rgyu mtshan la zhugs pa'i phyis rgyu mtshan can la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag smra ba ni sngar rgyu mtshan la zhugs pa'i phyis rgyu mtshan can la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Others say: One does not first engage in desire on the basis of a reason and then later engage in desire on the basis of one who possesses a reason.

original: rim gyis 'jug pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim gyis 'jug pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the gradual engagement is not seen.

original: gal te dngos po nyid dang ba lang nyid ces rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig la yang 'jug par @188b mthong ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po nyid dang ba lang nyid ces rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig la yang 'jug par @188b mthong ba nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the very thing itself is engaged, such as the cow itself, because the reason is seen,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de ni sgra gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni sgra gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is another word.

original: gang zhig gang la sbyar ba de ni de'i rjod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la sbyar ba de ni de'i rjod par byed pa yin te /
translated: That which is applied to something is the expression of that,

original: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po thams cad ni sbyor ba mthong ba'i stabs las byung bar 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po thams cad ni sbyor ba mthong ba'i stabs las byung bar 'grub pa yin no //
translated: because the relation of expressed and expresser is established by the method of seeing the application.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par rtogs na ni dngos po'i rkyen gyi mtha' can rdzas la 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par rtogs na ni dngos po'i rkyen gyi mtha' can rdzas la 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: If one understands the concomitance and the reverse concomitance, then the engagement with the substance is only in the context of the condition of the thing.

original: dngos po'i rkyen dang bral na rdzas la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rkyen dang bral na rdzas la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when it is free from the condition of the thing, it is the engagement with the substance.

original: ci ste rdzas la 'jug pa ci ltar dngos po'i rkyen yod na rgyu mtshan tsam rjod par byed pa yin /
analyzed: ci ste rdzas la 'jug pa ci ltar dngos po'i rkyen yod na rgyu mtshan tsam rjod par byed pa yin /
translated: If it is the engagement with the substance, how is it that when the condition of the thing exists, it expresses only the reason?

original: gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan tsam la 'jug pa de'i tshe ni dngos po'i rkyen don de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i phyir rigs pa yin no ;
analyzed: gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan tsam la 'jug pa de'i tshe ni dngos po'i rkyen don de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i phyir rigs pa yin no ;
translated: When one is concerned with the mere reason, then it is a principle, because it makes clear the very object which is the condition of the thing.

original: / dngos po'i rkyen med par ni rdzas dang dngos po'i rjod pa'i ba lang gi sgra gnyis tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / dngos po'i rkyen med par ni rdzas dang dngos po'i rjod pa'i ba lang gi sgra gnyis tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Without the condition of the thing, one does not understand the difference between the two words, ‚Äúsubstance‚Äù and ‚Äúthing.‚Äù

original: des na dngos po'i rkyen gyis rnam par 'byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na dngos po'i rkyen gyis rnam par 'byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is the condition of the thing which makes the distinction.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: rkyen thams cad ni rang gi don nyid 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rkyen thams cad ni rang gi don nyid 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: For, all conditions do not engage in their own meaning.

original: rdzas la 'jug pa de gnyis la dngos po'i rkyen byas nas de'i khyad par rgyu mtshan rtogs pa'i phyir 'gal ba 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: rdzas la 'jug pa de gnyis la dngos po'i rkyen byas nas de'i khyad par rgyu mtshan rtogs pa'i phyir 'gal ba 'ga' yang med do //
translated: In the case of the two, the engagement in substance, having made the condition of the thing, there is no contradiction at all in understanding the reason for its distinction.

original: rang bzhin dang rkyen gyis rnam par dbye ba ni don dam pa yang yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rkyen gyis rnam par dbye ba ni don dam pa yang yin te /
translated: The distinction by nature and by condition is also ultimate,

original: sbyor ba las tshogs pa nyid rjod byed du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba las tshogs pa nyid rjod byed du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: for in the application, the collection is understood as the expression.

original: rang bzhin dang rkyen la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni byis pas rtogs par bya ba'i don du rnam pa 'ba' zhig ltar brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rkyen la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni byis pas rtogs par bya ba'i don du rnam pa 'ba' zhig ltar brtags pa yin te /
translated: The analysis into nature, conditions, etc. is merely a conceptual imputation in order to make it easy for the childish to understand.

original: de lta ma yin na byis pas bde blag tu rtogs par bya mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na byis pas bde blag tu rtogs par bya mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be impossible for the childish to understand.

original: des na rgyu mtshan la brten nas rgyu mtshan can la 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: des na rgyu mtshan la brten nas rgyu mtshan can la 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, this so-called engagement in the referent based on the reason has no validity whatsoever.

original: gzhan dag smra ba ni sgra ni rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa nyid la 'jug go //
analyzed: gzhan dag smra ba ni sgra ni rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa nyid la 'jug go //
translated: Others say: The word engages the possession of the reason.

original: rgyu mtshan ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa bzhin du rnam par gcod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa bzhin du rnam par gcod par byed pa yin te /
translated: The reason is a distinguisher, like the inexpressible.

original: rgyu mtshan de las 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan de las 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhe'o //
translated: It is not that it arises from that reason.üîΩThat is not so.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: Thus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te la lar de grub na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te la lar de grub na //
translated: If it is established in some way,

original: de ni dngos stobs las grub yin //
analyzed: de ni dngos stobs las grub yin //
translated: it is established by the power of fact.

original: rtogs pas grub par khas len na //
analyzed: rtogs pas grub par khas len na //
translated: If you accept that it is established by understanding,

original: ri bong can la'ang bzlog med phyir //
analyzed: ri bong can la'ang bzlog med phyir //
translated: then it cannot be averted even in regard to the rabbit‚Äôs horns.

original: gal te rgyu mtshan la lar grub na de ni dngos po'i stobs kyis grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te rgyu mtshan la lar grub na de ni dngos po'i stobs kyis grub pa yin no //
translated: If it is established in some cases, it is established by the power of the thing.

original: sgras rgyu mtshan ma rtogs na ji ltar des rnam par bcad pa la 'jug / gal te des rnam par bcad pa rtogs na de yang blo la gnas pas na ci ltar brjod par bya ba ma yin /
analyzed: sgras rgyu mtshan ma rtogs na ji ltar des rnam par bcad pa la 'jug / gal te des rnam par bcad pa rtogs na de yang blo la gnas pas na ci ltar brjod par bya ba ma yin /
translated: If the reason is not understood from the word, how can it be ascertained by the word? If it is ascertained by the word, then since it is present in the mind, how can it not be expressible?

original: rgyu mtshan can la sgras rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba nyid @189a * //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can la sgras rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba nyid @189a * //
translated: Since the word is understood in terms of the reason, it is indeed expressible.

original: yin la / de ni rgyu mtshan la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yin la / de ni rgyu mtshan la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: And that is the same for the reason.

original: 'on te rdza sa nyid gtso bor rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on te rdza sa nyid gtso bor rtogs pa yin la /
translated: But if the substance is understood as primary,

original: mngar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan ni rtogs su zin kyang brjod bya ma yin te /
analyzed: mngar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan ni rtogs su zin kyang brjod bya ma yin te /
translated: and the qualities such as sweetness are understood but not expressed,

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because they are understood by the invariable concomitance,

original: gtso bo phal pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: gtso bo phal pa la sogs pa /
translated: then the primary, ordinary, etc.

original: brjod 'dod med na mi 'byung yin //
analyzed: brjod 'dod med na mi 'byung yin //
translated: are not expressed, because they do not occur without desire to express.

original: gang gi dbang du byas na ni //
analyzed: gang gi dbang du byas na ni //
translated: From the perspective of which

original: 'jug pa de nyid gtso bor rigs //
analyzed: 'jug pa de nyid gtso bor rigs //
translated: it is reasonable that the primary alone occurs.

original: de la res 'ga' nyid ni mngar ba nyid gtso bo nyid yin la res 'ga' ni rdzas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la res 'ga' nyid ni mngar ba nyid gtso bo nyid yin la res 'ga' ni rdzas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sometimes sweetness is the principal thing, and sometimes the substance.

original: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni 'jig rten gyi rnam par gzhag pas yin no //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po ni 'jig rten gyi rnam par gzhag pas yin no //
translated: The relation of expressed and expresser is established by convention.

original: mngar bas don du gnyer yin na //
analyzed: mngar bas don du gnyer yin na //
translated: If you want sweetness,

original: rtag tu bu ram bza' bar gyis //
analyzed: rtag tu bu ram bza' bar gyis //
translated: always eat sugar.

original: gal te nad kyis don gnyer na //
analyzed: gal te nad kyis don gnyer na //
translated: If you want to cure a disease,

original: de yi don can sbrang rtsi zo //
analyzed: de yi don can sbrang rtsi zo //
translated: eat honey, which is good for that.

original: gang gi tshe lto la dan gyi rigs can gyi za ba po'i 'ga' zhig yod na de'i don du bu ram bstan pas mngar ba rtogs par byed la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe lto la dan gyi rigs can gyi za ba po'i 'ga' zhig yod na de'i don du bu ram bstan pas mngar ba rtogs par byed la /
translated: When there is a consumer who is a connoisseur, for his sake sugar is taught, and sweetness is understood.

original: gang gi tshe bad kan sel ba la sogs pa nus pa'i khyad par can sbrang rtsi la sogs pa 'ba' zhig ston par byed pa de'i tshe ni rdzas tsam bstan pa gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bad kan sel ba la sogs pa nus pa'i khyad par can sbrang rtsi la sogs pa 'ba' zhig ston par byed pa de'i tshe ni rdzas tsam bstan pa gtso bo yin no //
translated: But when only honey, which has the special ability to cure phlegm disorders, is taught, then the substance alone is taught, and that is the principal thing.

original: de'i phyir gnyis ka yang rtogs pa yin la //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis ka yang rtogs pa yin la //
translated: Therefore, both are understood.

original: gtso bo dang phal pa'i khyad par ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo dang phal pa'i khyad par ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: The difference between the principal and the secondary is that some are principal in some cases and secondary in other cases.üîΩThis is the analysis.

original: de la gnyis rtogs pa na rgyu mtshan gzhan ni med pa'i phyir grags pa tsam zhig lus pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gnyis rtogs pa na rgyu mtshan gzhan ni med pa'i phyir grags pa tsam zhig lus pa yin no //
translated: When one understands the two, the reason is not another, and so only the well-known remains.

original: ci ste yang rgyu mtshan ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang rgyu mtshan ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: But if the reason is merely an indication,

original: de brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not to be expressed.

original: dper na lhas byin gyi khyim gang yin zhes pa la /
analyzed: dper na lhas byin gyi khyim gang yin zhes pa la /
translated: For example, when one asks, ‚ÄúWhich is the house of Devadatta?‚Äù

original: gang na bya rog yod pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang na bya rog yod pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: and is told, ‚ÄúIt is the one where the crow is,‚Äù

original: bya rog kyang khyim gyi tshig gis brjod par bya ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bya rog kyang khyim gyi tshig gis brjod par bya ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: the crow is not to be expressed by the word ‚Äúhouse.‚Äù

original: ji ltar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa bzhin du de med kyang lhas byin gyi khyim nyid yin pa des na blang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: ji ltar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa bzhin du de med kyang lhas byin gyi khyim nyid yin pa des na blang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Just as it is not to be expressed, so it is not to be taken, even though it does not exist, because it is the house of Devadatta.

original: de bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa'i sgra la yang mi la sogs par ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa'i sgra la yang mi la sogs par ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, the word ‚Äúbrahmin‚Äù and so on would indicate a human being and so on.

original: bya rog gis de nye bar mtshon pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bya rog gis de nye bar mtshon pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not that the crow is the indicator,

original: de ni mi rtag pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: de ni mi rtag pa'i phyir ro//
translated: because it is impermanent.

original: rtog pa sngon du byed pa ni bya rog gis nye bar mtshon pa'i lha gang la sogs pa gzhan nyid rgyu mtshan du byed de /
analyzed: rtog pa sngon du byed pa ni bya rog gis nye bar mtshon pa'i lha gang la sogs pa gzhan nyid rgyu mtshan du byed de /
translated: The one who has the idea of the crow as the indicator would make another, the god and so on, the reason.

original: de lta ma yin na de tha snyad mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de tha snyad mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, that would not be established as a convention.

original: 'o na ji ltar brjod pa ma yin pa'i bya rog nye bar mtshon pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar brjod pa ma yin pa'i bya rog nye bar mtshon pa yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is the crow, which is not expressed, the indicator?

original: mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established by direct perception.

original: de nyid kyis ni 'di ni bya rog gi @189b sgra nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni 'di ni bya rog gi @189b sgra nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: By that very fact, it is indicated by the word ‚Äúcrow.‚Äù

original: rigs la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan la ni ston par byed pa'i rjod byed gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan la ni ston par byed pa'i rjod byed gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other expression that is the indicator for the reason of the class and so on.

original: de'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin yang rnam par gcod par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin yang rnam par gcod par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even though it is not expressed, it is the distinguisher.

original: zer ba ni gang zhig logs shig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: zer ba ni gang zhig logs shig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: That which is understood from something else is the expressed.

original: gang gi sgra de nyid las rtogs pa ni brjod par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi sgra de nyid las rtogs pa ni brjod par bya ba nyid do //
translated: That which is understood from the word itself is the object of expression.

original: sgras blo la skyed pa ni brjod bya nyid du bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde la sgras rtogs pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: sgras blo la skyed pa ni brjod bya nyid du bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro // de la sgras rtogs pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Because the production of the cognition by the word is the indication of the object of expression.

original: brjod bya nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brjod bya nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the understanding from the word, but not the object of expression,

original: rtogs pa grub par khas len na ni /
analyzed: rtogs pa grub par khas len na ni /
translated: then, if you accept that the understanding is established,

original: brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa nyid ri bong can la yang bzlog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa nyid ri bong can la yang bzlog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the non-object of expression cannot be denied even in the case of the rabbit‚Äôs horns.

original: rgyu mtshan bzhin du rgyu mtshan can la yang brjod bya nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan bzhin du rgyu mtshan can la yang brjod bya nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that, like the reason, the one having the reason would also not be the object of expression.

original: rtogs pa nyid las brjod bya yin na ni rgyu mtshan la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid las brjod bya yin na ni rgyu mtshan la yang mtshungs so //
translated: If the object of expression is from the understanding itself, then the reason is the same.

original: gal te til mar byin cig ces bya bas snod rtogs pa yin yang til gyi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te til mar byin cig ces bya bas snod rtogs pa yin yang til gyi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that, like the word ‚Äúgive sesame oil,‚Äù the container is understood, but is not the object of expression of the word ‚Äúsesame,‚Äù

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de thams cad kyi tshe rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thams cad kyi tshe rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at all those times, there is no understanding.

original: rang gi snod khyer 'ongs pa na yang til mar ster pa'i don du gnyer pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi snod khyer 'ongs pa na yang til mar ster pa'i don du gnyer pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And even when one brings one‚Äôs own vessel, it is possible that one is seeking to be given oil.

original: de'i phyir brjod bya ma yin pa sgra gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ni nye bar mtshon pa yin mi srid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod bya ma yin pa sgra gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ni nye bar mtshon pa yin mi srid do //
translated: Therefore, it is impossible that what is not to be expressed is not understood by another word.

original: mtshon par gyur pas ni 'ga' zhig mtshon par nus kyi /
analyzed: mtshon par gyur pas ni 'ga' zhig mtshon par nus kyi /
translated: When there is an indication, one can indicate something.

original: mtshon par gyur pa ma yin pas mtshon na ni /
analyzed: mtshon par gyur pa ma yin pas mtshon na ni /
translated: But if one indicates without an indication,

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: there would be an absurd consequence.

original: 'on te dang po des nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir phyis shin tu goms pa las de'i tshe de rtogs pa med kyang des rnam par bcad pa nyid la sgra 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dang po des nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir phyis shin tu goms pa las de'i tshe de rtogs pa med kyang des rnam par bcad pa nyid la sgra 'jug go zhe na /
translated: But if it is because it is indicated by the first, then later, through complete familiarity, at that time, even without understanding it, the word is used to eliminate that.

original: de lta na 'o na me la sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra khyi sha bza' ba la sogs pa la yang 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na me la sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra khyi sha bza' ba la sogs pa la yang 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then words such as ‚Äúfire sacrifice‚Äù would also be used for eating dog meat and so on.

original: bya rog bzhin du de la de'i rgyu mtshan zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya rog bzhin du de la de'i rgyu mtshan zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is like a crow, it has a reason for that name.

original: de lta ma yin na ci ltar ba lang gi sgras don dgu la 'jug pa de ni de la grags pa yin no zhe na /üîΩkhyi sha la yang yul dang dus gzhan du mi 'jug go zhes bya ba 'di gang las de'i phyir brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di dngos po 'di nges pa ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ci ltar ba lang gi sgras don dgu la 'jug pa de ni de la grags pa yin no zhe na / khyi sha la yang yul dang dus gzhan du mi 'jug go zhes bya ba 'di gang las de'i phyir brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di dngos po 'di nges pa ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: If it were not so, then how could the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù be applied to nine things? It is well known that it is so.üîΩBut even in the case of dog meat, it is not applied in other places and times.

original: 'dod pas bkod pa'i brda'i stobs pa brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pas bkod pa'i brda'i stobs pa brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the so-called signified and signifier are not definite things, because they are based on the power of the conventions established by desire.

original: des na rig byed skyes bus ma byas pa yin yang nyes pa dang ldan pa 'ga' yang ldog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na rig byed skyes bus ma byas pa yin yang nyes pa dang ldan pa 'ga' yang ldog pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, even though the Vedas are not created by a person, it is not the case that they are free from any faults.

original: thams cad la rung ba nyid bzlog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la rung ba nyid bzlog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible to refute their applicability to everything.

original: rung ba nyid dang 'gog pa la //
analyzed: rung ba nyid dang 'gog pa la //
translated: Refuting applicability and refuting nonapplicability

original: bdag @190a * //
analyzed: bdag @190a * //
translated: are not possible.

original: 'gog med las skyes pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gog med las skyes pa'i phyir //
translated: Because they arise from that which is not refuted.

original: grags yin bya ba'i rjes su dpag //
analyzed: grags yin bya ba'i rjes su dpag //
translated: The inference based on that is well known.

original: rung ba'i yul can gyis gnod byed //
analyzed: rung ba'i yul can gyis gnod byed //
translated: The refutation by one who has an applicable objectüîΩis not possible.

original: 'di ni brda rjes 'jug pa yi //üîΩsgra rnams la ni don ngas pa //
analyzed: 'di ni brda rjes 'jug pa yi // sgra rnams la ni don ngas pa //
translated: This is the mere repetition of a soundüîΩThat is not a meaning-revealer.

original: yod min ces brjod de dag rnams //
analyzed: yod min ces brjod de dag rnams //
translated: The meaning of the words is not understood.

original: der 'gog pa ni 'gal ba yin //
analyzed: der 'gog pa ni 'gal ba yin //
translated: The negation is contradicted by the object.

original: gang zhig khyi sha la sogs pa me la skyin sreg byed pa don ma yin no zhes bya ba de las rung ba nyid kyis yul can gyi rjes su dpag pas gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig khyi sha la sogs pa me la skyin sreg byed pa don ma yin no zhes bya ba de las rung ba nyid kyis yul can gyi rjes su dpag pas gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If someone were to say that it is meaningless to burn dog-meat in a fire, he would be contradicted by the inference based on the object, namely, the suitability of the action.

original: 'di ltar brda tsam gyis 'jug pa'i sgra rnams la ni don nges pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar brda tsam gyis 'jug pa'i sgra rnams la ni don nges pa med pa nyid do //
translated: For, the meaning of words that are used merely as conventional expressions is not ascertained.

original: brjod par bya ba gcig kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang nges pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba gcig kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang nges pa ci zhig yod /
translated: And what is the certainty that only one thing is to be expressed?

original: de la gang dag khyi sha za bar rtogs pa ni grags pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba de ni brgal zhing brtag par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de la gang dag khyi sha za bar rtogs pa ni grags pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba de ni brgal zhing brtag par bya ba yin te /
translated: As for those who say that the idea of eating dog-meat contradicts what is well known, they should be asked this:

original: rig byed skyes bus ma byas so zhes bya ba 'di yang grags pas gnod pa yin te /
analyzed: rig byed skyes bus ma byas so zhes bya ba 'di yang grags pas gnod pa yin te /
translated: The Vedas are not composed by a person‚Äîthis is contradicted by what is well known.

original: gang gi phyir rig gi ri la ni rig gi rig byed byas pa las ma ni ni sa ri la byas so zhes grags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rig gi ri la ni rig gi rig byed byas pa las ma ni ni sa ri la byas so zhes grags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mountain of knowledge is known to be the mountain of knowledge, and the mother is known to be the mountain of earth.

original: 'on te byas pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te byas pa ni /
translated: But if the word ‚Äúmade‚Äù

original: dran pa la 'jug pa yin gyi bsgrub pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa la 'jug pa yin gyi bsgrub pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: refers to memory, not to establishment.

original: 'di ltar legs par byas pa la yang byed pa'i sgra mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar legs par byas pa la yang byed pa'i sgra mthong ste /
translated: For the word ‚Äúmade‚Äù is seen in the case of good action as well,

original: rgyab tu gyis shig rkang par gyis shig ces bya ba bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: rgyab tu gyis shig rkang par gyis shig ces bya ba bzhin no zhe na /
translated: just as in the expressions ‚Äúmake it behind,‚Äù ‚Äúmake it in front.‚Äù

original: ma yin te 'dir gzhan du mi srid pa'i phyir de ltar rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ma yin te 'dir gzhan du mi srid pa'i phyir de ltar rtogs pa yin no //
translated: No, because it is understood in that way here, since it is impossible otherwise.

original: 'on te de lta ma yin pa la tshad ma med pa'i phyir rtogs pa med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de lta ma yin pa la tshad ma med pa'i phyir rtogs pa med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is not so, then it is not understood, because there is no valid cognition of it.

original: lung thams cad kyang skyes bus ma byas par thal 'gyur te /
analyzed: lung thams cad kyang skyes bus ma byas par thal 'gyur te /
translated: It follows that all scriptures are not made by a person,

original: der brtag pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der brtag pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is a reason for the investigation of them.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: bde bar gshegs pa la /üîΩdes ni rgyu mtshan can sgra yi //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa la / des ni rgyu mtshan can sgra yi //
translated: the SugataüîΩhas the word ‚Äúreason‚Äù

original: don dam sgra rnams kyi ni don //
analyzed: don dam sgra rnams kyi ni don //
translated: in the words ‚Äúultimate‚Äù and ‚Äúreason.‚Äù

original: don dam pa nyid 'gog pa la //
analyzed: don dam pa nyid 'gog pa la //
translated: The refutation of the ultimate itself

original: gnod pa med par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: gnod pa med par bstan pa yin //
translated: is taught to be without fault.

original: rgyu mtshan las byung ba'i mnyan pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes gal te brjod na ni de la skyon yod pa la /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan las byung ba'i mnyan pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes gal te brjod na ni de la skyon yod pa la /
translated: If you say that there is no inference at all that arises from a reason, then that is faulty.

original: don dam par 'brel pa'i stobs kyis ma yin no zhes so gal te brjod pa yang de la gnod pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: don dam par 'brel pa'i stobs kyis ma yin no zhes so gal te brjod pa yang de la gnod pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: If you say that it is not by the power of a connection in the ultimate, then that is also faulty.

original: dpyod pa ba la sogs pa gang dag brda las 'byung ba rnams kyang ma yin no zhes smra ba de nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpyod pa ba la sogs pa gang dag brda las 'byung ba rnams kyang ma yin no zhes smra ba de nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that it is not even from a sign that arises from conventions, then that is faulty for the Mƒ´mƒÅ·πÉsakas and so on who say that.

original: de la grags pa bas ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la grags pa bas ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable to rely on what is renowned.

original: des na yul gyi khyad par ni //
analyzed: des na yul gyi khyad par ni //
translated: Therefore, in order to teach the difference of objects,

original: bstan phyir grags pa rjes dpag las //
analyzed: bstan phyir grags pa rjes dpag las //
translated: it is renowned that inference is from what is renowned.

original: phyi rol gyur pa ma yin yang //
analyzed: phyi rol gyur pa ma yin yang //
translated: Although it is not external,

original: tha dad byas yin snga ma bzhin //
analyzed: tha dad byas yin snga ma bzhin //
translated: it is made different, as before.

original: ji ltar khas blangs pa dang / @190b rang gi tshig skabs kyi rten nyid du khas blangs pa gnod par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar khas blangs pa dang / @190b rang gi tshig skabs kyi rten nyid du khas blangs pa gnod par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: What is accepted and what is accepted as the basis of one‚Äôs own words are faulty.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: dam bcas pa'i don gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contradicts the meaning of the thesis.

original: rnam pa thams cad du phyin ci log gnod par byed pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du phyin ci log gnod par byed pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that all error contradicts,

original: gnyis dag stobs mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis dag stobs mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the two are equal in strength.

original: de bzhin du grags pa yang don dam pa'i don gyi gnod par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du grags pa yang don dam pa'i don gyi gnod par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, what is commonly recognized does not contradict the meaning of the ultimate,

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa tsam gyis grags pa spong ba la gnod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa tsam gyis grags pa spong ba la gnod par byed pa yin te /
translated: but it does contradict the mere understanding that rejects what is commonly recognized.

original: des na don dam par ni ma yin te /üîΩgrub pa tha dad bshad pa la //
analyzed: des na don dam par ni ma yin te / grub pa tha dad bshad pa la //
translated: Therefore, it is not the ultimate,üîΩbut it is a thesis.üîΩThe two are stated with their reasons

original: dgos pa bstan phyir 'di gnyis ni //üîΩrgyu dang bcas pa rang brjod de //
analyzed: dgos pa bstan phyir 'di gnyis ni // rgyu dang bcas pa rang brjod de //
translated: in order to show the purpose.üîΩDirect perception and inference do not contradict

original: mngon sum rjes dpag gnod la min //
analyzed: mngon sum rjes dpag gnod la min //
translated: what is stated with its reason.

original: de la slob dpon gyis 'di skad gsungs so //
analyzed: de la slob dpon gyis 'di skad gsungs so //
translated: The master has said this:

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis bstan par bya ba rang nyid 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis bstan par bya ba rang nyid 'dod pa ni /
translated: That which is to be demonstrated by its own nature is itself accepted.

original: gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang lung dang grags pas ma bsal na phyogs yin no //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang lung dang grags pas ma bsal na phyogs yin no //
