translated: The property that has that aspect is the property that is distinguished by the subject in the context. If that is undermined, then there is a fault. It is not thought that if the subject is undermined, then there is a fault.

original: 'di yang dong yis grub min nam //
analyzed: 'di yang dong yis grub min nam //
translated: Is this also not established by the opponent?

original: bden te 'ga' zhig chos can ni //
analyzed: bden te 'ga' zhig chos can ni //
translated: It is true, but if the subject is

original: 'ga' zhig bkag pa la yang ni //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig bkag pa la yang ni //
translated: Some accept that even the refutation of something

original: skyon dang ldan par khas len to//üîΩgal te chos de la gnod pas //
analyzed: skyon dang ldan par khas len to// gal te chos de la gnod pas //
translated: has faults.üîΩIf it is the case that the property is faulty

original: skyon dang ldan par yin na de'i chos can gyi sgo nas sam dngos su yang bla ste /
analyzed: skyon dang ldan par yin na de'i chos can gyi sgo nas sam dngos su yang bla ste /
translated: because it is harmed, then it is either by way of the property possessor or directly.

original: rnam pa thams cad du bsgrub bya'i chos dgag pa skyon yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du bsgrub bya'i chos dgag pa skyon yin no zhe na /
translated: In every way, the negation of the property to be established is a fault.

original: 'di ni bden te /
analyzed: 'di ni bden te /
translated: This is true.

original: de lta mod kyi 'di ni gzhan gyi log par rtogs pa dgag pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi 'di ni gzhan gyi log par rtogs pa dgag pa'i don yin no //
translated: However, this is for the purpose of refuting the misconceptions of others.

original: 'di ltar kha cig chos can @194b 'ba' zhig la gnod na yang skyon yin no zhes smra bar byed do //üîΩdper na mkha' sogs gzhan dag gis //
analyzed: 'di ltar kha cig chos can @194b 'ba' zhig la gnod na yang skyon yin no zhes smra bar byed do // dper na mkha' sogs gzhan dag gis //
translated: In this way, some say that even if the property possessor alone is harmed, it is a fault.üîΩFor example, it is like the explanation:

original: sngon med rang bzhin bskyed med min //
analyzed: sngon med rang bzhin bskyed med min //
translated: Space and so on are not unproduced,

original: cig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
analyzed: cig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
translated: because they are not causes of sound and so on simultaneously.

original: zhes bshad pa la sun 'byin pa //üîΩde bzhin mkha' sogs chos can gyi //üîΩngo bo'ang dngos med brjod byed bzhin //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa la sun 'byin pa // de bzhin mkha' sogs chos can gyi // ngo bo'ang dngos med brjod byed bzhin //
translated: The refutation of that is:üîΩIn the same way, the nature of the property

original: de ltar 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya la //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya la //
translated: possessor space and so on is like the expressed object, the nonthing.üîΩIn that way, the property to be established is asserted to be

original: gnod pa 'ga' yang med pa nyid //
analyzed: gnod pa 'ga' yang med pa nyid //
translated: there is no fault at all.

original: rgol bas smras pa nam mkha' la sogs pa dag ni /
analyzed: rgol bas smras pa nam mkha' la sogs pa dag ni /
translated: The opponent says: Space and so forth are not unproduced,

original: lhan cig byed pa dag gis sngon med pa'i rang bzhin bskyed par byar med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa dag gis sngon med pa'i rang bzhin bskyed par byar med pa ma yin te /
translated: because they are produced by the collection of conditions,

original: sgra la sogs pa'i 'bras bu cig car mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i 'bras bu cig car mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect, sound and so forth, is not produced simultaneously.

original: gal te bskyed par byar med pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te bskyed par byar med pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
translated: If they were unproduced,

original: sgra la sogs pa'i 'bras bu cig car kho nar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i 'bras bu cig car kho nar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: the effect, sound and so forth, would be produced simultaneously.

original: 'di'i phyir rgol bas smras pa /üîΩci ltar 'di nam mkha' la sogs pa sngon med pa'i rang bzhin bskyed par byar med par bsgrub pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir rgol bas smras pa / ci ltar 'di nam mkha' la sogs pa sngon med pa'i rang bzhin bskyed par byar med par bsgrub pa de bzhin du /
translated: The opponent says:üîΩJust as space and so forth are established as unproduced,

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i chos can rnams dngos po nyid med par yang sgrub par byed do zhe'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i chos can rnams dngos po nyid med par yang sgrub par byed do zhe'o //
translated: so too, the subjects, space and so forth, are established as not being entities.

original: chos can 'ga' zhig la gnod pa ni skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can 'ga' zhig la gnod pa ni skyon ma yin no //
translated: There is no fault in refuting something about a subject.

original: 'di lta bu ni rgol ba'i skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni rgol ba'i skyon ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault of the opponent,üîΩbecause

original: des na nam mkha' la sogs pa dngos por gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid sgrub par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na nam mkha' la sogs pa dngos por gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid sgrub par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this very statement, ‚ÄúSpace and so on are not entities,‚Äù is what you wish to prove.

original: des dngos por gyur pa ma yin pa'i nam mkha' chos can la /
analyzed: des dngos por gyur pa ma yin pa'i nam mkha' chos can la /
translated: In that case, with respect to space, which is not an entity, the subject,

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni sngon med pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni sngon med pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa yin te /
translated: space and so on are not inexpressible essences that did not exist previously,

original: cig car rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba skyon med de /
analyzed: cig car rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba skyon med de /
translated: because they are not simultaneous causes.

original: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i chos chos can la bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i chos chos can la bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is not a fault, because the probandum is established for a subject that is a phenomenon that is based on conceptual thought.

original: dngos por gyur pa ni de'i chos can ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa ni de'i chos can ma yin no //
translated: An entity is not the subject of that.

original: des na de 'ba' zhig la gnod kyang gnod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir rang gi chos can smos so //
analyzed: des na de 'ba' zhig la gnod kyang gnod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir rang gi chos can smos so //
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that even though it is damaged in that case, it is not damaged, he mentions his own subject.

original: chos can gzhan la gnod pas ni chos de mi 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can gzhan la gnod pas ni chos de mi 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: The damage to another subject does not damage that phenomenon.

original: des na bsgrub bya'i chos 'grub pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir nyes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya'i chos 'grub pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir nyes pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because there is no damage to the establishment of the probandum, there is no fault.

original: yang na sngon med pa'i rang bzhin bskyed par byar med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na sngon med pa'i rang bzhin bskyed par byar med pa ma yin te /
translated: Or else, it is not that it does not generate a nature that did not exist before,üîΩbecause it is not the cause of sound, etc., all at once.

original: cig car sgra la sogs pa'i rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: cig car sgra la sogs pa'i rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: nam mkha' ni mi rtag pa yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni mi rtag pa yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Space is impermanent.

original: de la gzhan dag na re chos can nam mkha' rtag pa la gnod par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
analyzed: de la gzhan dag na re chos can nam mkha' rtag pa la gnod par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
translated: In response to that, others say, ‚ÄúIt would be a fault to have the permanent space as the subject.‚Äù

original: gnod med de ltar na yang mi rtag pa'i nam mkha' chos can du 'gyur ro //üîΩgtan tshigs kyis gdon @195a * //
analyzed: gnod med de ltar na yang mi rtag pa'i nam mkha' chos can du 'gyur ro // gtan tshigs kyis gdon @195a * //
translated: There is no fault, because even though it is like that, impermanent space becomes the subject.

original: mi za bar bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gnod par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mi za bar bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gnod par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The reason is necessarily a fault in the opposite of the probandum.

original: chos can rtag pa ni skabs kyi bsgrub bya'i gzhi ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can rtag pa ni skabs kyi bsgrub bya'i gzhi ma yin te /
translated: A permanent subject is not the basis of the probandum in the context.

original: des na de la gnod pas skyon ci yod /
analyzed: des na de la gnod pas skyon ci yod /
translated: Therefore, what fault is there in refuting it?

original: gal te de la gnod na chod 'di mi 'grub na ni 'di skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de la gnod na chod 'di mi 'grub na ni 'di skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is refuted, then if this is not established, it would be a fault.

original: 'di ltar nam mkha' rtag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar nam mkha' rtag pa ma yin te /
translated: In this way, space is not permanent,

original: dbyangs kyi dbye ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi dbye ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the divisions of vowels.

original: bad kan sogs kyis mgrin pa'i bu nyams par gyur pa na /
analyzed: bad kan sogs kyis mgrin pa'i bu nyams par gyur pa na /
translated: When the throat is damaged by phlegm, etc.,

original: mgrin pa'i sbubs kyi nam mkha' ni //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i sbubs kyi nam mkha' ni //
translated: the space in the throat

original: nyams pas dbyangs ni tha dad pa 'gyur //
analyzed: nyams pas dbyangs ni tha dad pa 'gyur //
translated: is damaged, and the voice is altered.

original: 'di ltar gzeng dag dog pa dang yangs par mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzeng dag dog pa dang yangs par mthong ba yin la /
translated: Thus, the throat is seen to be sometimes narrow and sometimes wide.

original: de'i gnas skabs ma yin pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs ma yin pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
translated: And its being in a condition that is not that is impermanent.

original: 'on te de ni 'dir dngos po nyid gzhan yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on te de ni 'dir dngos po nyid gzhan yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: But if you say that it is the very existence of another entity that is space,

original: nam mkha' ni yangs pa la sogs pa de nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni yangs pa la sogs pa de nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: then space is just that, the wide, etc.

original: snga ma ci ste mi dmigs gegs yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: snga ma ci ste mi dmigs gegs yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the former is not perceived because there is an obstruction,

original: rtag pa ci ltar gegs bya bar 'gyur te 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: rtag pa ci ltar gegs bya bar 'gyur te 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: how can a permanent thing be obstructed? This is just babbling.

original: gzhan yang snam bu la sogs pa'i yan lag can ni mi skye ba nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan yang snam bu la sogs pa'i yan lag can ni mi skye ba nyid do //
translated: Moreover, the whole, such as a cloth, is not produced.

original: 'on kyang snal ma snal ma gzhan la brgyud pa tsam nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang snal ma snal ma gzhan la brgyud pa tsam nyid do //
translated: But it is just the mere succession of one thread to another.

original: ci'i phyir drang ba dang logs shin tu mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir drang ba dang logs shin tu mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is it not very confused?

original: mgrin pa'i sbubs drangs pa na yang lus logs shig tu ci ste mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i sbubs drangs pa na yang lus logs shig tu ci ste mi 'gyur //
translated: And when it is drawn into the throat, why doesn‚Äôt the body become something else?

original: des na 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: des na 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Therefore, this is mere sophistry.

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyi dngos po nyid las nam mkha' ni mi rtag pa 'am /üîΩdngos po med pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyi dngos po nyid las nam mkha' ni mi rtag pa 'am / dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig nyid du nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is certain that space is impermanent or non-existent, because it is something other.

original: yang na thogs pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po dang ma 'dres pa'i snang ba la sogs pa nyid nam mkha' yin te dngos po gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i mi rtag pa nyid nam mkha' yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: yang na thogs pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po dang ma 'dres pa'i snang ba la sogs pa nyid nam mkha' yin te dngos po gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i mi rtag pa nyid nam mkha' yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i phyogs so //
translated: Or else, space is just the appearance, etc. , unmixed with an entity that has resistance, and the impermanence unmixed with another entity is space. This is the position of the opponent.

original: de lta bur 'gyur ba'i chos can bsgrub bya'i chos kyi khyad par can nyid du sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bur 'gyur ba'i chos can bsgrub bya'i chos kyi khyad par can nyid du sgrub pa yin no //
translated: In that case, the impermanence of space is established as a property of the subject that has the distinction of being a property to be established that has the property of being subject to change.

original: des na de las gzhan pa'i chos can gnod pa la skyon med pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na de las gzhan pa'i chos can gnod pa la skyon med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in refuting the subject that is other than that.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / 'dis ni gnyi ga sgrub pa nyid //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'dis ni gnyi ga sgrub pa nyid //
translated: if it establishes both,

original: yin na chos can la gnod gang //
analyzed: yin na chos can la gnod gang //
translated: what fault is there in refuting the subject?

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'gog pas //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'gog pas //
translated: Because the property to be established is refuted,

original: de la gnod par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: de la gnod par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: there is a fault in the subject.

original: gal te bsgrub bya'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de lta na yang chos can gang la gnod pas skabs kyi chos de bkag par 'gyur ba de nyid la skyon du 'gyur ba yin no zhes rang gi chos can la smos pas
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de lta na yang chos can gang la gnod pas skabs kyi chos de bkag par 'gyur ba de nyid la skyon du 'gyur ba yin no zhes rang gi chos can la smos pas
translated: Even if the property to be established and the subject in general are what is to be established, still, because the subject is faulted, the property to be established in that subject is refuted.

original: @195b 'di brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: @195b 'di brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said by mentioning the subject.

original: de dang 'brel pa med pa kun brtags pa'i chos can la gnod pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa med pa kun brtags pa'i chos can la gnod pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the property to be established is refuted by refuting the subject that is imagined to be unrelated to the property.

original: 'di ltar / de lta nyid du chos can yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de lta nyid du chos can yang //
translated: In this way,

original: bsgrub bya nyid phyir 'ba' zhig min //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid phyir 'ba' zhig min //
translated: the subject is not only to be established.

original: chos can ni rang gi ngo bos grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos can ni rang gi ngo bos grub pa nyid do //
translated: The subject is established by its own nature.

original: ma grub pa'i chos can la bsgrub bya'i chos grub pa ni nye bar mkho ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i chos can la bsgrub bya'i chos grub pa ni nye bar mkho ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no need for the property to be established to be established in a subject that is not established.

original: des khyad par du byas pa nyid du de bsgrubs par 'dod pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des khyad par du byas pa nyid du de bsgrubs par 'dod pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is qualified by it is what is to be established, but not its own nature.

original: des na 'ba' zhig bkag pa la skyon med do //
analyzed: des na 'ba' zhig bkag pa la skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in the mere negation.

original: gal te rang bzhin gang gis chos can de'i gzhi nyid du 'dod pa'i rang bzhin la gnod na nges par skyon du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin gang gis chos can de'i gzhi nyid du 'dod pa'i rang bzhin la gnod na nges par skyon du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that if the intrinsic nature by which the property possessor is accepted as a basis is harmed, then there is certainly a fault,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: we say no.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin nam rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'am mngon par mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin nam rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'am mngon par mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we do not assert the intrinsic nature of things or the intrinsic nature of permanence.

original: gzhan yang / gal te chos can bsgrub bya'am //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te chos can bsgrub bya'am //
translated: Moreover, if the property possessor is the probandum,

original: gtan tshigs shugs kyis rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: gtan tshigs shugs kyis rang bzhin ni //
translated: then the intrinsic nature is implied by the reason.

original: gzhan 'gyur dngos spyod bdag cag la //
analyzed: gzhan 'gyur dngos spyod bdag cag la //
translated: If it is the other way around, we have nothing to do with it.

original: de bkag pas ni ci zhig bya //
analyzed: de bkag pas ni ci zhig bya //
translated: What is the point of refuting it?

original: dngos po'i stobs las 'ongs pa 'ga' zhig tu 'jug pa ni dngos po sems pa la spyod pa 'gas kyang dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i stobs las 'ongs pa 'ga' zhig tu 'jug pa ni dngos po sems pa la spyod pa 'gas kyang dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: One who engages in some way on the basis of the power of things cannot be refuted by anyone who engages in the analysis of things with the mind.

original: tshad ma dang ldan pa ni tshad mas 'thad pa'i dngos po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma dang ldan pa ni tshad mas 'thad pa'i dngos po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one who possesses valid cognition follows the things that are established by valid cognition.

original: gal te de lta na 'dir gnod //
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'dir gnod //
translated: If you say that if it is so, then there is harm,

original: cig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
analyzed: cig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
translated: because sound and so on are not simultaneous causes,

original: bde sogs gzhan gyis bskyed nus phyir //
analyzed: bde sogs gzhan gyis bskyed nus phyir //
translated: because pleasure, etc. can be produced by others.

original: ma yin zhes bya snga ma yin //
analyzed: ma yin zhes bya snga ma yin //
translated: The former is not so.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gtso bo'i sgra la sogs pa gsal ba'i rgyur 'dod do //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gtso bo'i sgra la sogs pa gsal ba'i rgyur 'dod do //
translated: The nature of pleasure, pain, and delusion is asserted to be the cause of the manifestation of the sound of the principal, etc.

original: des na cig car rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir bde ba la sogs pa de dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na cig car rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir bde ba la sogs pa de dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, because they are not simultaneous causes, those such as pleasure would be nonthings.

original: gtso bo'i rang bzhin rtag pa nyid la gnod pa na dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gtso bo'i rang bzhin rtag pa nyid la gnod pa na dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: When the nature of the principal is harmed, they would become nonthings.

original: de ni ma yin te 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te 'di ltar /
translated: That is not so, because it is like this:

original: gal te 'di la gtan tshigs ni //
analyzed: gal te 'di la gtan tshigs ni //
translated: If this is a reason,

original: des na 'gal bar 'gyur ba nyid //üîΩrim bzhin byed dang mi rtag nyid //
analyzed: des na 'gal bar 'gyur ba nyid // rim bzhin byed dang mi rtag nyid //
translated: then there would be contradiction.

original: 'gal ba med phyir mi mthun phyogs //
analyzed: 'gal ba med phyir mi mthun phyogs //
translated: Because there is no contradiction between sequential activity and impermanence,üîΩthe opposite is the dissimilar class.

original: ldog na the tshom za bas na //
analyzed: ldog na the tshom za bas na //
translated: Because there is doubt when there is reversal,

original: 'di ni lhag ldan khyad par 'dod//
analyzed: 'di ni lhag ldan khyad par 'dod//
translated: this is asserted to be a special remainder.

original: 'di rim ma yin pas bkag pa la rim gyis byad pa nyid ni gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: 'di rim ma yin pas bkag pa la rim gyis byad pa nyid ni gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The reason is sequential activity, because the negation of nonsequential activity is sequential activity.

original: rim bzhin byed pa dang mi rtag pa nyid la yang 'gal ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rim bzhin byed pa dang mi rtag pa nyid la yang 'gal ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because there is no contradiction between the action and impermanence.

original: des ni mi rtag pa nyid med pa go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar chos can la gnod pa yin de la gnod pas ni chos la gnod par @196a * //üîΩ'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des ni mi rtag pa nyid med pa go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar chos can la gnod pa yin de la gnod pas ni chos la gnod par @196a * // 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Since that does not make it understood that there is no impermanence, how does it contradict the subject? For if it contradicts that, it does not contradict the property.

original: des na rang gi chos can smos so //üîΩgang phyir rang nyid 'dod pa'i chos //
analyzed: des na rang gi chos can smos so // gang phyir rang nyid 'dod pa'i chos //
translated: Therefore, it mentions the subject itself.üîΩBecause it is the property of the subject itself that is desired,

original: bsgrub bya de phyir de rten ni //
analyzed: bsgrub bya de phyir de rten ni //
translated: the basis of that is

original: gnod yin 'ba' zhig pa nyid dam //
analyzed: gnod yin 'ba' zhig pa nyid dam //
translated: only the contradiction of the subject itself,

original: 'jig rten la min zhes bstan to //üîΩ'ba' zhig pa gnod pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten la min zhes bstan to // 'ba' zhig pa gnod pa'am /
translated: or it is taught that it is not the contradiction of the world.

original: de las gzhan pa'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i chos can la gnod pas ni rgol ba 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i chos can la gnod pas ni rgol ba 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: The contradiction of the subject itself or the contradiction of the subject that is the basis of that, which is different from that, does not contradict the probandum that is desired by the opponent.

original: des na bsgrub bya'i chos la nye bar mkho ba'i chos can la gnod pa skyon yin no //üîΩde'i phyir / rang nyid sgra yi chos can la //
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya'i chos la nye bar mkho ba'i chos can la gnod pa skyon yin no // de'i phyir / rang nyid sgra yi chos can la //
translated: Therefore, the contradiction of the subject that is necessary for the probandum is a fault.üîΩTherefore, it teaches that

original: gnod pas gnod min zhes bstan pa //
analyzed: gnod pas gnod min zhes bstan pa //
translated: the contradiction of the subject itself, the property of sound, is not a contradiction.

original: de bzhin rang gi chos can gyis //
analyzed: de bzhin rang gi chos can gyis //
translated: Likewise, one should say

original: chos can gzhan la yang zhes brjod //
analyzed: chos can gzhan la yang zhes brjod //
translated: that the subject is qualified by its own property.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gal te chos kyi khyad par can du bsgrub par 'dod pa'i chos can gang yin pa de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang / lung dang grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod pa med na de ni phyogs yin na gzhan du ni phyogs ltar snang ba yin no zhes sngar bshad pa nyid kyi don gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gal te chos kyi khyad par can du bsgrub par 'dod pa'i chos can gang yin pa de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang / lung dang grags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnod pa med na de ni phyogs yin na gzhan du ni phyogs ltar snang ba yin no zhes sngar bshad pa nyid kyi don gsungs pa yin no //
translated: For this very reason, it is said that if the subject that is intended to be qualified by the property to be established is not contradicted by the presence of the property to be established, which is either perceived, inferred, or acknowledged, then it is a position. Otherwise, it is a pseudo-position.

original: gal te khyad par can rab tu ma grub pa dang / gnyi ga rab tu ma grub pa dang / khyad par rab tu ma grub pa zhes bya ba phyogs ltar snang ba gzhan yang yod pa ma yin nam /üîΩkhyad par can rab tu ma grub pa ni dper na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par can rab tu ma grub pa dang / gnyi ga rab tu ma grub pa dang / khyad par rab tu ma grub pa zhes bya ba phyogs ltar snang ba gzhan yang yod pa ma yin nam / khyad par can rab tu ma grub pa ni dper na /
translated: Aren't there other pseudo-positions, such as the unestablished property-possessor, the unestablished reason, and the unestablished property?üîΩThe unestablished property-possessor is like saying

original: bdag ni khyab pa'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: bdag ni khyab pa'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The self is all-pervading.

original: khyad par rab tu ma grub pa ni grangs can la sgra 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par rab tu ma grub pa ni grangs can la sgra 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In particular, the nonestablishment of the reason is, for example, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent‚Äù for a SƒÅ·πÉkhya.

original: gnyi ga rab tu ma grub pa ni bdag ni 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga rab tu ma grub pa ni bdag ni 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The nonestablishment of both is, for example, ‚ÄúThe self is the cause of the collection.‚Äù

original: de ci ltar 'di dag nye bar ma bkod ce na /
analyzed: de ci ltar 'di dag nye bar ma bkod ce na /
translated: Why are these not stated here?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar / yan lag phyi ma la gnas phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / yan lag phyi ma la gnas phyir //
translated: Because it is based on the latter part,

original: phyogs kyi skyon du 'di mi 'thad //üîΩphyogs tsam nye bar bkod pa yis //
analyzed: phyogs kyi skyon du 'di mi 'thad // phyogs tsam nye bar bkod pa yis //
translated: this is not suitable as a fault of the position.üîΩBecause the fault of that

original: de yi skyon nyid rnam gnas phyir //
analyzed: de yi skyon nyid rnam gnas phyir //
translated: is based on the mere statement of the position,

original: de la bdag ni khyab pa yin no zhes gal te 'ga' zhig khyab pa dang ldan pa'i bdag ni bsgrub byar byed na phyogs la skyon ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de la bdag ni khyab pa yin no zhes gal te 'ga' zhig khyab pa dang ldan pa'i bdag ni bsgrub byar byed na phyogs la skyon ci zhig yod /
translated: If someone asserts that the self is all-pervading and makes the self that possesses pervasion the probandum, what is the fault of the position?

original: chos can med pas gtan tshigs kyi rten ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
analyzed: chos can med pas gtan tshigs kyi rten ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
translated: Because the subject does not exist, the basis of the reason is not established.

original: 'o na gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin gyi /
translated: Well, then, it is a fault of the reason,

original: phyogs ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs ni ma yin te /
translated: but it is not the position,

original: de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows the forward and reverse pervasion.

original: de bzhin du sgra 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba khyad par gang du ma grub /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba khyad par gang du ma grub /
translated: Likewise, in the statement ‚ÄúSound is impermanent,‚Äù with respect to what is the qualifier not established?

original: gang du sgra la'o zhe na /
analyzed: gang du sgra la'o zhe na /
translated: With respect to sound.

original: de ni skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni skyon ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid kyi phyir te bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid kyi phyir te bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: Because of that, the object to be established is sound.

original: gzhan @196b du bsgrub par bya ba'i don ci zhig yin /
analyzed: gzhan @196b du bsgrub par bya ba'i don ci zhig yin /
translated: What is the point of establishing something else?

original: 'on te bzlog par grub pas na ma grub par brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bzlog par grub pas na ma grub par brjod do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is called ‚Äúnot established‚Äù because it is established in the opposite sense,

original: gal te rmongs pa la bzlog par grub pa de lta na yang de tsam gyis phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te rmongs pa la bzlog par grub pa de lta na yang de tsam gyis phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: then even though it is established in the opposite sense for the confused, that alone does not constitute a fault of the thesis.

original: gal te tshad mas phyin ci log tu grub na ni de'i tshe phyogs de tshad mas gnod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te tshad mas phyin ci log tu grub na ni de'i tshe phyogs de tshad mas gnod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is established in the opposite sense by a valid means of knowledge, then at that time the thesis is undermined by a valid means of knowledge.

original: tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi skyon de yin gyi skyon gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi skyon de yin gyi skyon gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the fault is that it contradicts a valid means of knowledge, and it is not another fault.

original: 'on te dpe la yin na de'i tshe dpe bsgrub byas stong pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyi nyes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te dpe la yin na de'i tshe dpe bsgrub byas stong pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyi nyes pa yin gyi /
translated: But if it is the example, then because the example is empty of the object of affirmation, that is the fault.

original: phyogs kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the position.

original: gnyi ga rab tu ma grub pa ni gnyi ga'i ltar yang nyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di thams cad ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga rab tu ma grub pa ni gnyi ga'i ltar yang nyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di thams cad ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon nyid do //
translated: The fault of neither being established is a fault of the position, because it is a fault for both.

original: 'on te gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin gyi phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin gyi phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te /
translated: But if it is a fault of the reason, then the position is not faulty,

original: 'dir thams cad du phyogs nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir thams cad du phyogs nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because in this case the position itself is not established.

original: de lta bu ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta bu ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te /
translated: In this way, all faults of the reason, etc., become faults of the position,

original: gang zhig phyogs la mi gnod ba'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i skyon de ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: gang zhig phyogs la mi gnod ba'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i skyon de ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: because there is no fault of the reason, etc., that does not harm the position.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: For,

original: sgrub byed skyon ni thams cad kyis //
analyzed: sgrub byed skyon ni thams cad kyis //
translated: All faults of the proof

original: phyogs nyid kyi ni skyon du 'gyur //
analyzed: phyogs nyid kyi ni skyon du 'gyur //
translated: Become faults of the position.

original: de lta na yang dam bca' ba //üîΩtsam dang 'brel pa phyogs skyon yin //
analyzed: de lta na yang dam bca' ba // tsam dang 'brel pa phyogs skyon yin //
translated: Even so, the fault of the mere thesisüîΩIs the fault of the position.

original: de la gnod pa tsam gyis ni de phyogs kyi skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: de la gnod pa tsam gyis ni de phyogs kyi skyon ma yin te /
translated: The mere harm to that is not the fault of the position.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon yang skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon yang skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The fault of the proof would also be a fault of the thesis.

original: 'on te sgrub par byed pa'i skyon ni de la gnod pa yin yang phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sgrub par byed pa'i skyon ni de la gnod pa yin yang phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the fault of the proof is not a fault of the thesis, even though it is a fault of the proof,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: gzhan du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other way to understand it.

original: 'on te phyogs kyi rang gi ngo bo dang de'i dus las 'das nas sgrub par byed pa'i dus na rang rang gi ngo bo tha dad par 'gyur ba'i phyir phyogs kyi skyon yin gyi //
analyzed: 'on te phyogs kyi rang gi ngo bo dang de'i dus las 'das nas sgrub par byed pa'i dus na rang rang gi ngo bo tha dad par 'gyur ba'i phyir phyogs kyi skyon yin gyi //
translated: But if you say that it is a fault of the thesis because the time of the proof is different from the time of the thesis, since the time of the proof is different from the time of the thesis,
